byed rab 'bring tha ma dag 'byung ste/ 'du byed ni mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang 'du byed de dag ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir de mi rtog cing lhun gyis
grub par bya ba de lta bu de dag 'byung ngo / /de bzhin du rnam par smin pa tha ma dang / 'bring dang / rab kyi dbang gis sems can thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa
pa tha ma dang / 'bring dang / rab tu mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i
phyir mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par mdzad pa de lta bu de dag kyang 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sprin las ro gcig pa'i char 'bab ste/ babs nas snod
kyi bye brag gi kha dog sna tshogs dang / dri sna tshogs su gyur te/ sprin ni mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog gi /'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog cing
lhun gyis grub par bya ba de lta bu de dag kyang 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ro gcig ste/ de sems can yongs su smin par
byed pa'i dbang gis chos kyi dbyings tha dad par snang yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir rnam par
mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par mdzad pa de lta bu de dag kyang 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po gang du 'byung ba der lcags dang /
lcags kyi yo byad rnams mi 'byung ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa gang du byung ba der
me'i 'od rnams dang / glog gi 'od rnams mi 'byung ngo / /der nyi ma'i 'od rnams mi 'byung ngo / /der nor bu'i 'od rnams mi 'byung ngo / /der lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za
dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba'i 'od rnams mi 'byung ngo / /der rgyal po
rnams kyi bka' mi 'byung ngo / /der rigs bzhi rnams mi 'byung ngo / /der mi khom par skye ba rnams mi 'byung ngo / /der sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags dang /
gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba rnams mi 'byung ngo / /der mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams mi 'byung ngo / /der nyon mongs pa thams cad mi 'byung ngo / /der 'khrug pa thams
cad mi 'byung ngo / /der mu stegs can spyod pa ba dang / kun tu rgyu dang / gcer bu dang / 'tsho ba pa rnams mi 'byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog mod
kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan zhing yul chags pa med pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par mdzad pa de lta bu de dag 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal/ de bzhin
gshegs pa'i yul mdor bstan pa yin te/ rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis brlabs kyang bstan par mi nus so/ /'jam dpal/ de la de bzhin gshegs
pa'i lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes ni/ 'jam dpal/ 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams
ni rab tu nyung gi/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang / gling re rer skad cig skad cig la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku kha dog dang / rnam par gnas pa
dang / 'jug pa dus gcig tu 'byung ba dag ni ches mang ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/ /'jam dpal/ 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul
snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes lhun gyis grub pa'i phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi
khams re re dang / gling re rer sems can rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhan dang / gzhan dag rtsom par sbyor ba dang / las dang bzo'i gnas thams cad la sbyor ba dag 'byung ba ni ches
mang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par mdzad pa de lta bu
de dag kyang 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad na mu stegs can gyi gnas thams cad dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig
rten las 'das pa'i las bya ba thams cad gang ci 'byung ba de dag thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes kyis 'byung ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma 'dres pa'i
chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/ /'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sa la brten/ sa la gnas nas sa bon thams cad dang / rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / rtsi dang / nags tshal
thams cad 'phel zhing rgyas la yangs par 'gyur te/ sa ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par bya
ba de lta bu de dag kyang 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa la rten/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gnas nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams
thams cad kyi mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu dang / gcer bu pa la sogs pa mu stegs can gyi gnas thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'jig rten pa dang /
'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 'phel zhing rgyas pa yang par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres
pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog cing / lhun gyis grub par mdzad pa de lta bu de dag kyang 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gang dag zug rdu 'byin
pa'i sman la reg pa de dag gi zug rdu thams cad 'byin te/ zug rdu 'byin pa'i sman ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos
dang ldan pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par bya ba de lta bu de dag kyang 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du gang dag tha na de bzhin gshegs pa ri mor bris pa'am
glegs bam la bris pa la reg kyang rung ste/ rgyu des de dag gi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi zug rdu 'byin te/ de bzhin gshegs
pa ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par mdzad pa de lta bu de dag kyang 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal
'di lta ste/ dper na/ rin po che'i rgyal po yid bzhin gyi nor bu ni sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur te/ yid bzhin gyi
nor bu rin po che ni mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyi grub par bya ba de lta bu de dag kyang 'byung
ngo / /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang dag chos bstan pa gang 'dod pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i gan du
'gro zhing chos bstan pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa las nyan kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir
rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par mdzad pa de lta bu de dag kyang 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes mdor bstan pa yin te/ rgyas
par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis brlabs kyang bstan par mi nus so/ /'jam dpal/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni 'jam dpal de
bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad na 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang / rdul phra rab re re dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag la 'jug ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang / gling re re'i yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig
brgya stong phrag lnga bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa rnam par
bzhag pa las 'das pa skad cig skad cig la 'byung ba/ thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/ nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i
bskal bar byin gyis rlob pa dag ni ches mang ngo / /de bzhin du ye shes kyi tshogs tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa rnam par bzhag pa las
'das pa skad cig skad cig la 'byung ba thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/ ma 'dres pa/ nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal
par byin gyis rlob pa dag go /de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa rnam par bzhag pa las 'das pa skad cig skad cig la 'byung ba thogs
pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/ nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal bar byin gyis rlob pa dag go /de bzhin dus rgya mtsho grangs
med pa'i bye brag bstan pa rnam par bzhag pa las 'das pa skad cig skad cig la 'byung ba thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/ nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs
pa| phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa dag go /de bzhin du gzungs rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa rnam par bzhag pa las 'das pa skad cig skad cig
la 'byung ba thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/ nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa dag go /de
bzhin du ting nge 'dzin tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa rnam par bzhag pa las 'das pa skad cig skad cig la 'byung ba thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer
med pa/ nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal bar byin gyis rlob pa dag go /de bzhin du rnam par thar pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag
bstan pa rnam par bzhag pa las 'das pa skad cig skad cig la 'byung ba thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/ nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa phyi ma'i mtha'i
mu'i bskal bar byin gyis rlob pa dag go /de bzhin du so so yang dag par rig pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa rnam par bzhag pa las 'das pa skad cig skad
cig la 'byung ba thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/ nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa dag go /de bzhin
du mngon par shes pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa rnam par bzhag pa las 'das pa skad cig skad cig la 'byung pa thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/
nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa dag go /de bzhin du smon lam rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa rnam par bzhag
pa las 'das pa skad cig skad cig la 'byung ba thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/ nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i
bskal par byin gyis rlob pa dag go /de bzhin du brtson 'grus rtsom pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa rnam par bzhag pa las 'das pa skad cig skad cig la 'byung ba thogs pa
med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/ nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa dag go /de bzhin du dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa rgya
mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa rnam par bzhag pa las 'das pa skad cig skad cig la 'byung ba thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/ nam mkha'i khams rgyas
par 'gengs pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal bar byin gyis rlob pa dag go /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa rnam par bzhag
pa las 'das pa skad cig skad cig las 'byung ba thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/ nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par
byin gyis rlob pa dag go /de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa rnam par bzhag pa las 'das pa skad cig skad cig la 'byung ba
thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/ nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa dag go /de bzhin du sems can gyi
bsam pa dang / spyod pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa rnam par bzhag pa las 'das pa skad cig skad cig la 'byung ba thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/
nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa dag go /de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan
pa rnam par bzhag pa las 'das pa skad cig skad cig la 'byung ba thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/ nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i
mu'i bskal bar byin gyis rlob pa dag go /de bzhin du bskal ba la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa rnam par bzhag pa las 'das pa skad cig skad cig la 'byung
pa thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/ nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal bar byin gyis rlob pa dag go /'jam dpal/
phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad na 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang dag yod pa de dag de bzhin
gshegs pa'i spu'i khung bu re rer 'jig cing chags so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mtha' dang / dbus med pa'i chos brnyes pa'i phyir ro/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin
gshegs pa'i bsam gyi mi khyab pa mdor bstan pa yin te/ rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal bar byin gyis brlabs kyang bstan par mi nus so/ |'jam dpal/ de la de
bzhin gshegs pa'i kun tu gzigs pa ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad na sems can 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba dang / bde 'gror 'gro ba dang / ngan
'gror 'gro ba rnams de bzhin gshegs pas gzigs te/ de bzhin du gtsug tor gyis kyang gzigs so/ /de bzhin du mdzod spus kyang gzigs so/ /de bzhin du mtshan re res
kyang gzigs so/ /de bzhin du dpe byad bzang po re res kyang gzigs so/ /de bzhin du spu'i khung bu re res kyang gzigs so/ /de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
rab 'byams thams cad na sems can 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba dang / bde 'gror 'gro ba dang / ngan 'gror 'gro ba dag dus gcig tu gzigs so/ /'jam dpal/ de
bzhin gshegs pa'i kun tu gzigs pa mdor bshad pa yin te/ rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis brlabs kyang bstan par mi nus so/ /'jam
dpal/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i grags pa ni/ 'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad na 'jig rten gyi khams re re
dang / gling re re dang / rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag 'jug cing sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig
la 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang / gling re rer 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi rnam par 'phrul ba thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/ nam mkha'i
khams rgyas par 'gengs pa thams cad 'byung ste/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob ste/ ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan
pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du zhing rnam par 'phrul pa dang / chos rnam par 'phrul pa dang / sku rnam par 'phrul pa dang / smon lam rnam par 'phrul pa dang / spyod yul rnam par 'phrul
pa dang / ye shes rnam par 'phrul pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnam par 'phrul pa dang / rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa dang / stobs rnam par 'phrul pa de lta bu la sogs pa 'jig
rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi rnam par 'phrul pa thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/ nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa dag skad cig skad cig la
'byung ste/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma 'dres pa'i chos
dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i grags pa mdor bstan pa yin te/ rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis brlabs kyang bstan
par mi nus so/ /'jam dpal/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyer med cing mi gnas pa ni/ 'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na tha dad la
'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du gnas pa ma yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gling 'di na tha dad la gling gzhan du gnas pa ma yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa khyim 'di na tha dad
la khyim gzhan du gnas pa ma yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i ris 'di na tha dad la lha'i ris gzhan du gnas pa ma yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dud 'gro'i skye gnas
su skye ba 'di na tha dad la dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skye ba gzhan du gnas pa ma yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yi dwags kyi 'gro ba 'di na tha dad la yi dwags kyi 'gro ba gzhan du
gnas pa ma yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sems can dmyal ba'i 'gro ba 'di na tha dad la sems can dmyal ba'i 'gro bar gzhan du gnas pa ma yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa 'dod pa'i khams na tha dad la gzugs kyi khams su gnas pa ma yin no/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyer med cing mi gnas pa mdor bstan pa yin te/ rgyas par
ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis brlabs kyang bstan par mi nus so/ /'jam dpal/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku thogs pa med pa ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi
khams rab 'byams dag na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dag yod pa de dag gi nam mkha' ci 'dra ba'i mtha' ni yod srid kyi/ dus gsum gyi phyogs mtha' yas pa dag na rgyal ba'i gtsug
tor 'byung ba dang / 'jig par snang ba rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gyi mtha' ni phyogs rnams na mi rnyed do/ /de dag gi nam mkha' ci 'dra ba'i mtha' ni yod srid kyi/ de bzhin du rgyal ba'i
mdzod spu dang / de bzhin du mtshan re re dang / de bzhin du dpe byad bzang po re re dang / de bzhin du spu'i khung bu re re'i mtha' ni phyogs rnams na mi rnyed do/ /lha dang / mi dang / byang
chub sems dpa' gang dag chos kyi tshul bstan pa ji lta bus 'dul ba de dag gis chos kyi tshul bstan pa de 'dra ba dag 'byung bar shes te/ de la lha dang / mi dang / byang chub sems
dpa' kha cig gis ni gtsug tor las bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/ /kha cig gis ni ye shes kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs
med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/ /kha cig gis ni pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/ /
kha cig gis ni sa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/ /kha cig gis ni gzungs rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/ /
kha cig gis ni ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/ /kha cig gis ni rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung
bar shes so/ /kha cig gis ni so so yang dag par rig pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/ /kha cig gis ni mngon par shes pa rgya mtsho grangs
med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/ /kha cig gis ni smon lam rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/ /kha cig gis ni brtson 'grus
rtsom pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/ /kha cig gis ni dbugs 'byin pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/ /
kha cig gis ni byang chub sems dpa' la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/ /kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug pa rgya
mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/ /kha cig gis ni sems can gyi bsam pa dang / spyod pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung
bar shes so/ /kha cig gis ni 'jig rten gyi khams la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/ /kha cig gis ni bskal pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs
med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/ /kha cig gis ni dus gsum la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/ /kha cig gis ni dus
gsum bstan pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/ /kha cig gis ni mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung
bar shes so/ /lha dang / mi dang / byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gis ni gtsug tor nas dbyer med pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/ /de bzhin
du lha dang / mi dang / byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa ji lta ba dang / 'dul ba ji lta ba zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed dag gis sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la de bzhin
du mdzod spu dang / de bzhin du mtshan re re dang / de bzhin du dpe byad bzang po re re dang / spu'i khung bu re re nas chos tha dad pa rgya mtsho'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar
shes so/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku thogs pa med pa mdor bstan pa yin te/ rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis brlabs kyang
bstan par mi nus so/ /'jam dpal/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba ni/ 'jam dpal/ 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi
khams rgya mtsho dag ni rdul phra rab kyi rdul yod pa dag ni rab tu nyung gi /de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho dag ni ches mang ngo / /de la
byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi khrun ni dpag tshad tsam mo/ /byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi khrun ni dpag tshad bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum cu dang / bzhi bcu'o/ /byang chub
sems dpa' kha cig gi khrun ni dpag tshad brgya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi khrun ni dpag tshad brgya phrag bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum cu dang / bzhi bcu'o/ /'khor de
nyid na byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi khrun ni dpag tshad stong ngo / /'khor de nyid na byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi khrun ni dpag tshad stong phrag bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum
cu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi khrun ni dpag tshad bye ba'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi khrun ni dpag tshad bye ba phrag bcu dang /
nyi shu dang / sum cu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi khrun ni dpag tshad bye ba phrag brgya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi khrun ni dpag tshad
bye ba phrag stong ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi khrun ni dpag tshad bye ba stong phrag bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum cu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu yod de/ de dag thams
cad kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / gling thams cad na dus gcig tu de bzhin gshegs pa nyis gyur du mthong ngo / /'jam dpal/
gal te byang chub sems dpa' rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pa gang la la zhig sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la/ 'jig rten gyi khams
lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi gom par 'dor bas steng gi phyogs logs su song ste/ gom pa re res kyang 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
mtshor song la de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi gtsug tshol zhing / de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi bskal pa rgya mtshor song yang der yang de bzhin
gshegs pa nyis gyur du mthong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong
ba mdor bstan pa yin te/ rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis brlabs kyang bstan par mi nus so/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin
gshegs pa'i sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa spyod pa'i gnas rnams ni/ 'jam dpal/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad kyi rdul
phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi /'jig rten gyi khams re re dang / gling re re dang / rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re la de bzhin gshegs pa sems can yongs su smin par
mdzed pa spyod pa'i gnas rnams ni ches mang ngo / /'jam dpal/ 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang / gling re re dang / rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re la de bzhin gshegs pa
sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa spyod pa'i gnas ji snyed pa de bas ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku las 'od zer gyi rgya mtsho 'byung zhing byang chub sems dpa'i
spyod pa rjes su sgrogs pa dag ches mang ngo / /sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la de bzhin du gtsug tor dang / mdzod spu dang / mtshan re re dang / dpe byad bzang po re re
dang / spu'i khung bu re re nas zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi 'od zer rgya mtsho dag 'byung ste/ de la 'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs
med pa rjes su sgrog go /'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni ye shes kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go /'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho grangs med
pa'i rjes su sgrog go /'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni sa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go /'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go /
'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rjes su sgrog go /'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni so so yang dag par rig pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su
sgrog go /'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni mngon par shes pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go /'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni smon lam rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rjes
su sgrog go /'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni brtson 'grus rtsom pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go /'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa rgya mtsho
grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go /'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni byang chub sems dpa' la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go /'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig
ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go /'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni sems can gyi bsam pa dang / spyod pa la 'jug pa rgya
mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go /'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni 'jig rten gyi khams la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go /'od zer rgya
mtsho kha cig ni bskal pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go /'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni dus gsum la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog
go |'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni dus gsum bstan pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go /'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa rgya mtsho grangs
med pa rjes su sgrog go /'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni ye shes tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go /thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/
nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob bo/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems can yongs su
smin par mdzad pa spyod pa'i gnas rnams mdor bstan pa yin te/ rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis brlabs kyang bstan par mi nus so/ /'jam
dpal/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa la mi 'jigs pa ni/ 'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i skad cig skad cig la
phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad na zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can rgya mtsho dag dus gcig tu rdul gcig la yongs su smin par mdzad
do| |de la sems can rgya mtsho kha cig ni bsod nams kyi tshogs tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin par mdzad do/ /sems
can rgya mtsho kha cig ni ye shes kyis tshogs tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin par mdzad do/ /sems can rgya mtsho kha cig
ni pha rol tu phyin pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin par mdzad do/ /sems can rgya mtsho kha cig ni sa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med
pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin par mdzad do/ /sems can rgya mtsho kha cig ni gzungs tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis
yongs su smin par mdzad do/ /sems can rgya mtsho kha cig ni ting nge 'dzin tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin par mdzad do/ /
sems can rgya mtsho kha cig ni rnam par thar pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin par mdzad do/ /sems can rgya mtsho kha
cig ni so so yang dag par rig pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin par mdzad do/ /sems can rgya mtsho
kha cig ni mngon par shes pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin par mdzad do/ /sems can rgya mtsho kha cig ni smon lam tha dad pa rgya
mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin par mdzad do/ /sems can rgya mtsho kha cig ni brtson 'grus rtsom pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag
bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin par mdzad do/ /sems can rgya mtsho kha cig ni dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis
yongs su smin par mdzad do/ /sems can rgya mtsho kha cig ni byang chub sems dpa' la 'jug pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su
smin par mdzad do/ /sems can rgya mtsho kha cig ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin par mdzad
do| |sems can rgya mtsho kha cig ni sems can gyi bsam pa dang / spyod pa la 'jug pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin par
mdzad do/ /sems can rgya mtsho kha cig ni 'jig rten gyi khams la 'jug pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin par mdzad do/ /sems
can rgya mtsho kha cig ni bskal pa la 'jug pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin par mdzad do/ /de bzhin du dus gsum la 'jug pa
dang | dus gsum bstan pa dang / mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dbyer med pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin par mdzad do/ /de bzhin du sems can rnam par sprul pa dang / zhing rnam
par sprul pa dang / chos rnam par sprul pa dang / lus rnam par sprul pa dang / smon lam rnam par sprul pa dang / spyod yul rnam par sprul pa dang / ye shes rnam par sprul pa dang /
mngon par shes pa rnam par sprul pa dang / rdzu 'phrul rnam par sprul pa dang / stobs rnam par sprul pas rnam par rol ba'i ye shes rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i
ye shes kyis de bzhin du skad cig skad cig la/ sems can rgya mtsho zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed dag rdul gcig la yongs su smin par mdzad do/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin
gshegs pa'i sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa la mi 'jigs pa mdor bstan pa yin te/ rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis brlabs kyang
bstan par mi nus so/ /'jam dpal/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bskal par rgya mtsho gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma
snyed du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can dag la nyin gcig bzhin lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang / de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams
sbyin pa byin pa bas/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis dge bsnyen ston pa gzhan la mi rten pa/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa gcig
la 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bslab pa la bslabs pa'o snyam du bsams nas nyin gcig zan gcig byin na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs
med par skyed do/ /'jam dpal/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du dge bsnyen ston pa gzhan la mi rten pa/
dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed dag la nyin gcig bzhin lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang / de bzhin du
lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis dge slong gcig la nyin gcig zan byin na/ 'di ni de bas
ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do/ /'jam dpal/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bskal pa rgya mtsho gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'jig rten gyi khams
thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi dge slong dag la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang / de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/ rigs kyi bu'am/
rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis dad pas rjes su 'brang ba gcig la nyin gcig zan gcig byin na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do/ /'jam dpal/
rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed du 'jig rten gyi khams rdul snyed kyi dad pas rjes
su 'brang ba dag la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang / de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan
gang zhig chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba gcig la nyin gcig zan gcig byin na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/ /'jam dpal/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu
mo gang la la zhig gis bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dag la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zhal zas ro
brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang / de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/ 'jam dpal/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu ma gzhan gang
zhig gis brgyad pa gcig la nyin gcig zan gcig byin na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do/ /'jam dpal/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang
la la zhig gis bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi brgyad pa dag la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang /
de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/ 'jam dpal/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig/ rgyun du zhugs pa gcig la nyin gcig zan gcig
byin na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/ /'jam dpal/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi rgyun du zhugs pa dag la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang / de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa
byin pa bas/ 'jam dpal/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis lan gcig phyir 'ong ba gcig la nyin gcig zan gcig byin na/ 'di ni de bas ches
bsod nams grangs med par skyed do/ /'jam dpal/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi
rdul snyed kyi lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dag la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang / de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/ 'jam dpal/ rigs
kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig gis phyir mi 'ong ba gcig la nyin gcig zan gcig byin na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do/ /'jam dpal/ rigs
kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi phyir mi 'ong ba dag la nyin gcig bzhin
du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang / de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/ 'jam dpal/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis dgra
bcom pa gcig la nyin gcig zan gcig byin na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do/ /'jam dpal/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la
zhig gis bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi dgra bcom pa dag la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin
ba dang / de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/ 'jam dpal/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis rang sangs
rgyas gcig la nyin gcig zan gcig byin na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do/ /'jam dpal/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la
la zhig gis bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi rang sangs rgyas dag la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan
pa byin pa dang / de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis sangs rgyas ri mor bris pa'am/ gzugs
su byas pa mthong na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed na/ thal mo sbyor ba 'am/ me tog gam/ bdug pa'am/ spos sam/ mar me 'bul
ba lta ci smos te/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do/ /'jam dpal/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang la la zhig gis bskal
pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya
dang ldan pa phul ba dang / de bzhin du lha'i na bza' rnams phul ba bas/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang gis tha na phyugs kyi shing rta lta bus 'gro ba'i byang
chub sems dpa' bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa gcig la sangs rgyas la bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ci'ang rung bas yongs su 'dzin te/ tha na nyin gcig zan gcig byin
na'ang 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do/ /'jam dpal/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du
rta'i shing rta lta bus 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed dag la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang / de bzhin
du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis glang po che'i shing rta lta bus 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig la sangs
rgyas la bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ci'ang rung bas yongs su 'dzin te/ tha na nyin gcig zan gcig byin na'ang 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do/ /'jam
dpal/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du glang po che'i shing rta lta bus 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'jig
rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed dag la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang / de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin
pa byin pa bas/ 'jam dpal/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis zla ba dang / nyi ma'i shing rta lta bus 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig la sangs
rgyas la bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ci'ang rung bas yongs su 'dzin te/ tha na nyin gcig zan gcig byin na'ang 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do/ /'jam
dpal/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi byu mo gang la la zhig gis bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du zla ba dang / nyi ma'i shing rta lta bus 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa'
'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed dag la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang / de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/
'jam dpal/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig la nyin gcig zan byin
na| 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do/ /'jam dpal/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gis bye ma
snyed du nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed dag la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa sbyin pa
byin pa dang / de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/ 'jam dpal/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul
gyis 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig la nyin gcig zan gcig byin na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do/ /'jam dpal/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs
kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
kyi rdul snyed dag la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang / de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/ 'jam dpal/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs
kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang / klog pa 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do/ /
bzlog ste bsti bstang ma byas pa'i mi dge ba'i las kyang de bzhin du brjod par bya'o/ /phyugs kyi shing rta lta bus 'gro ba dang / ra'i shing rta lta bus 'gro ba dang / glang po che'i shing
rta lta bus 'gro ba dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma'i shing rta lta bus 'gro ba dang / nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba'ang de bzhin te/ 'jam dpal/ rigs kyi bu'am/
rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyi
bar chad byas pa bas/ 'jam dpal/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig
la tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar chad byed cing khro ba dang / brnyas pa'i sems skyed na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams ma yin pa grangs med par
skyed do/ /'jam dpal/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi mig
phyung nas bdog pa thams cad phrogs pa bas/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis byang chub sems dpa' la brnyas pa'i sems bskyed pa gshe ba
dang | mi snyan par smra ba dang / rnyogs par byed na/ 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa mang du skyed do/ /'jam dpal/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis byang
byang chub sems dpa' la rkyen ci'ang rung bas brnyas pa skyed de spyod na/ de mi dge ba'i las des sems can dmyal ba du 'bod chen por lus dpag tshad lnga brgya par skye bar 'gyur
te| de la mgo lnga brgya yod par 'gyur ro/ /de'i mgo re re la'ang kha lnga brgya lnga brgya yod par 'gyur/ de'i kha re re la'ang lce lnga brgya lnga brgya yod par 'gyur te/ lce re re la'ang gshol
lnga brgya lnga brgyas rmo bar 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su
skyes pa'i sems can thams cad la dbyug pa dang / mtshon gyis bsnun te bdog pa thams cad phrogs pa bas/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis
byang chub sems dpa' la brnyas pa'i sems bskyed nas khro pa dang / gnod sems dang / tha ba dang / khros pa'i sems skyed na/ 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med
par skyed do/ /'jam dpal/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis sdang ba'i sems kyis sems can rnams la gnod par 'dod cing / 'jig rten gyi khams
gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang / gling re re na dgra bcom pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi srog gcad pa dang / rin po che'i mchod rten rin po che'i
stegs bus yongs su bskor cing gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i ba dan btsugs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag bshig pa bas/ 'jam
dpal/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa chen po nyid la sgro btags te brnyas pa'i sems
bskyed nas rkyen cis kyang rung / khro ba dang / gshe ba dang / mi snyan par zer ba dang / khyad du gsod par byed na/ 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med par skyed do/ /de
ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' las de bzhin gshegs pa nges par 'byung ba'i phyir te/ de ni sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi gcod pa'i phyir zhugs pa yin no/ /gang
byang chub sems dpa' la skur pa des chos spangs pa yin no/ /chos kyang gzhan la chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin te/ byang chub
sems dpa' nyid chos so/ /'jam dpal/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig khros nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems
can thams cad brtson ra mun gang dag tu bcug pa bas/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la khros te/ byang chub sems dpa' la rgyab kyis
phyogs shing 'dug nas ma rungs pa 'di mi blta'o zhes zer na/ 'di ni de las ches sdig pa grangs med par skyed do/ /'jam dpal/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu
mo gang la la zhig gis dzam+bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad kyi bdog pa thams cad phrogs pa bas/ gzhan gang zhig gis byang chub sems dpa' ji lta bu'ang rung ba
la smad na/ 'di ni de bas chos sdig pa grangs med par skyed do/ /'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ ri'i rgyal po chen po ri rab kyis/ 'di lta ste/ mtho ba dang /
yangs pa dang / che bas ri thams cad zil gyis mnon nas lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang de'o/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la
mos pas kyang / 'di lta ste/ mtho ba dang / yangs pa dang / che bas phyogs bcu dag na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la ma mos pa 'jig rten gyi khams
thams cad kyi rdul snyed yod pa dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba pha rol tu phyin pa lnga las byung ba/ bskal pa grangs med par bsags pa zil gyis mnan nas lham me/
lhan ne/ lhang nge'o/ /'jam dpal/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can thams cad
byang chub kyi sems la bkod pa bas/ 'jam dpal/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis phud po med pa'i gzhi la mos
na| 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do/ /'jam dpal/ gal te sems can thams cad phung po med pa'i gzhi la mos par gyur pa bas/
'jam dpal/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos la/ mos nas kyang yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir
'jug pa dang / klog pa dang / klog tu 'jug pa dang / tha na glegs bam du bris pa la mos nas 'dzin par byed cing mar me dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos
dang | phreng ba dang / byug pa rnams kyis mchod par byed na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do/ /'jam dpal/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu
mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa dag /nyan thos kyi theg
pa la yang dag par zhugs pa re re'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhal du med pa grangs med pa rnams dang / 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams dang /
lha'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams chud gsan pa bas/ gzhan gang zhig gis byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig chud zos par byas na/ 'di ni de bas
ches sdig pa grangs med par skyed na/ gshe ba dang / mi snyan par smra ba lta ci smos/ 'jam dpal/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis mchod rten gang+gA'i
klung gi bye ma snyed dag bshig pa dang / bsregs pa bas/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la gnod
sems dang / tha ba dang / khro ba'i sems bskyed de/ gshe ba dang mi snyan par smras na/ 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med par skyed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems
dpa' las sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams nges par byung la/ sangs rgyas las mchod rten rnams byung zhing / sangs rgyas las 'jig rten thams cad dang / lha'i ris
thams cad kyi bde ba'i yo byad thams cad byung la/ sangs rgyas kyang byang chub sems dpa' las byung bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' la bsti stang ma byas pa ni sangs
rgyas thams cad la bsti stang ma byas pa yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' la bsti stang byas pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad la bsti stang byas pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas thams
cad la mchod pa bla na med pas mchod pa byed 'dod pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mchod par bya'o/ /'jam dpal/ gal te grong
khyer la la zhig na byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya'am/ bye ba stong ngam/ bye ba brgya stong ngam/ gzhal du med pa/ grangs med pa dag yod la/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la
ma mos na de dag gi las ni rgyal pos 'khrug par 'gyur ba'am/ chus 'khrugs par 'gyur ba'i las sam/ chom rkun gyis 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i las sam/ mu ges
'khrug par 'gyur ba'i las sam/ mes 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i las sam/ kla klos 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i las su 'gyur ro/ /grong khyer chen po de na chos kyi rnam grangs
'di la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yod na de'i las ni bskal pa grangs med par mtshams med pa'i gnas su skye bar mi 'gyur/ grong khyer der 'khrug par mi 'gyur
ro| |gal te byang chub sems dpa' de dag las rgyal pos 'khrug par 'gyur ba mi 'byung / chus 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i las mi 'byung / chom rkun gyis 'khrug par
'gyur ba'i las mi 'byung / mu ges 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i las mi 'byung / mes 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i las mi 'byung / kla klos 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i las
mi 'byung / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i las bskal pa rgya mtsho grangs med par sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags
su skye bar 'gyur ba yod na der 'khrug par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i las bskal pa grangs med/ brjod du med par mtshams med par skye bar 'gyur ba dang /
de'i las bskal pa bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum cur ngan song myong bar 'gyur ba'ang tshe 'di la myong ste/ 'khrug pas byang bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bsod nams
chen po'i tshogs bsags pa'i phyir ro/ /'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgyar dpag tshad brgya pa'i rdzing yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus gang ba la dug srang
stong yang mi gdug par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chu'i phung po chen pos rab tu phye ba'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du bskal pa grangs med par sems can dmyal ba dang / dud
'gro dang / yi dwags kyi nang du gnas par 'gyur ba'i las rab tu mang ba'ang rnam par smin par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po bsags
pa'i phyir ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa dpag tu med grangs med
ba rnams dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par
bstod do/ /'phags pa dad pa'i stobs bskyed pa la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren+d+ra
bo d+hi dang / zhus chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya ni ya ta a ni ya ta ga ti mu drA a ba tA ra nA ma
ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/'phags pa nges pa dang / ma nges par 'gro ba'i phyag rgya la 'jug pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'
thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i
dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag drug cu la/ 'di lta ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / spyan ras gzigs
dbang phyug dang / mthu chen thob dang / sman gyi rgyal po dang / sman gyi yang dag 'phags dang / mchod rten mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgra skad rgyal po dang / de dag la sogs
pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag drug cu thams cad kyang rab tu zhi ba rnam par nges pa'i cho 'phrul gyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa/ za ba cing brtan pa'i tshul
rgya mtsho'i dus rlabs kyi ting nge 'dzin 'thob pa/ dbang bskur ba'i gzungs thob pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sku mdog mtha' yas pa yongs su 'grub pa'i gzungs thob pa sha stag
dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ phyag rgya gang gis byang chub
sems dpa' 'di dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma nges te/ bla na med pa'i yi shes kyi lam las phyir ldog par 'gyur ba'o/ /byang chub sems
dpa' 'di dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges te/ bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi lam las phyir mi ldog pa'o zhes bgyi bar bdag gis 'tshal bar
'gyur ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nges pa dang / ma nges par 'gro ba'i phyag rgyal 'jug pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bstan du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang /
bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'jam dpal/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'gro ba ni lnga po 'di dag yin te/
lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phyugs kyi shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu dang / glang po che'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu dang / zla ba dang / nyi mas 'gro ba lta bu
dang | nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu ste/ 'jam dpal/ lnga po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'
rnams kyi 'gro ba yin no/ /'jam dpal/ de la byang chub sems dpa' gnyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma nges pa'i 'gro ba pa yin no/ /byang
chub sems dpa' gsum ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges pa'i 'gro ba pa yin no/ /'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang
chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma nges pa'i 'gro ba pa bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi lam las slar ldog pa dag gang lags/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ byang chub sems dpa' phyugs kyi shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu dang / glang po che'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu yin te/ 'jam
dpal/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di gnyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma nges te/ bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi lam las phyir ldog pa yin
no| |'jam dpal/ byang chub sems dpa' zla ba dang / nyi mas 'gro ba lta bu pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu pa dang / byang chub sems
dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi 'gro ba lta bu pa 'di gsum ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges te/ bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi lam las
phyir mi ldog pa yin no/ /'jam dpal/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' phyugs kyi shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu pa yin par rig par bya zhe na/ 'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/ dper
na/ skyes bu la la zhig sangs rgyas kyi zhing lnga brgya'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rnams 'da' bar 'dod la/ der yang de'i bya ba dang / bya ba chen po dang /
don dang / don chen po dang / ched che ba dang / ched che rab gcig yod nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis bzhon pa ji lta bu zhig gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da'
bar bya snyam mo/ /de'ang 'di snyam du dpyod de/ ma la bdag phyugs kyi shing rta la zhon la 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar bya gor ma chag snyam ste/ 'jam dpal/ mi de
phyugs kyi shing rta la zhon te lam der zhugs nas de yun ring zhing dus ring mo zhig na dpag tshad brgyar phyin pa las/ de rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen pos de nas bzlog nas dpag
tshad brgyad cur phyir ded de phul na/ 'jam dpal/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ mi des bskal pa gcig gam/ bskal pa brgya'am/ bskal pa
stong ngam/ bskal pa bye ba phrag 'bum mam/ bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' ba'am/ 'jig rten gyi khams
gcig kyang 'da' bar nus sam/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni gnas ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ni skabs ma mchis te/ phyugs
kyi shing rta la 'tshal ba'i mi des bskal pa gcig gam/ bskal pa brgya'am/ bskal pa stong ngam/ bskal pa bye ba phrag 'bum mam/ bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang
brjod du med pas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gcig kyang 'da' bar nus pa de ni gnas ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/
de bzhin du rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed la theg pa chen po mi 'dzin mi klog par
nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams dang lhan cig gnas te/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag la snyen cing sten la bsnyen bkur byed cing de dag dang lhan cig tu 'dris par byed la
kun tu spyod cing longs spyod par byed la/ kun dga' ra ba'am/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ 'chag sar spyod yul mthun par gnas par byed/ nyan thos kyi theg pa klog cing
kha ton byed/ dpyod cing khong du chud par byed la gzhan dag kyang klog tu 'jug pa nas khong du chud pa'i bar du byed na/ de nyan thos kyi theg pa 'dzin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed
pa mngon par 'du byed pa des shes rab rtul por 'gyur te/ bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi lam las phyir 'dren cing phyir zlog go /byang chub sems dpa' de'i byang chub kyi
sems bsgoms pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyi dbang po shes rab kyi mig gang yin pa de'ang de nyan thos kyi theg pa 'dzin cing 'chang ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa mngon
par 'du byed pa des rtul por byed cing nyams par byed do/ /'jam dpal/ dper na/ mi la la zhig mig nad kyi mig zum par gyur nas/ de mig dbye ba dang mthong du
rung bar bya ba'i phyir zla ba gcig gi bar du dpyad byas te/ zla ba gcig lon nas mig 'byed cing 'dzums par byed pa las de'i dgra'am/ mi mdza' ba gzhan zhig
gis pi pi ling gi phye ma spar gang gis mig bkang nas de'ang long bar byas pa de bzhin du/ 'jam dpal/ byang chub sems dpa' de'i byang chub kyi sems bsgoms pa las
byung ba'i shes rab kyi dbang po shes rab kyi mig gang yin pa de'ang de nyan thos kyi theg pa 'dzin cing 'chang ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa
mngon par 'du byed pa des rtul por byed cing nyams par byed de/ 'jam dpal/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' phyugs kyi shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu pa yin par rig
par bya'o/ /'jam dpal/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' glang po che'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu pa yin par rig par bya zhe na/ 'jam dpal/ dper na/ mi la la
zhig 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nyid 'da' bar 'dod la/ der yang de'i bya ba dang / bya ba chen po dang / don dang / don chen po dang / ched che ba dang / ched che rab
cig yod nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi bzhon pa ji lta bu zhig gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar bya snyam mo/ /de'ang 'di snyam du dpyod de/ ma
la bdag glang po che'i shing rta yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa la zhon te 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar bya gor ma chag snyam nas/ 'jam dpal/ mi de glang po che'i
shing rta yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa la zhon te lam der zhugs nas/ de lo brgyas dpag tshad nyis stong du son pa las rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen pos de nas phyir phul
te bzlog na/ 'jam dpal/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ glang po che'i shing rta la zhon pas mi des bskal pa gcig gam/ bskal pa brgya'am/ bskal pa stong ngam/ bskal
pa bye ba phrag 'bum mam/ bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gcig kyang 'da' bar nus sam/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom
ldan 'das/ de ni gnas ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ni skabs ma mchis te/ glang po che'i shing rta 'tshal ba'i mi des bskal pa gcig gam/ bskal pa
brgya 'am/ bskal pa stong ngam/ bskal pa bye ba phrag 'bum mam/ bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gcig kyang 'da' bar
nus pa de ni gnas ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ de bzhin du rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig bla na
med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed la nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag dang lhan cig gnas te/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag la snyen cing sten la bsnyen
bkur byed cing de dag dang lhan cig tu 'dris par byed la kun spyod cing longs spyod par byed la/ kun dga' ra ba'am/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ 'chag sar spyod yul
mthun par gnas par byed/ nyan thos kyi theg pa klog cing kha ton byed/ dpyod cing khong du chud par byed la gzhan dag kyang klog tu 'jug
par byed cing kha ton byed du 'jug la yongs su spyod par byed du 'jug na de nyan thos kyi theg pa 'dzin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa mngon par 'du byed pa des shes rab
rtul por 'gyur te/ bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi lam las phyir 'dren cing phyir zlog go /byang chub sems dpa' de'i byang chub kyi sems bsgoms pa las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa
ba bskyed pa mngon par 'du byed pa'i shes rab kyi dbang po/ shes rab kyi mig gang yin pa de'ang de'i nyan thos kyi theg pa 'dzin cing 'chad pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa
mngon par 'du byed pa des rtul por byed cing nyams par byed do/ /'jam dpal/ dper na/ shing gi sdong po chen po srid du dpag tshad stong pa zhig yod la/ de'ang rgya
mtsho chen pos khyer ba las bar snang la gnas pa'i gnod sbyin dag gis de rgya mtsho chen po'i lam las phyir phul te bzlog nas/ de la lcags kyi gar bu dpag tshad lnga
stong yod pa zhig btags na/ 'jam dpal/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ shing gi sdong po chen po de rgya mtsho chen po la 'gro ba'am/ sems can bsgral ba'i phyir spyad par
nus sam/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ de bzhin du byang chub sems
dpa' de'i byang chub kyi sems bsgoms pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyi shing chen po'ang nyan thos kyi theg pa 'dzin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa mngon par 'du byed pa des/ thams
cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho las phyir phul zhing bzlog ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtshor 'gro bar yang mi 'gyur/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las kyang sems
can rnams sgrol mi nus te/ 'jam dpal/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' glang po che'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu pa yin par rig par bya'o/ /'jam dpal/ ji ltar byang chub
sems dpa' nyi ma dang zla bas 'gro ba lta bu ba yin par rig par bya zhe na/ 'jam dpal/ dper na/ mi la la 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nyid 'da' bar 'dod la/ der
yang de'i phya ba dang / bya ba chen po dang / don dang / don chen po dang / ched che ba dang / ched che rab cig yod nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu zhig
gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar bya snyam mo/ /de'ang 'di snyam du dpyod de/ ma la bdag gis nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'gro bas 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar
bya gor ma chag snyam nas/ 'jam dpal/ mi de nyi ma dang / zla ba'i 'gro bas lam der zhugs na/ 'jam dpal/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ mi des
nyi ma dang / zla ba'i 'gro bas 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar nus sam/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rdo thogs lags so/ /bde bar gshegs
pa| rgyud de'i lo dus ring mo zhig gis rdo thogs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ de bzhin du rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang
la la zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed la nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag dang lhan cig tu mi gnas te/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa bdag la mi snyen
cing mi sten la/ bsnyen bkur mi byed/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa de dag dang lhan cig tu 'dris par mi byed/ kun tu spyod cing longs spyod par mi byed/ kun dga' ra ba'am/
gtsug lag khang ngam/ 'chag sar spyod yul mthun par gnas par mi byed la/ nyan thos kyi theg pa klog par mi byed/ kha ton mi byed/ sems par mi byed la/ gzhan dag
kyang tha na tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam yang klog tu 'jug par mi byed/ kha ton byed du 'jug par mi byed de/ de gang klog pa de'ang theg pa chen po kho na klog la/ gang ston
pa de'ang theg pa chen po kho na ston na/ 'jam dpal/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' zla ba dang / nyi ma'i 'gro ba lta bu ba yin par rig par bya'o/ /'jam dpal/ dper na/ nam mkha'

lding gi dbang po'i rgyal po chen po lang tsho dang / stobs dang / mthu chen po thob pa ni 'dod na ri rab kyi rtse mo nas ri rab kyi rtse mor 'gro'o/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du zla ba dang / nyi ma'i 'gro
ba lta bu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims dang / thos pa dang / bsam pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa'i stobs dang / lang tsho dang / mthu chen po thob pa'ang 'dod na/ sangs rgyas
kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams su ston par byed do/ /'jam dpal/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos kyi rdzu
'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu pa yin par rig par bya zhe na/ 'jam dpal/ dper na/ mi la la zhig 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nyid 'da' bar 'dod la/ der yang de'i bya ba dang /
bya ba chen po dang / don dang / don chen po dang / ched che ba dang / ched che rab cig yod nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu zhig gis 'jig rten gyi khams
de dag 'da' bar bya snyam mo/ /de'ang 'di snyam du dpyod de/ ma la bdag nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar bya'o snyam na/ 'jam dpal/ 'di
ji snyam du sems/ mi des nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar nus sam/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan
'das/ rdo thogs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ de bzhin du rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig bla na med pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed la/ nyan thos kyi theg pa ba dag dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/ nyan thos kyi theg pa ba dag la mi snyan mi sten cing bsnyen bkur
mi byed la/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa de dag dang lhan cig tu 'dris par mi byed/ kun tu spyod cing longs spyod par mi byed/ kun dga' ra ba'am/ gtsug lag khang
ma| 'chag sar spyod yul mthun par gnas par mi byed la nyan thos kyi theg pa klog par mi byed/ kha ton mi byed/ dpyod cing khong du chud par mi byed la/ gzhan dag
kyang tha na tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam yang klog tu 'jug par mi byed/ kha ton byed du 'jug par mi byed de/ de gang klog pa de'ang theg pa chen po kho na klog la/ gang
ston pa de'ang theg pa chen po kho na ston cing de theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / theg pa chen po klog pa rnams dang / theg pa chen po yongs su
'dzin pa rnams la gus pa dang bcas/ zhe sa dang bcas par byed cing der gzhol/ der 'bab/ der bab la/ de dag dang lhan cig tu gnas te/ de dag la snyen cing
sten la bsnyen bkur byed/ de dag dang lhan cig tu 'dris par byed/ kun tu spyod cing longs spyod par byed/ de dag dang kun dga' ra ba'am/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ 'chag
sar spyod yul mthun par gnas par byed la/ de theg pa chen po yongs su 'tshol zhing sdud la 'chang bar byed/ mar me dang / bdug pa dang / me tog dang / spos dang / me
tog phreng dang / byug pa dag gis mchog tu gus par mchod par byed/ de theg pa chen po klog cing kha ton byed la/ dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' bas lung 'bog par byed/
ma bslabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la brnyas pa'i sems mi skyed/ bzhin 'dzum pa dang / gsong por smra la/ tshig mi brlang mi gtum mi rtsub pa dang / dga' ba dang / snyan
par smra zhing / de srog gi phyir yang theg pa chen po mi spong la de theg pa chen po la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / theg pa chen po klog pa rnams dang / theg pa
chen po yongs su 'dzin pa rnams la ci nus ci lcogs kyis snying nas lhag pa'i bsam pas yongs su 'dzin par byed cing / de su dang yang lhan cig 'gyed pa dang / rtsod par mi byed
la| de sngon ma byung ba dang / ma thos pa'i mdo sde rnams 'tshol ba'i rang bzhin can yin zhing / gang dag las thos pa de dag la ston pa la gus pa
drag po lta bu skyed par byed/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la ma bslabs pa dag la khyad du gsod par mi byed la/ nyes pa bden pa dang / mi
bden pas gzhan dag la gleng bar mi byed la/ nyes pa gzhan gyi 'khrul pa'ang mi 'tshol zhing byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms la slob pa 'di
ni| 'jam dpal/ byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu ba yin par rig par bya'o/ /'jam dpal/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin
gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu pa yin par rig par bya zhe na/ 'jam dpal/ dper na/ mi la la zhig 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nyid 'da' bar 'dod la/
der yang de'i bya ba dang / bya ba chen po dang / don dang / don chen po dang / ched che ba dang / ched che rab cig yod nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu zhig
gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag myur du 'da' bar bya snyam mo/ /de'ang 'di snyam du dpyod de/ ma la bdag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir de bzhin
gshegs pa la gsol ba gdab par gor ma chag snyam nas/ 'jam dpal/ mi de'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thad du song nas gsol ba btab ste/ bcom ldan
'das/ bdag sangs rgyas kyi zhing lnga brgya'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'da' bar 'tshal te/ der yang bdag gis bgyi ba dang / bgyi ba chen po dang / don
dang | don chen po dang / ched che ba dang / ched che rab cig mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar mdzad du gsol zhes byas la/
'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pas kyang mi de 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar mdzad na/ 'jam dpal/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig
rten gyi khams de dag myur du 'da' bar mdzad spyod dam/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ spyod lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ spyod lags so/ /
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ de bzhin du rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
bskyed la/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag dang lhan cig tu mi gnas te/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag la mi snyen mi sten cing bsnyen bkur mi byed la/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa de
dag dang lhan cig 'dris par mi byed/ kun tu spyod cing longs spyod par mi byed/ kun dga' ra ba'am/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ 'chag sar
spyod yul mthun par gnas par mi byed la/ nyan thos kyi theg pa klog par mi byed/ kha ton mi byed/ dpyod cing khong du chud par mi byed la/ gzhan dag kyang tha na tshigs
su bcad pa gcig tsam yang klog tu 'jug par mi byed/ kha ton byed du 'jug par mi byed de/ de gang klog pa de'ang theg pa chen po kho na klog /gang kha ton byed pa de'ang
theg pa chen po kho na kha ton byed/ gang ston pa de'ang theg pa chen po kho na ston cing de lus dang / ngag dang / yid yongs su dag la/ tshul khrims dang ldan zhing dge ba'i
chos can yin la gzhan dag kyang lus dang / ngag dang / yid yongs su dag pa la dgod/ tshul khrims dang / dge ba'i chos can la dgod/ theg pa chen po la zhugs
pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / theg pa chen po klog pa rnams dang / theg pa chen po yongs su 'dzin pa rnams la gus pa dang bcas/ zhes dang bcas par byed
la| der gzhol/ der 'bab/ der bab cing de dag dang lhan cig tu gnas te/ de dag la snyen cing sten la bsnyen bkur byed cing de dag dang lhan cig tu 'dris par byed/
kun tu spyod cing longs spyod par byed la/ de dag dang kun dga' ra ba'am/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ 'chag sar spyod yul mthun par gnas par byed/ de theg pa chen po yongs
su 'tshol zhing sdud la 'chang bar byed/ mar me dang / bdug pa dang / me tog dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dag gis mchog tu gus pa drag pos mchod par byed de/
theg pa chen po klog cing kha ton byed la/ gzhan dag kyang dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba chen po drag pos klog tu 'jug cing kha ton byed du 'jug/ ma bslabs pa'i byang chub sems
dpa' rnams la brnyas pa'i sems ma skyed la/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag kyang bslab pa de kho na la 'god par byed/ de bzhin du 'dzum zhing gsong por smra la/ gzhan dag
kyang bzhin 'dzum zhing gsong por smra ba la dgod/ de tshig mi brlang / mi gtum/ mi rtsub la/ gzhan dag kyang bslab pa de kho na la 'god cing / de dga' ba dang / snyan par smra la/
srog gi phyir yang theg pa chen po mi spong zhing / de theg pa chen po la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / theg pa chen po klog pa rnams dang / theg pa chen po yongs su 'dzin
rnams la gus pa drag po dang / dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba chen pos sri zhu bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas la/ gzhan dag kyang bsam pa chen po dang / lhag pa'i bsam pas
bslab pa de kho na la 'god par byed/ su dang yang lhan cig 'gyed pa dang / rtsod par mi byed/ de sngon ma byung ba dang / ma thos pa'i mdo sde rnams gus
pa drag pos don du gnyer zhing 'tshol ba dang / gang dag las thos pa de dag la ston pa la gus pa drag po lta bu skyed par byed la/ gzhan dag kyang bslab pa de kho na la 'god/ gzhan
byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la ma bslabs pa rnams la'ang rlom sems mi byed/ nyes pa bden pa dang / mi bden pas gzhan dag la gleng bar mi byed/ nyes pa gzhan gyi
'khrul pa'ang mi 'tshol/ gzhan dag kyang bslab pa de kho na la 'god par byed/ de byang chub sems dpa'i las chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed/
gzhan dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i las chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de byang chub sems dpa'i lam chud zos pa'i sems
can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i lam chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de byang
chub sems dpa'i spyod pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi
khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de byang chub sems dpa'i rgyu chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i
rgyu chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar
byed la/ gzhan dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba chud zos
pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de byang
chub sems dpa'i mngon par 'du byed pa'i spyod pa'i stobs chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par 'du
byed pa'i spyod pa'i stobs chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i gnas chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams
la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i gnas chud zod pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de byams pa dang /
snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang byams pa dang / snying rje
dang | dga' ba dang / btang snyoms chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de bgo bsha'i rang bzhin can yin la/ gzhan dag kyang bgo bsha'i
rang bzhin can la 'god par byed/ de sangs rgyas kyi chos chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos chud zos pa'i sems
can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa dang bral ba'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang dge ba'i
chos la 'dun pa dang bral ba'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de bcing bas bcings pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/
gzhan dag kyang bcing bas bcings pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de yun ring po nas na ba'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar
byed la/ gzhan dag kyang yun ring po nas na ba'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de sangs rgyas la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa chud zos pa'i sems
can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang sangs rgyas la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de mgon med pa'i
sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang mgon med pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de yun ring po nas gnyid kyis log pa'i sems
can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang yun ring po nas gnyid kyi log pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de rigs ngan du skyes pa'i
sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang rigs ngan du skyes pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de byang chub kyi sems chud
zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang byang chub kyi sems chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de byang chub
sems dpa'i spyod pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par
lta ba la 'god par byed/ de chos spyod pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang chos spyod pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la
rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag
kyang bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de theg pa chen po la mos pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi
khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang theg pa chen po la mos pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de tshul khrims kyi
sdom pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang tshul khrims kyi sdom pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la
dgod par byed/ de chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos chud zos pa'i
sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de bzod pa dang / des pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang bzod pa dang /
des pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/
gzhan dag kyang zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / legs par sdom pa dang / des
pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / legs par sdom pa dang / nges pa chud bros pa'i sems can gyi khams
la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de dran pa dang / blo gros dang / brtan pa dang / rtogs pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang dran pa
dang | blo gros dang / brtan pa dang / rtogs pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam gyi tshul la 'jug pa chud zos
pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam gyi tshul la 'jug pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god
par byed/ de sangs rgyas kyi rigs su skye ba chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi rigs su skye ba chud zos pa'i sems
can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de dge ba'i bshes gnyen chung zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang dge ba'i
bshes gnyen chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de sems can la phan par 'dod pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi
khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang sems can la phan par 'dod pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de chos la rton pa
chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang chos la rton pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de ye
shes la rton pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang ye shes la rton pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god
par byed/ de don la rton pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang don la rton pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba
la 'god par byed/ de nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde la rton pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde la rton pa chud
zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de yang dag par spong ba bzhi chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan
dag kyang yang dag par spong ba bzhi chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de bden pa'i chos dang / don dang / 'dul ba smra ba la mkhas pa yin la
gzhan dag kyang bden pa'i chos dang / don dang / 'dul ba smra ba la mkhas pa la 'god par byed/ de dbul po'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed cing gzhan dag kyang
dbul po'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad byams pas khyab par byed de/ kye ma/ sems can 'di dag ni mgon med
pa| sems can 'di dag ni skyabs med pa/ sems can 'di dag ni dpung gnyen med pa/ sems can 'di dag ni gling med pa/ sems can 'di dag ni gnas med pa/ sems can 'di
dag ni skyob pa med pa yin na/ kye ma nam zhig na bdag sems can 'di dag gi mgon du 'gyur zhig gu/ skyabs su 'gyur zhig gu/ dpung gnyen du 'gyur zhig gu/ gling du 'gyur
zhig gu/ gnas su 'gyur zhig gu/ skyob par 'gyur zhig gu snyam pa'o/ /'jam dpal/ dper na/ bya'i rgyal po nam mkha'i lding lang tsho dang / stobs dang / mthu chen po thob
pa de ni 'dod na ri rab kyi rtse mo nas ri rab kyi rtse mor 'gro'o/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' yang dge ba'i
rtsa ba'i stobs dang / mgyogs pa dang / shugs dang / rtul ba chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gang du skye bar 'dod pa der yang
skye bar 'gyur la/ ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung bar skyes pa'i sems can thams cad kyi mgon dang / skyabs dang / dpung gnyen dang / gling dang / gnas dang / skyob par
yang 'gyur ba de ni/ 'jam dpal/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu pa yin par rig par bya'o/ /'jam dpal/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs
kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zhal zas ro brgya
dang ldan pa phul zhing / lha'i na bza' dag kyang phul te de bzhin gshegs pa re re la'ang nyin gcig bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed nor bu rin po che dbang
gi rgyal pos yongs su gang bar byas nas sbyin pa byin te/ de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du phul la/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni
sems can gcig rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bzhag na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/ /'jam dpal/ gal te rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi
bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can thams cad rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod la/ rigs kyi
bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni sems can gcig lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bzhag na/ 'di ni de bas chos bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/ /'jam dpal
gal te rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can thams cad lan gcig phyir 'ong
ba'i 'bras bu la bkod la/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni sems can gcig phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bzhag na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs
med pa skyed do/ /'jam dpal/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can thams
cad phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod la/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni sems can gcig dgra bcom pa nyid la bzhag na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams
