grangs med pa skyed do/ /'jam dpal/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems
can thams cad dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod la/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni sems can gcig rang sangs rgyas nyid la bzhag
na| 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/ /'jam dpal/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams
cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can thams cad rang sangs rgyas nyid la bkod la/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni sems can gcig ra'i shing
rtas 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems la bzhag na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/ /'jam dpal/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig
gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can thams cad ra'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems la bkod la/ rigs
kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni sems can gcig glang po che'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems la bzhag na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs
med pa skyed do/ /'jam dpal/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can
thams cad glang po che'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems la bkod la/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni sems can gcig zla ba dang / nyi mas 'gro ba lta bu'i
byang chub kyi sems la bzhag na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/ /'jam dpal/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten
gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can thams cad zla ba dang / nyi mas 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems la bkod la/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan
zhig gis ni sems can gcig nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems la bzhag na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/ /'jam dpal/ rigs
kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can thams cad nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta
bu'i byang chub kyi sems la bkod la/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni sems can gcig de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems
la bzhag na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/ /'jam dpal/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams
cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can rnams la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing lha'i gos dag kyang byin te/ de ltar sbyin
pa bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin la/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni dge bsnyen dad pa can gsum la skyabs su song ba/ bslab pa'i gzhi lnga dang
ldan pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la mngon par dga' ba gcig la nyin gcig zan gcig byin na 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/ /'jam dpal/
rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi dge bsnyen dad pa can gsum la skyabs su
song ba/ bslab pa'i gzhi lnga dang ldan pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la mngon par dga' ba rnams la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing lha'i gos
dag kyang byin te/ de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin la/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gi ni gang zag brgyad pa la nyin gcig zan gcig
byin na 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/ /'jam dpal/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi gang zag brgyad pa rnams la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing lha'i gos dag kyang byin te/ de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa
gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin la/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa gcig la nyin gcig zan gcig byin na 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs
med pa skyed do/ /'jam dpal/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi rgyun du zhugs pa rnams
la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing lha'i gos dag kyang byin te/ de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin la/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo
gzhan zhig gis ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba gcig la nyin gcig zan gcig byin na 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/ /'jam dpal/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs
kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya
dang ldan pa byin zhing lha'i gos dag kyang byin te/ de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin la/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba
gcig la nyin gcig zan gcig byin na 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/ /'jam dpal/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo
gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi phyir mi 'ong ba rnams la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa
byin zhing lha'i gos dag kyang byin te/ de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin la/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni dgra bcom pa
gcig la nyin gcig zan gcig byin na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/ /'jam dpal/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis
phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi dgra bcom pa rnams la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing lha'i
gos dag kyang byin te/ de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin la/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni rang sangs rgyas gcig
la nyin gcig zan gcig byin na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/ /'jam dpal/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs
bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi rang sangs rgyas rnams la/ nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing lha'i gos dag kyang byin
te| de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin la/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni ra'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig
la nyin gcig zan gcig byin na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal/ byang chub sems dpa' gang gi tshe gang dang / gang las
brtsams te byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa de'i tshe des sems de la mi dge ba'i las ma spangs pa ci'ang med la/ des sangs rgyas kyi chos gang yang ma bzung pa med pa'i phyir te/ 'jam
dpal/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa yin no/ /'jam dpal/ dper na/ bya'i rgyal po ka la ping+ka sgo nga'i spubs na
'dug cing mig ma bye ba dag gis kyang sgra skad kyi gdangs zab cing snyan pas bya'i tshogs thams cad zil gyis gnon par byed do/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du dang po sems bskyed
pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i spubs na 'dug cing mig las dang / nyon mongs pa'i mun pa'i rab rib kyi dris yog pa'ang dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba'i sbyor ba
bsgrub pa'i sgra skad kyis nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon par byed do/ /'jam dpal/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la
zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi ra'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i
zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing lha'i gos dag kyang byin te/ de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin la/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni glang
po che'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig la nyin gcig zan gcig phyin na 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/ /'jam dpal/ rigs kyi
bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi glang po che'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
rnams la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing lha'i gos dag kyang byin te/ de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin la/ rigs kyi bu'am/
rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni zla ba dang / nyi mas 'gro ba lta bu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig la nyin gcig zan gcig byin na 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa
skyed do/ /'jam dpal/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi zla ba dang / nyi mas 'gro ba lta bu
pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing lha'i gos dag kyang byin te/ de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin la/
rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' nyin gcig zan gcig byin na 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs
med pa skyed do/ /'jam dpal/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul
gyis 'gro ba lta bu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing lha'i gos kyang byin te/ de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma
snyed du byin la/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig la nyin gcig zan gcig
byin na 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/ /'jam dpal/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas
ro brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing lha'i gos dag kyang byin te/ de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin la/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni
chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mos shing yid ches par byed na 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/ /'jam dpal/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu
mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi kha zas byed du bcug la/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po bcu'i rdul phra
rab kyi rdul snyed kyi rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi gnas dzam+bu chu bo'i gser las byas la/ nor bu rin po che glog gi sgron mas spras pa/ nor bu rin po che snang ba thams cad
brtsegs pa'i stegs bus bskor ba/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / rin po che'i chun pos mdzes par byas pa/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdan bsgreng ba/ nor
bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i dra bas bkab pa/ dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba'i bla bre bres pa/ tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying pos byugs pa/ me tog man+dA ra ba dang / man+dA ra ba chen po

dang | many+dzu Sha ka dang / many+dzu Sha ka chen po dang / sna ma'i me tog dang / klu shing gi me tog dang / ta ra ni bar na dang / go ta ra ni dang / dri mchog dang / d+ha nu ska ri dang / lha'i sna ma'i
me tog dang / ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / me tog chen po rnams bkram pa byed du bcug ste/ rang sangs rgyas de dag la lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa
byin zhing lha'i gos dag kyang byin te/ de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin la rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'am/ thams
cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ba'am/ 'jig rten gyi mgon po zhes bya ba'i sgra thos sam/ ri mor bris pa mthong ngam/ gzugs su byas pa mthong na 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs
med pa skyed par 'gyur na/ gang sor mo bcu'i thal mo sbyar ba lta ci smos te/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/ /gang mar me'am/ bdug pa'am/ me tog
gam| spos 'bul ba lta ci smos te/ tha na de'i yon tan bsngags pa gcig tsam brjod na'ang 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du skyed do/ /longs spyod chen por 'grub par
byed cing mthar gyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ dper na/ chu'i thigs pa chung du rgya mtsho chen por song ba'ang sreg pa'i bskal pa'i me ma byung
gi bar du bar mdor yongs su zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa ji ltar chung ba'ang
thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi me ma byung gi bar du bar mdor yongs su zad pa'am/ mthar thug par mi 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ dper na/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni ji
ltar chung yang / 'di lta ste/ bong dang / khyon dang / che bas skar ma'i tshogs thams cad zil gyis mnan nas lhang nger 'dug cing kun tu lhang nger 'dug go /'jam dpal/ de
bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa ji ltar chung ba'ang / 'di lta ste/ mtho ba dang / yangs pa dang / che bas dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad zil gyis mnan nas lhang
nger 'dug go/ 'jam dpal/ de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan no/ /'jam dpal/
rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byang chub sems
dpa' rnams dang / nyan thos rnams dang bcas pa la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa phul zhing lha'i na bza' dag kyang phul te/ de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa
gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin la/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mos par byed na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams tshad med
pa skyed par 'gyur na/ gang yi ger 'dri ba'am/ yi ger 'drir 'jug pa'am/ ston par byed pa lta ci smos te/ 'di ni de bas sangs rgyas kyi ye shes thob par 'gyur ba'i bsod nams
ches mang du skyed do/ /'jam dpal/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis sdang ba'i sems kyi nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa dag gi zas dang / gos bcad
la| rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni khros te sdang ba'i sems kyis theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i zan gcig phrogs sam/ zan gcig gcod du
bcug na 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med pa skyed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams
cad kyi sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab la sogs pa bskal pa bye ba grangs med pa nas yang dag par bsgrubs pa
gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni rang gi sems kyi rgyud las skyes pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams 'joms par byed par zad kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' ni tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes
pa'i sems can la kham gcig tsam yongs su btang ba'ang dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi 'chad par 'gyur bar byed pa'i phyir ro/ /'jam dpal/
nan gyis dper bya na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis khros te sdang ba'i sems kyis nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa dag gi tshul khrims kyi
phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po med par byas la/ rigs
kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni sdang ba'i sems kyis theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims tha na bslab pa gcig blangs pa tsam yang med
par byas na/ 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med pa skyed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung
po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po ni rang gi sems kyi rgyud las skyes pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams
'joms par byed par zad kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' ni tha na nyi ma gcig gi bslab pa gcig las byung ba'i tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes
rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po thams cad kyi sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad 'joms par
byed pa nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar du thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /'jam dpal/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis khros te/ gnod sems kyi sems
kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can thams cad btson rar bcug la/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni/ byang chub sems dpa' la
khros te/ gnod sems kyi sems kyis 'di dang phrad par ma gyur cig ces rgyab kyis phyogs te 'dug na/ 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs mad pa skyed do/ /'jam dpal/ rigs kyi bu'am/
rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can thams cad kyi mig phyung la/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni
khros te gnod sems kyi sems kyis byang chub sems dpa' las bltas na/ 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med pa skyed do/ /'jam dpal/ nan gyis/ dper bya na/ gal te phyogs
bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can thams cad kyi mig phyung bar gyur la/ de nas rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis byams pa'i sems
kyis mig bskyed la/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la dga' ba'i sems kyis
bltas na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/ /'jam dpal/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
thams cad kyi sems can thams cad btson rar 'dug pa las btson ra nas thar bar byas nas 'khor los bsgyur ba'i bde ba la'ang bkod la/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo
gzhan zhig gis ni theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la dga' ba'i sems kyis mthong bar 'dod cing / dga' ba'i sems kyis de'i bsngags pa brjod na/
'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/ /'jam dpal/ byang chub sems dpa' gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems
can thams cad rang sangs rgyas nyid la bkod la/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan zhig gis ni theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sangs rgyas la
bskyed pa gcig tsam 'phel bar byas na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/ /'jam dpal/ theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang la
la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can thams cad byang chub kyi sems la bkod la/ theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan
zhig gis ni theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' phung po med pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam 'don du bcug na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed
do| |'jam dpal/ nan gyis dper bya na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi rang
sangs rgyas rnams sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags rnams su skyes par byas la/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis ni byang chub sems dpa'
gcig byang chub kyi sems las mos pa bzlog na/ 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med pa skyed do/ /'jam dpal/ gal te rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis
phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can thams cad byang chub kyi sems las mos pa bzlog la/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni tha na theg
pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig theg pa chen po las mos pa bzlog na/ 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med pa skyed do/ /'jam dpal/ gal te phyogs
bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes par gyur la/ de nas
byang chub sems dpa' gang la la zhig gis sems can de dag thams cad sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas bton nas byang chub kyi sems la
bkod la/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan zhig gis ni sems can gcig theg pa chen po la mos pa la 'jug par byed na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do//
'jam dpal/ gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi rang sangs rgyas rnams rang sangs rgyas las nyams par byas la/
gcig gis ni theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig byang chub sems dpa' las nyams par byas na/ 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med pa skyed do/ /'jam
dpal/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnyed pa dang / bkur sti gcad pa'i phyir rnyed pa dang / bkur sti
la ser sna'i sems bskyed cing phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su de dag gi grags pa dang / sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pa ma yin pa bsgrags la/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi
bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig gi rnyed pa dang / bkur sti gcad pa'i phyir rnyed pa dang / bkur sti la ser sna'i sems bskyed cing
bsngags pa ma yin pa bsgrags na/ 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med pa skyed do/ /'jam dpal/ gang la la zhig gis ni dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir theg pa chen po
la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la dga' ba'i sems kyis tha na chu ra'i chu tsam byin na'ang las des de 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid du ma myong bar 'gyur na/ byang chub sems
dpa' klog pa dang / kha ton byed pa la mos pa la lta ci smos/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / nyan thos de dag dang / lha dang /
mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa nges pa dang / ma nges par 'gro ba'i phyag
rgya la 'jug pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA warma dang / su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhus chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sde la sogs
pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya d+harma mu drA nA ma mahA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa chos kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba theg
pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan
'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong lnga stong tha ma pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig
tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
bcom ldan 'das rab tu byung ba rab tu byung ba zhes bgyi na/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji tsam gyis na legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la dge slong rab tu byung ba 'phags pa
'jig rten las 'das pa'i rdzogs par bsnyen pas rdzogs par bsnyen pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams las kyang ma
'das la/ zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyang ma thob pa de tsam gyis na dge slong legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba 'phags pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
pa'i rdzogs par bsnyen pas rdzogs par bsnyen pa yin te/ de ltar rab tu byung ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni yang dag par rab tu byung ba yin gyi/ de lta ma yin par rab tu byung ba gang
dag yin pa de dag ni log par rab tu byung ba yin no/ /shA ri'i bu/ dge slong de lta bus ni dad pas byin pa longs spyod par 'os te/ gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / stan dang /
na ba'i gsos sman dang / sman zong rnams longs spyad par 'os so/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang brtson pa mi gtong ba'i dge slong gang yin pa de ni gzugs gtong bar mi byed/ tshor ba
dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa gtong bar mi byed de/ de tsam gyi ni dge slong legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba 'phags pa
'jig rten las 'das pa'i rdzogs par bsnyen pas rdzogs par bsnyen pa yin te/ de ltar rab tu byung ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni yang dag par rab tu byung ba yin gyi/ de lta ma yin
par rab tu byung ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni log par rab tu byung ba yin no/ /shA ri'i bu/ dge slong de lta bus ni dad pas byin pa longs spyad par 'os te/ gos dang zas dang /
mal cha dang / stan dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / sman zong rnams longs spyad par 'os so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces
smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ci la dgongs te/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams las kyang ma 'das la/ zag pa med pa'i
chos rnams kyang ma thob pa de tsam gyis na dge slong legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba 'phags pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rdzogs par bsnyen pas rdzogs
par bsnyen pa yin te/ de ltar rab tu byung ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni yang dag par rab tu byung ba yin gyi/ de lta ma yin par rab tu byung ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni log par
rab tu byung ba yin no/ /shA ri'i bu/ dge slong de lta bus ni dad pas byin pa longs spyad par 'os te/ gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang /
sman zong rnams longs spyod par 'os so zhes de skad bka' stsal/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams ni sgyu ma lta bu ste/ de dag ni
'da' bar bya bar mi nus so/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams ni yongs su ma grub pa ste/ de dag ni 'da' bar bya bar sla ba ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab
'byor/ sems can gyi khams ni nang na'ang mi dmigs/ phyi rol na'ang mi dmigs/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs te/ sems can gyi khams kyi rang bzhin gang
yin pa dang / so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de dag ni 'da' bar bya bar sla ba ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'di skad du/ so so'i skye
bo'i chos rnams las kyang ma 'das la/ zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyang ma thob pa de tsam gyis na/ dge slong legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba 'phags pa'i
'jig rten las 'das pa'i rdzogs par bsnyen pas rdzogs par bsnyen pa yin te/ de ltar rab tu byung ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni yang dag par rab tu byung ba yin gyi/ de lta ma yin
par rab tu byung ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni log par rab tu byung ba yin no/ /shA ri'i bu/ dge slong de lta bu ni dad pas byin pa longs spyod par 'os te/ gos dang / zas dang / mal
cha dang / stan dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / sman zong rnams longs spyod par 'os so zhes gang gsungs pa de'ang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ gang dag gi rten nam/ gnas med pa de
dag ni ji ltar thob par rung / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ gal te zag pa med pa'i chos rnams thob tu rung na ni dmigs pa las dgra bcom pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid ni ltos pa med pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de la dgongs nas/ 'di skad du/ so so'i
skye bo'i chos rnams las kyang ma 'das la/ zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyang ma thob pa de tsam gyis na dge slong legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul
ba la rab tu byung ba 'phags pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rdzogs par bsnyen pas rdzogs par bsnyen pa yin te/ de ltar rab tu byung ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni yang dag par
rab tu byung ba yin gyi/ de ltar ma yin pa rab tu byung ba gang yin pa de dag ni log par rab tu byung ba yin no/ /shA ri'i bu/ dge slong de lta bus ni dad pas byin pa la longs
spyad par 'os te/ gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / sman zong rnams longs spyod par 'os so zhes bka' stsal to/ /de nas tshe
dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis yang tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ci la dgongs te brtson pa mi gtong ba'i
dge slong gang yin pa de ni gzugs gtong bar mi byed/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa gtong bar mi byed de/ de tsam gyis na dge slong
legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba las rab tu byung ba 'phags pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rdzogs par bsnyen pas rdzogs par bsnyen pa yin te/ de ltar rab tu byung ba
gang dag yin pa de dag ni yang dag par rab tu byung ba yin gyi/ de lta ma yin par rab tu byung ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni log par rab tu byung ba yin no/ /shA ri'i bu/ dge slong de lta
bus ni dad pas byin pa longs spyod par 'os te/ gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / sman zong rnams longs spyod par 'os so zhes de skad
bka' stsal/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chos nyid las dgongs nas/ 'di skad du/ brtson pa mi gtong ba'i dge slong gang yin pa de ni
gzugs gtong bar mi byed/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa gtong bar mi byed ces bka' stsal to/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ chos kyi
dbyings na ni nang na'ang mi dmigs/ phyi rol na'ang mi dmigs/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/ /nang gdags pa ni gdags su med pa dang / skye ba med pa'i gdags
pa'o| |de ltar na sems can gyi khams mnyam pa nyid kyis chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid do/ /chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid kyis sems can gyi khams mnyam pa nyid do/ /de ltar
na sems can gyi khams dang chos kyi dbyings 'di ni gnyis su med de gnyis su dbyer med do/ /gang la gnyis su med pa de gnyis su dbyer med pa de la ni gsal ba'ang med/ gzhag
pa'ang med do/ /gang la gsal ba'ang med/ gzhag pa'ang med pa de ni 'das pa'am/ 'thob par byar mi nus te/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ bcom ldan
'das kyis de la dgongs nas/ 'di skad du/ brtson pa mi gtong ba'i dge slong gang yin pa de ni gzugs gtong bar mi byed/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam
par shes pa gtong bar mi byed de/ de tsam gyis na dge slong legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba 'phags pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rdzogs par bsnyen
pas rdzogs par bsnyen pa yin te/ de ltar rab tu byung ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni yang dag par rab tu byung ba yin gyi/ de lta ma yin par rab tu byung ba gang dag yin pa de dag
ni log par rab tu byung ba yin no/ /shA ri'i bu/ dge slong de lta bus ni dad pas byin pa longs spyad par 'os te/ gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / na ba'i
gsos sman dang / sman zong rnams longs spyad par 'os so zhes bka' stsal to/ /dogs pa med pa'i dge slong ni dogs pa khas mi len to/ /yi ge med cing yi ge las 'das
pa'i dge slong gang yin pa de ni bgrang ba las bstan par mi nus la de la ni 'ong ba'ang med/ 'gro ba'ang med/ 'greng ba'ang med/ 'dug pa'ang med/ nyal ba'ang med do/ /
rtog pa can ma yin pa'i dge slong ni brtags pa la longs spyod pa'o/ /rtog pa can gyi dge slong ni ma brtags pa la longs spyod pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de
la dgongs nas de tsam gyis na dge slong legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba 'phags pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rdzogs par bsnyen pas rdzogs par bsnyen pa
yin te/ de ltar rab tu byung ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni yang dag par rab tu byung ba yin gyi/ de lta ma yin par rab tu byung ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni log par rab tu byung ba yin no//
shA ri'i bu/ dge slong de lta bus ni dad pas byin pa longs spyad par 'os te/ gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / sman zong rnams longs
spyad par 'os so zhes bka' stsal to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ shA ri'i bu/ legs so/ /legs so/ /khyod kyis ji
skad bstan pa bzhin du ngas de las dgongs nas bstan pa yin te/ 'di ni legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba yin no/ /shA ri'i bu/ phyag rgya 'dris mngon
pa'i nga rgyal can brtag par 'dod pas ni phyag rgya de'i mdun du brjod par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ shin tu brtag pa ni phyag rgya 'dis ni mngon pa'i nga rgyal can mang po brtag par nus
so| |chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa na dge slong bdun brgya len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /srid pa tha ma pa'i dge
slong brgya ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la ma zhugs shing ma rtogs la ma mos nas stan las langs te dong ngo / /dge slong lnga ni spong bar byas shing bzlog par byas nas rang gi
lus dang bcas te sems can dmyal ba chen por lhung ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ ngas kye ma chos 'di ni 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun
no snyam ste/ de la dgongs nas de skad bstan mod kyi 'on kyang gang dang yang mi mthun pa med de/ shA ri'i bu/ dper na/ mi la la zhig gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam du
skye bo phal po che'i mdun du khyod la ngas chos bshad par bya'o/ /chos de'ang 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun no zhes tshig tu smra na/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du
sems/ chos de dang mi mthun pa gang dag yin pa'i mi de dag yod pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin du nga'ang kye ma chos 'di ni 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun no zhes de skad du'ang ston la de 'jig rten de'ang yang dag par ma
mthong ngo / /'jig rten med pa la ni chos kyang bgrang du med do/ /'jig rten gdags pa'ang med do/ /shA ri'i bu/ 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa zhes bya ba ni chos rnams ma
'dres shing chos rnams 'dre pa med pa la bya bar gsungs so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ma 'dres pa zhes bgyi ba'i tshig gi don gang lags/ bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i
bu| ma 'dres pa zhes bya ba ni chos rnams ro gcig par gdags pa yin te/ gcig pu kho na'ang ma yin te/ tha dad pa kho na'ang ma yin no/ /shA ri'i bu/ ma 'dres pa zhes bya ba de
ni stong pa nyid kyi tshig bla dwags so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba'i tshig gi don gang lags/ bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ stong pa nyid ces bya ba
ni gdags su med pa'o/ /gang gdags su med pa de ni gdags par mi nus so/ /gang gdags par mi nus pa de ni 'jig rten pa'ang ma yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'ang ma yin
no| |shA ri'i bu/ gang 'jig rten pa'ang ma yin 'jig rten las 'das pa'ang ma yin pa de ni stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang
ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas
pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa chos kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs
so|| ||lo tsA ba ban+de klu'i dbang po dang / lha'i zla bas bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya pra dI pa dA nI yaM nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/
bod skad du/ 'phags pa mar me 'bul ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i
dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA
ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ dpag tu med pa bzhi po 'di dag ni legs par yongs su sbyangs pa'i chos rnams dang ldan pa/ rnam par smin pa dpag tu med pa/ snang ba
dpag tu med pa/ bsod nams la yang dag par gzhol ba dpag tu med pa/ gzugs dpag tu med pa/ bde ba la yang dag par gzhol ba dpag tu med pa dag ste/ de dag ni
tshul khrims la 'jug pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la 'jug pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa la
'jug pa dang / len pa med par zag pa zad par 'gyur ba dag go /bzhi gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brnyes pas bsam gtan par gyur ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brnyes pas shes rab dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa/ shes rab yangs pa dang ldan pa/
nges par 'byed pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa/ ji lta ba bzhin gyi shes rab dang ldan pa/ grangs med pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa/ rnam par nges pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa/ rnam par nges pa
gzigs pa/ mchog tu rnam par grol zhing shin tu rnam par grol ba'i thugs dang ldan pa/ g.yo ba med pa'i thugs dang ldan pa/ 'khrug pa med pa'i thugs dang ldan pa/ 'phrin las
legs par mdzad pa'i thugs dang ldan pa dang / shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs pa/ dge
ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa/ spyod pa phun sum tshogs pa/ yid la mdzad pa dang ma bral ba/ bden pa ston pa/ bden pa gzigs pa/ snang bar gyur pa/ dpag tu med pa/ tshogs
dpag tu med pa/ zil gyis gnon pa/ zil gyis mi gnon pa'i tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs
pa'i stobs bskyed pa brnyes pa/ stobs bcu'i stobs bskyed pa brnyes pa/ mi 'jigs pa'i stobs bskyed pa brnyes pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi
stobs bskyed pa brnyes pa/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po'i stobs bskyed pa brnyes pa/ so so yang dag par rig pa'i stobs bskyed pa brnyes pa/ sngon gyi bsam pa phun
sum tshogs pa/ sngon yongs su sbyong ba mdzad pa/ shes rab rin po che dang ldan pa/ brtson pa ma bor ba/ brtson 'grus dpag tu med pa/ mya ngan dang / gnod pa dang bral ba/
yongs su 'dzin pa mi mnga' ba/ thams cad gzigs pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa/ glang po chen po/ dpag tu med pa/ phung po mi mnga' ba/ bsod nams kyi zhing bla na med
pa dang / shA ri'i bu/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar dge ba'i rtsa ba yang
dag par bsgrubs pa/ rig pa gsum dang ldan pa/ bsod nams kyi zhing gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen
nam| dge bsnyen ma sems dang ba/ bsod nams don du gnyer ba/ bsod nams la dmigs pa/ bsod nams yo byad du byed pa/ bsod nams 'dod pa/ rnal
'byor dang mthun pa'i rjes su dran pa yid la byed pa/ sngon gyi sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pas tha na mar me'i snying po chung du'am/ ngan pa zhig 'bru mar gyis bskus sam/ mar gyis
bskus te 'bul lam/ nges par 'bul lam/ yongs su 'bul lam/ 'jog par byed pa dang / dge ba don du gnyer bas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das phyi ma'i mtha'i skye ba'i 'khor ba spangs pa/ da ltar byung ba na tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba
dang | rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pas bzung ba nyid yid la byed dam/ de las yon tan gang yang rung ba zhig yid la byed dam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyir dang /
gzhi de las de bzhin gshegs pa yid la byed cing / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid kyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod
pa bya bar sems bskyed de/ mar me 'di 'bar bar bya/ rab tu 'bar bar bya/ dbul bar bya/ yongs su dbul bar bya/ rab tu gzhag par bya'o snyam pa'am/ sems
kyi rgyud dang bar gyur bas tshul khrims yongs su dag pa/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa/ bsod nams mang po mnga' ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la bsnyen bkur byed de de tsam mam/ cung
zad tsam mam/ chung du zhig gam/ ngan ngon tsam zhig gam/ gsog tsam zhig gam/ tha na glog gi rgyun tsam zhig kyang snang bar byed dam/ tha na them skas kyi gzhi gcig
snang bar byed na'ang / shA ri'i bu/ de'i rnam par smin pa ni nyan thos rnams kyis sam/ rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan par mi nus so/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang / lan la
ni mi re zhing dad pa dang / dga' ba dang / dang bas yongs su btang ba'i rnam par smin pa bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pas ston par spyad do/ /
shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang / dad pa dang ldan la gus par gnas shing g.yo med la sgyu med pa sangs rgyas kyi yon tan la nges par sems pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu
mo dge ba'i bsam pa skyes nas mar me cung zad tsam mam/ chung du tsam zhig kyang snang bar byas te mar me snang bar byas pa gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod
rten de tha na them skas tsam snang ngam/ bskor sa tsam snang ngam/ smad dam/ gdugs sam/ thams cad snang ngam/ tha na bar skabs gang yang rung ba zhig snang ba'i
mar me de mod la myur du shi ste rlung gi skyod pas sam/ char pas sam/ mar zad pas sam/ snying po zad pas shi la/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na klus dkrugs pa na sprin
stug po'i dra ba 'khrigs pa las nam mkha' las glog byung nas nub na/ shA ri'i bu/ myur du 'byung ba'i rjes su 'brang ba de mthong bas sems can rnams kyi mig thibs zhes byed pa
de tsam du/ shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mar me 'bul ba'i dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ de las gzhan pa
sems can bslab pa'i gzhi ma blangs pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba don du gnyer ba/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la mngon par dad pa/ bdag nyid bskyab par bya ba la
gnas pa/ bsod nams 'dod pa rnams kyis ji tsam du chung ba'i mar me phul ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam du dpag tu med pa yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba'i rnam par smin
pa ni de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen to/ /shA ri'i bu/ mar me 'bul ba cung zad cig phul ba'i mar me phul ba las mngon par grub pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de rnam
par smin pa ni/ shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma gtogs par lha dang bcas/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig
rten dang / dge sbyong dang / bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgus bstan par mi nus so/ /shA ri'i bu/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yul ni bsam gyis mi
khyab ste/ shA ri'i bu/ mar me 'bul ba yongs su phul ba des bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam du dpag tu med grangs med pa yongs su bzung bar gyur pa'i don de ni de bzhin gshegs
pas mkhyen te/ shA ri'i bu/ mar me de tsam du chung du phul ba'i rnam par smin pa'ang dpag tu med na/ gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i de bzhin
gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mchod pa khyad par can byed dam/ byed du 'jug ste/ spos sam/ me tog phreng ngam/ gdugs sam/ ba dan rnams sam/ gang yang rung ba'i mar
me'i phreng ba rnam pa mang pos mchod pa khyad par can byed dam/ byed du 'jug pa lta ci smos kyang ci dgos/ shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang / chos 'di bzhi ni dad pas rtogs par bya ba yin te/
bzhi gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni dpag tu med do snyam du dad pas rtogs par bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba ji ltar chung du'i rnam par smin pa'ang dpag tu med par 'gyur ba
dad pas rtogs par bya ba dang / dkon mchog gsum la dad pa'i las mngon par 'du byed pa'i rnam par smin pa gang yin pa de ston pa mthong ba/ nyan thos khyed kyis kyang rnam pa
thams cad du bsam pa'am/ yongs su bsam par mi nus na/ 'phags pa'i rigs la mi gnas pa gzhan rnams kyis las kyi rnam par smin pa mngon sum du shes pa'am/ khong du chud
par nus pa lta ci smos te de ni gnas med do/ /gzhan du na/ de ni dad pas rtogs par bya ba yin pa dang / shA ri'i bu/ nyan thos rnams kyis sems can thams cad kyi las kyi rnam par smin
pa bsam pa'am/ shes par mi nus te/ shA ri'i bu/ khyed rnams gnas 'di la bsam pa dang bral bar gyis shig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ sems can rnams kyi las/
kyi rnam par smin pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo zhes de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo zhes gsungs so/ /shA ri'i bu/ ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid do zhes ston par 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ sems
can gyi bsam pa dang / sems dang / lhag mthong yang bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ dad pas rtogs par bya ba yin no/ /shA ri'i bu/ 'phags pa'i rigs la gnas pa khyed cag
nyid kyang sems can thams cad kyi shes pa de la mig dang / mkhas pa la shes pa mi 'jug na/ sems ma dul ba tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes
rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dang bral ba/ brjed ngas pa/ ma rig pa'i mun pas mig bsgribs pa gzhan gang dag bdag ci zhig /bdag
su zhig /bdag ci 'dra ba zhig /bdag gang nas/ bdag ci tsam zhig /bdag ji lta bu zhig /bdag ldan pa'i ngang tshul can nam/ bdag mi ldan pa'i ngang tshul can nam/ bdag
brjed ngas pa'am/ bdag dran pa nye bar gnas pa'am/ bdag mkhas pa'i las byed pa'am/ bdag byis pa'i las byed pa'am/ bdag gang nas 'ongs/ bdag gang du 'gro
zhes rang gi chos la shes pa 'jug pa'ang med pa rnams lta ci smos/ shA ri'i bu/ byis pa so so'i skye bo ni bdag la shes pa 'jug pa'ang med na phyin ci log gi lta ba can de las
kyi rnam par smin pa shes par lta ga la 'gyur te de ni gnas med do/ /shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni tshul khrims dang bral ba ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin dang bral ba ma yin/
shes rab dang bral ba ma yin/ rnam par grol ba dang bral ba ma yin/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dang bral ba ma yin/ rig pa dang bral ba ma yin no/ /shA ri'i bu
de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni tshul khrims dpag tu med pa'o/ /tshul khrims chags pa med pa'o/ /tshul khrims bsam gyis mi
khyab pa'o/ /tshul khrims gzhal du med pa'o/ /tshul khrims rdzogs pa'o/ /tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'o/ /de la las dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa yang dag pa ji lta ba
bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /shA ri'i bu/ ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa las dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/ shA ri'i bu/
'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ sems can 'di ni dge ba'i chos rnams yongs su zad cing mi dge ba'i chos rnams kyis gang ba'o/ /sems
can 'di ni dge ba'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'gyur zhing mi dge ba'i chos rnams 'gag par 'gyur ba'o/ /sems can 'di ni mi dge ba'i chos rnams skye bar 'gyur zhing
dge ba'i chos rnams 'gag par 'gyur ba'o zhes/ shA ri'i bu/ 'jug pa 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa sems can de dang / de dag gi las dang / las kyi rnam par
smin pa sna tshogs rjes su 'jug pa rab tu mkhyen to/ /shA ri'i bu/ de la sems can rnams mun pa yod cing mkhas pa med de mkhyen pa de lta bu dang ldan pa/ mkhas
pa de lta bu dang ldan pa des sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa lung ston to/ /shA ri'i bu/ de la
gang dag dad pa de dag ni yid ches par 'gyur la gang dag ma dad cing bstan pa 'di las nyams pa de dag ni smad par 'gyur zhing rtsod par 'gyur te/ de ni de dag la
yun ring por mi phan pa dang / don med pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / log par ltung bar 'gyur ba'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ de la sems can gang de bzhin gshegs
pa'i mchod rten la mar me 'bul ba des mar me 'bul ba yongs su phul ba dang / nges par phul ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i las mngon par 'dus
byas pa dang / rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu bde ba 'dod pa dang / dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang ldan pa dang / dad pas yongs su phul ba bsags pas
tshe 'di nyid la sems kyi nges par sems pa gsum 'thob ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la mchod pa byas te/ lus thob pa snying po dang / snying po ma yin pa'i lus shes par byas la snying po sbyin par bya'o snyam
nas longs spyod rnams la nyes dmigs can du shes te/ snying po med pa'i longs spyod rnams la snying po sbyin par byed pa 'di ni/ shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
mchod rten la mchod pa byas pa'i sems kyi nges par sems pa dang po'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang / de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis bsod nams kyi zhing bla na
med pa'i yon gnas kyi sbyin pa mchog len pa bo la mchod pa byas pas bdag la sems can dmyal ba'i 'jigs pa'am/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi 'jigs pa'am/
gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi 'jigs pa med do/ /bdag gi 'gro ba bde ba ni lnga ste/ mtho ris 'thob pa'am/ mi 'thob pa'am/ gzugs 'thob pa'am/ longs spyod 'thob
pa'am/ byang chub 'thob bo snyam pa de ni/ shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mchod pa bya ba'i sems kyi nges par sems pa 'thob pa gnyis pa'o/ /shA ri'i
bu| gzhan yang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mar me 'bul ba yongs su phul ba la yang dag par gnas pa yin te/ gal te bdag gis sbyin pa byin no/ /bdag gis
bsod nams dag kyang byas so/ /bdag gis ser sna spangs so snyam du shes shing de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag ni sbyin pa po yin la bdag gis kyang sbyin pa byin no snyam du de
ltar sems shing gtong ba la yongs su gdung ba med/ brnyes pa med de/ shA ri'i bu/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mchod pa byas
pa'i sems kyi nges par sems pa 'thob pa gsum pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mar me 'bul ba phul bas
'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe snang ba gsum thob ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ dge legs byas pa sa bon du 'gyur te dran pa 'thob cing dge ba rnams brjod par mi 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bu/
'di ltar 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa rnams rjes su dran pa 'di ni snang ba dang po'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang / de bzhin gshegs
pa'i mchod rten la mchod pa byas pa'i sems can de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe dran par 'gyur te/ bdag gis sangs rgyas la mchod pa byas so zhes mchog tu dga' ba 'thob ste/
shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang bcas pa'i sems bskyed pa 'di ni snang ba gnyis pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang / sems can de 'chi ba'i dus kyi
tshe sems can gzhan sbyin pa gtong ba mthong na de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis mar me 'bul ba phul lo/ /phyis kyang sbyin pa byin no snyam du de stong pa'i sems
skyes shing sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba rnams kyis mi 'phrogs la de la chos rjes su dran pa de lta bu 'byung ste/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta bu bzhin du yid la byed pa 'di ni snang
ba thob pa gsum pa yin no/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang / rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mar me dbul ba phul ba de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe snang ba
bzhi 'thob ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ mdun na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'char ba mthong ba dang / mdun na zla ba nya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'char ba mthong ba dang / lha'i 'khor gnas pa mthong
ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs shing byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa mthong ste/ de
la bdag nyid gus par byed pa la gnas shing thal mo sbyar bar byas par mthong ba ste/ shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mar me dbul ba phul bas 'chi ba'i tshe
snang ba 'di bzhi 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad bka' stsal te/ bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas de bzhin du ston pas/ gzhan yang / 'di skad
ces bka' stsal to/ /mtha' yas chos bdag drang srong chen po yi/ /mchod rten rnams la mkhas pa gang zhig gis/ /mar me phul ba byas pa'i las de yis/ /bde dang don dang
rnyed pa mtha' yas 'thob/ /de ni 'chi khar dran pa nyams mi 'gyur/ /mar me phul ba'ang bdag nyid mthong bar 'gyur/ /zang zing med pa'i dga'
ba bzhi yang 'thob/ /'chi ba'i dus tshe rmongs pa med par 'gyur/ /kun nas snang ba dag kyang der gyes te/ /nyi ma dang ni zla ba'ang mthong bar 'gyur/ /bye ba khrag khrig lha rnams
des mthong 'gyur/ /rmongs pa med par sangs rgyas chos kyang smra/ /de la pha ma bu dang rtsa lag dang / /'khor rnams kun gyis bskor nas du na yang / /de rnams la ni mngon
du de mi phyogs/ /de tshe nam yang dran pa nyams mi 'gyur/ /de yi mdun na gzhal med khang mchog mthong / /'jigs med lha yi bu mo rnams kyang mthong / /skyed mos
tshal bzhi shin tu brgyan sdug cing / /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ldan mthong bar 'gyur/ /thub pa'i skyes mchog rnams la mchod byas pas/ /des ni byang chub snying por
bde gshegs dang / /des ni bdag kyang thal mo sbyar byas shing / /lha klu lha mi rnams kyis mdun bdar mthong / /gus dang bcas pas 'jig rten 'dren pa mthong / /
de der phyin te bde bar gshegs mthong nas/ /dga' bas de tshe spyan yang 'dren par byed/ /de yis gdugs tshod sbyar ba gnas par mdzad/ /so so rnyed pa'i bde bas
chim gyur nas/ /'chi dus byas tshe sdug bsngal des mi myong / /byang chub dam pa mchog la sems kyang dga'/ /de la 'chi ba'i 'jigs chen 'byung mi 'gyur/ /mar me phul ba'i
rnam smin 'di yin te/ /'chi dus byed tshe dran pa nyams mi 'gyur/ /de la phyogs rnams snang bar gyur bar 'gyur/ /sngon chad ma mthong gzugs bzang rnams kyang mthong / /de
ni shi nas mtho ris nges 'gro zhing / /lha yi stan la de lus 'dug par shes/ /rgyal ba la ni mchod pa byed pa'i tshe/ /des ni kun nas lha mo rnams kyang mthong / /shA ri'i bu/
gzhan yang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mar med dbul ba phul bas sum cu rtsa gsum du skyes nas/ lha'i bu de rnam pa lnga yongs su dag pa dang ldan par 'gyur
ro| |shA ri'i bu/ lha'i bu de rnam pa lnga yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa ji lta bu zhe na/ de'i lus yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang / de lha'i mthu rgya chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ba
dang / de'i dran pa dang / shes rab yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang / de'i rna bar sgra snyan pa thos par 'gyur ba dang / de'i 'khor yid bde ba mang ba dang ldan par 'gyur ba'o/ /
bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/ bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas de bzhin du ston pas/ gzhan yang / 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /drang srong mchod
rten mar me phul bas ni/ /de yi lus ni rab tu 'od gsal zhing / /gzhan gyis mi tshugs dpal dang ldan pa dang / /lha stong gi ni gtso bor de 'gyur
ro| |lha yi sgra dbyangs snyan cing yid 'ong thos/ /ji ltar lha gzhan de bzhin 'di yang mchog /dran dang blo mchog dang ni ldan pa dang / /'khor mchog phun sum tshogs pa'ang
'thob par 'gyur/ /gang du lha bu de ni 'gro ba der/ /de 'gro ba na lha kun 'dong bar byed/ /gang gis de lus 'di ltar 'od 'bar ba/ /sngon gyi las kyi 'bras bu de 'dra'o/ /skyed
mos tshal gyi gzhin shing gi ming / /zla mchog ces bya gzhal med khang gis brgyan/ /zla ba ji ltar kun nas gsal ba ltar/ /de yi shing rnams de bzhin gsal ba yin/ /
mar me rab 'bar ji bzhin rnam gsal la/ /yid 'ong dri ngad phyogs rnams gtong byed la/ /me tog gsal ba 'di ni ming ci zhes/ /lha rnams ngo mtshar stong snyed 'dzin par
'gyur/ /de yi 'khor tshogs me tog de dag gis/ /brgyan pa byas pas de dag mdzes par 'gyur/ /bye ba khrag khrig lha yi nang na de/ /nyi ma shar bzhin du rnam par
mdzes/ /shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mar me dbul ba phul bas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i nang du skyes nas/ lha'i bu de dag yun ji srid cig na
'chi 'pho ba'i chos su 'gyur ba bdag nyid kyis shes te/ lha'i bu des 'chi ba na rang gi 'khor dang / lha'i bu gzhan dag kyang chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par dga' bar byas/
yang dag par 'dzin du bcug nas gnas de nas shi 'phos te/ shi 'phos nas kyang log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur te/ mi'i 'jig rten du skyes na'ang rigs mchog tu
btsun pa/ dad pa dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang ldan par skye bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te sangs rgyas mi 'byung ba zhig la bab na'ang de sdig pa'i lta ba can ma yin zhing ya
mtshan du 'dzin pa dang bral ba'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/ bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas/ de bzhin du
ston pas/ gzhan yang / 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lha yi srid par bdag ni yun ring du/ /gnas par 'gyur zhes de yi shes 'di 'jug /lha gtso de yis de yang rab tu shes/ /
gang tshe 'chi ba'i dus ni 'bab 'gyur ba/ /de tshe mtshan ma lnga dag 'byung 'gyur te/ /bye ba phrag mang lha dag der 'du zhing / /de dag mngon sum du ni chos kyang ston/ /bdag ni 'di
nas ring por mi thogs 'chi/ /srid pa thams cad mi rtag bde ba med/ /gzhan dag 'chi zhing gzhan dag skye bar 'gyur/ /kye ma bdag ni 'chi bar 'gyur ro zhes/ /de ni dbus
'dug shin tu mi bzad smra/ /de yi mngag gzhug rnams kyang de bzhin du/ /lha gzhan du ma sdug bsngal nyam thag go /de ni bdag gi ltas ni lnga mthong
nas| |de ni rang gi stan la dga' mi 'thob/ /gnas de nas ni langs te 'gro bar byed/ /gzhal med khang gi gnas su'ang dga' mi skye/ /bdag cag 'di mthong tha ma 'di
yin zhes/ /de bzhin lha mang du ma mya ngan byed/ /de yi stan mchog dam pa gang yin pa/ /de ni lha yi bu mos blangs te 'bul/ /stan de mthong nas de ni rang stan la/ /dga'
ba thob par ma gyur de nas shi/ /lha yi dbang po lha gnas shi 'phos nas/ /mi yi 'jig rten du ni mngon par 'gro /de yi rang la yod pa'i dran mi nyams/ /der yang bde bar 'gyur
gyi sdug bsngal min/ /skyes nas tshe rabs rab tu dran gyur te/ /skyes ma thag tu sngon gyi srid pa shes/ /nyon mongs rnams kyis bdag la gnod 'gyur zhes/ /shin tu sdug
bsngal der yang dga' ba med/ /lha yi 'jig rten thob pa'i dpal dran nas/ /mi yi 'jig rten la ni bde mi rnyed/ /mtho ris sdug bsngal mi yul smos ci dgos/ /srid pa
thams cad snying po med cing g.yo/ /gang dang gang tshe lus stobs nyams gyur pa/ /de tshe de ni rab tu 'byung bar nges/ /'di yang de yi rnam smin 'gyur ba ste/ /rnam rtog spyod
par nam yang mi 'gyur ro/ /de ni de yi mar me phul ba'i 'bras/ /de dang der ni tshe rabs des dran 'gyur/ /bya ba'i 'od min las ni de mi spyod/ /gdon mi za bar de ni khyim nas 'byung /
long bar mi 'gyur zha bor mi 'gyur zhing / /de yi mig ni med par 'gyur ma yin/ /nad can ma yin 'jigs rung sgra ldan min/ /blun por mi 'gyur mi shes mi 'gyur ro/ /mig med
par ni nam yang mi 'gyur zhing / /de yi mig ni na bar 'gyur ma yin/ /mig gcig ma yin khog long mig ma yin/ /de yi mig la mi gsal med par 'gyur/ /mig ni ring zhing
dkar gnag rnam par gsal/ /srid par de yi mig ni dag par 'gyur/ /nor bu 'od bzang ltar ni don zhib rtogs/ /bskal pa grangs med dag tu nam yang de'i/ /sha yi mig ni
yongs su nyams mi 'gyur/ /de la mig nad dag ni mi 'byung ste/ /mar me phul ba'i rnam smin de yin no/ /de bzhin lag rtsis gzugs dang rtog ge rnams/ /rtog par khong
chud bzod ldan 'jigs pa med/ /de ni mdzangs la blo dang ldan par 'gyur/ /blo ni shin tu cha phra don dam mthong / /srid pa dag la byed pa med par lta/ /rgyal ba'i bstan la
snang ba thob par 'gyur/ /de bzhin 'jig rten 'dren pa sangs rgyas mthong / /mthong nas dad pas mchod pa rab tu byed/ /gzugs kyi dngos po bzang dang mdzes par 'gyur/ /
mdza' bshes dang ni rtsa lag skye bo 'ga'/ /phyug cing stobs ldan nor ni mang bar 'gyur/ /mi phyed 'khor ni phun sum tshogs pa 'thob/ /ji ltar
mar mes mun pa bsal nas su/ /kun la 'od kyis snang ba khyab pa ltar/ /de bzhin kun snang byas nas lhang nge'o/ /mun pa'i dbang du nges par de mi 'gro /sangs rgyas mchod
rten la ni mi gang gis/ /sems ni dad pa'i mar me'i phreng ba 'bul/ /mar me phul ba'i sems ni rnam dag cing / /de ni 'jig rten rig pa'i mchog tu 'gyur/ /blta na
sdug cing rab tu mdzes par 'gyur/ /'jig rten kun gyi dga' ba skye bar 'gyur/ /ltad mo mi 'dod bkra shis 'dod ma yin/ /g.yon phyogs lam la de ni rten mi 'gyur/ /
de ni 'jig rten log lta gang dag dang / /lam gol gang dag yin pa der mi mos/ /rgyal phran tsam gyis chog par de 'dzin cing / /su dang yang ni 'thab tu 'gro mi byed/ /
tshegs 'byung med cing mya ngan med par 'gyur/ /de yi sems la yongs su yi chad med/ /de la yid mi ches par mi 'gyur la/ /bsam pa ngan dang gnod pa byed pa med//
rgyal po'i pho brang gang du de smra ba/ /rgyal po dang ni rgyal 'khor grags par 'gyur/ /skya rbab nad kyis nam yang de mi thebs/ /za mar mi 'gyur ma ning 'gyur ma yin/ /
legs par gnas shing bde dang ldan 'gyur la/ /de yi lus la nad rnams 'byung mi 'gyur/ /rmi lam du ni sdig pa mi rmi la/ /des ni ji ltar ston pa de tshe shes/ /des na
yang dang yang du gter rnyed de/ /bde gshegs mchod rten mchod pas de ltar 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mar me dbul ba phul bas sems can de ni 'dun
pa bzhi 'thob ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ lus kyi 'dun pa dang / longs spyod kyi 'dun pa dang / rigs btsun par skye ba'i 'dun pa dang / shes rab 'thob pa ste/ shA ri'i bu/ de
bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mar me dbul ba phul bas 'dun pa bzhi po de dag thob par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/ bde bar gshegs
pas de skad gsungs nas/ de bzhin du ston pas/ gzhan yang / 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /drang srong chen po'i mchod rten mar me phul/ /de yi lus rdzogs pa dang stobs cher
'gyur/ /de ni nam yang rtsod pa sten mi byed/ /dbang phyug tshugs pa med pa phyogs bcur spyod/ /drang srong chen po'i mchod rten mar me phul/ /rnam par grags pa'i longs
spyod ldan pa dang / /yon tan mchog ldan rab mchog khyim du skye/ /skyes nas tshe rabs dran pa nyid du 'gyur/ /g.yog 'khor phun sum tshogs pa mchog ldan 'gyur/ /
srog chags rnams la rtag tu snying brtse byed/ /rtag tu mi 'tshe shin tu nges par 'gyur/ /rnam ltung 'gro ba'i khyim du de mi skye/ /shA ri'i bu/ de
bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mar me dbul ba phul bas yongs su dag pa bzhi 'thob pa ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ lus yongs su dag pa dang / ngag yongs su dag pa
dang | yid yongs su dag pa dang / mdza' bshes yongs su dag pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de skye ba'i gnas de dang / de dag tu skyes pa na
srog gcod pa spong bar 'gyur te/ de srog gcod par mi byed do/ /ma byin par mi len to/ /'dod pas log par g.yem pa spong bar 'gyur te/ rang gi chung ma la'ang
log par mi sten to/ /'bru'i chang dang / btsos pa'i chang btung ba spong bar byed do/ /sems can gang la'ang dbyug pa'am/ mtshon nam/ bong ba'am/ khu tshur ram/
mtshon char gyur pa gang yang rung bas rnam par 'tshe bar mi byed cing de sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las zlog par 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bu/ de dag ni lus kyi yongs
su dag pa zhes bya'o/ /de la ngag gi yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ de brdzun du smra ba spangs pa yin te/ de ma mthong ba'am/ ma thos pa brjod par mi byed la/ mthong ba
dang | thos pa dris pa'ang dus ma yin par smra bar mi byed de/ de mthong ba'am/ thos pa dris na yang dag par smra bar byed de/ de bdag gi don nam/ gzhan gyi don du'ang rung ste
log par mi smra'o/ /gzhan dag gis brdzun du smra ba bcol ba'i tshe yang dag par shes na bden pa srung bar byed de/ ngag gi yongs su ma dag pa de dag spong bar byed do/ /de de
dag dbye ba'i phyir 'di nas thos pa pha gir mi snyod/ de dag dbye ba'i phyir pha gi nas thos pa 'dir mi snyod de/ mthun pa rnams ni gcugs par byed cing bye ba rnams la ni
sdums byed do/ /de ngag rtsub po spangs pa yin te/ ngag gang zher 'debs pa/ brlang ba/ gzhan la rtsub pa/ gzhan la mi bde ba/ mi sdug pa/ mi 'dod pa/ mi dga'
ba| yid du mi 'ong ba/ gzhan la gnod pa/ 'khon du 'dzin pa'i ngag de lta bu spangs nas ngag mnyan pa/ 'jam pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ bden pa/ rnar snyan pa/ snying du sdug pa/
mdza' bar gyur pa/ skye bo mang po mgu ba/ skye bo mang po 'dod pa/ dga' ba/ yid du 'ong ba/ dgra thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa de lta bu'i ngag smra'o/ /de tshig kyal pa
spangs pa yin te/ de spang bar bya ba gzhan dang mi smra ba yin/ de gzhan gyi lag rtsis dang / brda sbed par byed do/ /de mang du smra bar mi byed/ dus ma yin par smra bar mi byed
la| mya ngan las 'das pa dang mi ldan pa'i tshig mi smra ste/ de ltar de dag gi las yongs su ma dag pa spong ba 'di ni/ shA ri'i bu/ ngag gi las
yongs su dag pa zhes bya'o/ /de yid kyi las yongs su ma dag pa spong ba yin te/ de brnab sems su mi byed cing de gzhan gyi nor dang / gzhan gyi rdzas dang / gzhan gyi
yo byad dag la brnab sems mi skyed do/ /de gnod sems mi byed de/ gnod sems spong ba yin no/ /log par lta ba'ang spong ste/ sdig pa'i lta ba can ma yin no/ /de
ltar yid kyi las yongs su ma dag pa spong ba 'di ni yid kyi las yongs su dag pa zhes bya'o/ /mdza' bshes yongs su dag pa'ang 'thob ste/ gang dag brdzun du smra ba dang /
'bru'i chang dang / bcos pa'i chang btung ba spong ba dang / mi rtsub pa dang / mi brlang ba dang / legs par sdom pa dang / yang dag pa'i lta ba can de dag la sten cing gong
du'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos rnams la'ang sten cing snyen la bsnyen bkur
byed de/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di ni yongs su dag pa bzhi pa ste mdza' bshes yongs su dag pa zhes bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mar me dbul
ba phul bas yongs su dag pa bzhi po de dag thob par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/ bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas/ de bzhin
du ston pas/ gzhan yang / 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rnam par sbyad phyir bde gshegs gsungs pa la/ /lus dang ngag dang yid kyis shin tu bsdams/ /lta ba ma rnyed tshul
khrims rnam par dag /de yi mig ni yid las byung ba yin/ /nyi bzhin phyogs rnams su ni shin tu gsal/ /de yis zag pa zad pa myur du shes/ /de yi blo ni rdzu 'phrul che
bar 'gyur/ /lha mig rdul dang bral zhing zag pa med/ /blo ldan de yis 'jig rten sems rnams dang / /lha yi mngon shes so so rig pa shes/ /'dod na nyan thos byang chub
rnyed mi dka'/ /mar me phul ba'i rnam smin de yin no/ /drang srong chen po'i mchod rten mar me phul/ /gal te sangs rgyas byang chub 'dod na'ang bla/ /blo ldan pa la gsum
char nyams pa med/ /shes rab mig ldan longs spyod chen por 'gyur/ /shA ri'i bu/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mos
de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mar me dbul ba phul na skye ba'i gnas de dang / de dag tu 'dun par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi mchog brgyad 'thob ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ sha'i
mig mchog 'thob pa dang / dran pa spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba 'thob pa dang / bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par nges par byed pa'i cha dang mthun
pa'i lha'i mig mchog 'thob pa dang / shes rab yongs su rdzogs pas tshul khrims nyams pa med pa 'thob pa dang / sngon bsod nams byas pas mtho ris thob pa dang / bsod
nams legs par byas pas dal ba phun sum tshogs pa 'thob pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi mig tu gyur pas sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes par byed pa dang / shA ri'i bu/
rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mos mar me phul ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid 'thob ste/ de la'ang zhe 'gras pa med pa'i yid dang ldan zhing
mchog tu blta na sdug pa'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin rdzu 'phrul chen po thob cing mig stong dang ldan par 'thob par 'gyur pa'am/ tshangs pa'i gnas la mkhas pa'i
tshangs par 'gyur te grags pa'i bsam gtan 'thob par 'gyur ba ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pas 'dun par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi mchog brgyad
po de dag 'thob bo/ /gzhan yang / chos brgyad 'thob ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan dpag tu med pa 'thob pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa dpag tu med pa 'thob pa
dang | sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dpag tu med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims dpag tu med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin dpag tu med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi shes
rab dpag tu med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba dpag tu med pa dang / sems can gyi sems dang / bsam pa dpag tu med pa la 'jug pa 'thob ste/ shA ri'i bu/ mar me
phul bas de ltar rnam par smin pa dpag tu med pa yongs su bzung ba yin no/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang / sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa chos 'chad pa na/ kye e ma ho/
chos 'chad do/ /kye e ma ho/ chos rab tu ston to zhes mar me dbul ba phul ba'i mar me de til gyi mar mer rjes su bzung nas chos kyi mar me rjes su 'dzin par byed do// de mar me
phul ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des tshogs dpag tu med pa brgyad 'thob ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ dran pa'i tshogs dpag tu med pa 'thob pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ blo gros kyi
tshogs dang / dad pa'i tshogs dang / brtson 'grus kyi tshogs dang / shes rab kyi tshogs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi tshogs dang / spobs pa'i tshogs dang / bsod nams kyi
tshogs dpag tu med pa 'thob ste/ tshogs dpag tu med pa brgyad po da dag 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'ang 'thob ste/ rim gyis thams cad mkhyen
pa'i ye shes kyi bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang / da bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la/ de
dang ba'i sems kyis thal mo sbyar ba byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des chos mchog tu byung ba brgyad 'thob ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ gzugs mchog tu byung ba 'thob pa dang / g.yog 'khor
mchog tu byung ba thob pa dang / tshul khrims mchog tu byung ba dang / lha dang / mi rnams su skye ba mchog tu byung ba dang / dad pa mchog tu byung ba dang / spobs pa mchog tu byung ba dang /
kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i 'phags pa'i lam thob pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ de ci'i
phyir dpag tu med pa zhes bya zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la des mchod pa'i 'bras bu dpag tu med pa'i phyir te/ phan yon dpag tu med pa yin no/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom
ldan 'das kyis/ 'di skad du/ brtsam byos mngon par 'byung bar bgyi/ /sangs rgyas bstan la brtson par byos/ /'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/ /'chi bdag sde
rnams gzhom par byos/ /zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pa mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ chos lnga
po 'di dag ni mchog tu rnyed pa dka' ba ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ mir skye ba 'thob pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu 'byung ba dang / de la mngon par dga' ba dang / tshul
khrims yongs su rdzogs pa dang / zag pa zad pa ste/ shA ri'i bu/ chos lnga po de dag ni sems can thams cad kyis mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba yin te/ de dag ni khyed rnams kyis thob
zin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/ bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas/ de bzhin du ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /byang
chub don phyir sems can phan 'dogs pas/ /bde gshegs mchod rten dbul ba 'dir phul bas/ /mkhas pa de yis byas pa'i las des ni/ /tshe rabs kun tu khyad par can
du 'gyur/ /'di nas shi 'phos lha mis bsngags pa yi/ /yang srid dam pa de ni thob par 'gyur/ /ri rab bzhin du de ni mi g.yo la/ /'od zer dag gis phyogs kun snang zhing
mdzes/ /lha tshogs rnams kyis mthong nas gus dang bcas/ /mchog tu gus pas de la dga' ba bskyed/ /ston pa byed cing de la mchog pa byed/ /yang dang yang du lta bas
ngoms pa med/ /bsod nams mtshan byas de ni lhas mchod 'os/ /tshangs pa'i gnas na tshangs pa mdzes pa 'dra/ /ci yi las shig nges par des bstan na/ /gang gis de
yi lus ni shin tu mdzes/ /'di ni bsod nams mi 'dod su zhig yod/ /'phags pa'i tshul khrims mkhas pa su mi sten/ /thub pa mthong na lta bas mi
ngoms te/ /chos thos nas ni su zhig bag mi byed/ /mi yi 'jig rten gnas tshe de yis ni/ /bde gshegs pa mchod rten mar me phul byas shing / /bde bar gshegs kyi bstan
la gnas byas pas/ /'di ni lha mchog rnyed pa legs par rnyed/ /mi yi lus ni bdag gis thob gyur cig /rgyal ba'i bstan la dad pa mchog thob shog /gal te bag med gyur na
lus 'dor gyi/ /chos kyi dam pa 'dor bar yod ma gyur/ /mi lus rnyed par dka' ba thob gyur nas/ /blun rnams ci phyir rang gi don mi byed/ /bde gshegs bstan la gnod
byed sems ldan na/ /shi nas g.yang sa chen por ltung bar 'gyur/ /de yis 'byor pa rgya chen lhas thos nas/ /skyo ba skyes te smon lam 'debs byed pa/ /mi yi lus ni bdag
gis thob gyur cig /legs don gyur nas tshangs spyod bdag ston shog /'chi ba'i dus byed tshe yang de bzhin du/ /chos la phan zhing sems la gsal gyur cing / /lha stong bye ba
lha mo rnams bcas pas/ /de ni bdag gi yin zhes dga' bar byed/ /lha yi bu mo yid 'ong brgyan pa rnams/ /skyed mos tshal bzhir de ni rtse byed 'jug/ yid du 'ong ba'i spos ngad
kun nas ldang / /glu dbyangs snyan pa'i sgra yang thos par 'gyur/ /bsngags pa'i lha de ga las gar 'gro ba/ /de dang der ni gzugs bzang rnams kyang mthong / /mi sdug gzugs ngan nam
yang mi mthong ste/ /rgyal ba'i mchod rten mar me phul bas 'gyur/ /de nas shi 'phos mi yi srid pa 'dir/ /dran dang ldan bzhin ma yi mngal na gnas/ /btsas nas gang nas shi
'phos tshe rabs dran/ /'phags pa'i ye shes stobs las nyams mi 'gyur/ /bde gshegs mchod rten mar me phul byas pas/ /de yis las byas pa ni de nyid kyis/ /'khor los
bsgyur ba mi bdag stobs chen ldan/ /yid 'ong gzugs bzang lta na dga' bar 'gyur/ /de yis las byas pa des tshe ring 'gyur/ /gcig tu dag pa nyid kyi bde dang ldan/ /de yis
lus ni nad kyis nyon mi mongs/ /mar me phul ba'i rnam smin de yin no/ /bde bar gshegs la mar mes mchod byas pas/ /rkun po'i gnod med rgyal po'i chad pa med/ /gshed
ma med cing chung ma byi bo med/ /de ni las kyis nam yang gtse mi 'gyur/ /bde zhing lo legs gang du'ang 'jigs pa med/ /rtag tu 'byor cing legs 'byor nor 'bru ldan/ /de yi
skyed mos tshal mchog phreng ba dang / /tshal dang shing phran lo ma sna tshogs brgyan/ /de yis 'jig rten gtso bo sangs rgyas mthong / /mthong nas kyang ni mchog tu dga' bar 'gyur/ /
de dag rnams la gus par de mchod byed/ /rgyal srid spangs nas dge slong nyid la sten/ /bsngags pa mtha' yas gzigs pa mtha' yas shing / /mtha'
yas blo ldan bde gshegs mchod rten la/ /mar me phul bas mtha' yas blo ldan 'gyur/ /mar me bzhin du phyogs rnams kun tu gsal/ /mar me chen pos skyes mchog thub pa
yi| |mchod rten gsal byas rnam dag mig gis ni/ /byang chub rdul bral zag pa med thob nas/ /de phyogs kun tu mar me bzhin du gsal/ /bde gshegs mchod rten mar me phul
bas na/ /rnam grol blo mnga' stobs bcu rnams ldan zhing / /de bzhin ma 'dres chos kyi pha rol byon/ /kun nas spyan ldan bde bar gshegs par 'gyur/ /phyogs rnams dag na
bgrang byas 'jig rten khams/ /gang dag ci snyed yod pa ma lus pa/ /mar me lta bur me yi rgyu yi ni/ /ma lus pa dag rtag tu snang byas 'gyur/ /bdag nyid che la ma ra me phul
ba las/ /mthu 'byung gang yin de ni de yin no/ /mar me 'dra ba dag la sems can kun/ /lhag byas gal te mthu chen don dam mthong / /rang rgyal rnams su gyur la de mchod
phyir| |gcig 'gas mar me 'bar bar byas gyur la/ /mar me snying po ri rab tsam byas shing / /de yis 'jig rten ma lus snang byas la/ /rnam pa de 'dras mtha'
yas phyogs kun tu/ /gal te mar me 'bul bar byed gyur la/ /rang rgyal byang chub tu ni smon sems kyis/ /bskal pa brgya phrag mtha' yas 'bar byed las/ /gang zhig
byang chub phyir ni smon sems kyis/ /mchod rten mchog la rtswa mes gsal byed na/ /de bas de mchog 'bras bu ches che zhes/ /don dam gzigs pa sangs rgyas rnams gsung
ngo| |phyogs bcu'i skye bo gang dag dpag med pa/ /rang sangs rgyas nyid mngon par 'dod pa'i phyir/ /re res de bzhin mar me rnams phul zhing / /bskal pa grangs med de
dga' bar byed la/ /'jig rten ched du bde gshegs nyid 'dod cing / /gang zhig 'jig rten dam pa'i mchod rten la/ /mar me 'bul lam lan gcig phyag btsal na//
de bas 'di bsod 'bras bu khyad par 'phags/ /sangs rgyas spyod yul mthong dka' bas ma mi khyab/ /thos nas dad dang dga' ba skyed par byed/ /dad med chos mchog
mthob byis pa rnams/ /zhum zhum por ni shin tu byed par 'gyur/ /de phyir 'jig rten kun mgon gang yin pa/ /dag chos spyod yul can rnams rnyed dka' bas/ /thub
rnams spyan sngar shin tu dad sems kyis/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyi ched du smon lam thob/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /
thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ 'phags pa mar me dbul ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA warma
dang | zhus chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya nA ga ra a ba la ma bi kA
nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa grong khyer gyis 'tsho ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag
'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyam yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mngon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' rab na lha dang /
klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / rgyal
po dang / blon po dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge ba snyen ma rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ mchod
cing rjed de pad+ma chus ma gos pa bzhin du bzhugs so/ /de nas de'i tshe rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i phyir ston zla tha chung zla ba nya ba'i tshes bco
lnga la/ 'bru mar gyis zangs po che stong bkang ste dngar nas mar me spar ba'i 'od kyis khor khor yug tu dpag tshad bzhir snang bas khyab par byas so/ /de nas yang de'i tshe mnyan yod
kyi grong khyer chen po na dga' byed ma zhes bya ba grong khyer gyis 'tsho ba zhig 'dug go /des 'bru mar sran gre'u dang sbyar ba nyos nas zhag bzhi kha 'tshos te nyam chung bar gyur to/ /
de nas 'bru mar de khyer te rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song nas khyim gyi nang logs su mar me spar te bzhag nas 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag dge
ba'i rtsa ba 'dis ma 'ongs pa'i dus na ji ltar da ltar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji lta ba bzhin du bdag kyang ma 'ongs
pa'i dus na ston par gyur te chos ston par gyur cig /dge 'dun yang sdud par gyur cig ces byas so/ /'di ltar yang sems bskyed de/ gal te bdag ma 'ongs
pa'i dus na sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba zhig na mar me 'di bdag phyir ma 'ongs kyi bar du 'bar bar gyur cig ces byas nas mar me de spar te grong khyer du song na/ mar
me de'i 'od zer kyis dzam+bu'i gling thams cad snang bar gyur te nam nangs kyi bar du'ang mar me de ma shi'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud+gal gyi bu chen
pos chos gos kyi mtha' mas mar me de gsad par byas nas gsad par ma nus so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud+gal gyi bu chen pos rnam par 'thor rlung gis gsad par byas kyang gsad
par ma nus so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud+gal gyi bu chen pos tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du 'dug nas stong gsum 'dir shing rta'i srog shing tsam gyi char gyi rgyun dbab par byin
gyis brlabs te mar me de yi steng du btang yang gsad par ma nus so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ maud+gal gyi bu/ thong shig/ mar me 'di ni byang chub kyi
sems kyis sbar ba yin la/ byang chub kyi sems ni nyan thos kyis zil gyis mnan par mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems ni nyan thos
dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis zil gyis mnan du med pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas re zhig na bud med de nyi ma shar te grong khyer nas phyir 'ongs nas des mar me de shin tu
'bar ba mthong ba dang / des mchog tu dga' ba chen pos rgyas par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das rnams kyi chos nyid ni 'di yin te/ gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer
kha dog du ma/ 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / btsod ka dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung bar gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi
khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag snang bas khyab par byas nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du song ste/ zla ba dang / nyi ma'i 'od kyang zil gyis mnan nas yang slar log ste/
bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor du nub par gyur to/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum
bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ /rgyal
mchog rnam par 'dren pa gang zag mchog/ rgyu med par ni 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ /ci yi rkyen gyis zhal ni 'dzum mdzad pa/ /'jig rten phan pa thugs brtses bdag la gsungs/ /
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ grong khyer gyis 'tsho ba 'di bskal pa nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi bar du ngan 'gro log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur te/ rtag tu
lha dang / mi'i phun sum tshogs pa dag nyams su myong nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu snang ba zhes bya
bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /stobs bcu ldan pa mchod phyir zangs chen phrag stong gsal rgyal gyis/ /mar me
bzang po sbar bas dpag tshad bzhir ni kun tu snang / /grong khyer 'tsho ba'i 'bru mar sran ma gre'u sbyar spar ba yis/ /'dzam gling snang bas khyab gyur de ni byang chub sems kyi mthus/ /
maud+gal gyis ni mar me gsad 'dod rdzu 'phrul rgya chen byas/ /rnam par 'thor ba'i rlung gi shugs btang gsad par yod ma nus/ /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten 'dug nas chu rgyun shing
rta'i srog shing tsam/ /phab kyang gsad par ma nus mar me nyi ma'i 'od bzhin snang / /de ni zhag bzhi kha 'tshos rgyal byed dga' ba'i tshal du 'ongs/ /dga' ba'i sems kyis bde
gshegs zhabs la phyag byas thal sbyar 'dug /mnyam med 'dzum pa mdzad pas kun dga' bo yang rab dga' nas/ /gzi brjid mtha' yas 'dzum mdzad 'di yi 'bras
bu ji 'dra gsungs/ /dga' byed 'di ni bskal pa nyi shu brgyad na rgyal bar 'gyur/ /rang 'byung kun snang zhes bya 'od kyis stong chen bzhi snang byed/ /ma 'ongs dus na bde bar
gshegs pa bye ba mchod par 'gyur/ /de ni kun tu 'khor los bsgyur 'gyur rgyal rnams bkur stir byed/ /sangs rgyas rtogs pa brjod pa yi ni dad rnams rab dga' byed/ /skye bo
mkhas pa dag gis de thos sems kyang rab tu dga'/ /de ltar rgyal ba bsam yas stobs bcu'i chos kyang bsam mi khyab/ /dga' ba bskyed na rnam smin mtshungs med bsam gyis mi khyab
'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / grong khyer gyis 'tsho ba de dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / dge slong de dag
dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa grong khyer gyis 'tsho ba
