de ni 'jig rten gyi 'du shes zhes bya ste/ gal te dge bsnyen yod na ni zas dang / skom chu gtsang ma dang sbyor cig /gang na dge bsnyen yod par rmo brko mi bya'o/ /gang na dge bsnyen
med pa der sangs rgyas kyis kyang ji ltar bya/ thang la'ang srog chags yod/ chu'i nang na'ang srog chags yod/ nam mkha' la'ang srog chags yod do/ /gal te de ltar rnam par dag
pa grub pa rnams la sdig par mi 'gyur ram/ rnam par dag pa grub pa de dag ji ltar rgyu/ de dag 'jig rten na mi 'dri ba zhes bya ba'i dri ba'o/ /'jam
dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'jig rten pa'ang ring zhig tshun chad bdag nyid sha za ba la mi gnas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang 'jig
rten pa la sangs rgyas kyi tshig dang mthun pa yod pa de'ang thams cad du thams cad sangs rgyas kyi tshig tu rig par bya'o/ /'jam dpal/ 'jig rten pa rnams kyang thar pa
brjod de/ de dag la thar pa med kyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la thar pa yod do/ /de dag la'ang rab tu 'byung ba yod de/ de dag gi rab tu 'byung ba ma yin no/ /bcom
ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la ni rab tu 'byung ba yod do/ /'jig rten pa la'ang sha za ba ni bdag nyid za ba'o zhes brjod de/ de'ang bdag nyid bdag nyid kyi sha la mi za ste/ bcom
ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la ni bdag nyid kyi sha za bar nges so/ /'jam dpal/ 'jig rten du ya mtshan can thams cad byung ba mdo sde 'di la bstan pa nyan 'dod dam/ gsol
pa| bcom ldan 'das/ 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ sngon 'das pa'i dus na byung ba grangs med pa'i bskal pa bas kyang ches grangs med
pa| bskal pa yangs pa bas kyang ches yangs pa/ dpag tu med pa bas kyang ches dpag tu med pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ko san ta bzang po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du grong
'dir byung ste/ de'i tshe ya mtshan can med cing ya mtshan can gyi ming yang med do/ /sems can theg pa chen po bar gyur te/ sems can rnams shin tu bde ba dang ldan par gyur to/ /de'i
tshe de bzhin gshegs pa de 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir lo mang du zhugs nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bstan pa'ang lo mang du gnas nas/
dam pa'i chos nub par gyur pa'i tshe/ dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa bri ba'i dus na/ chos ma yin pa'i phyogs 'phel ba'i tshe/ dge slong sangs rgyas kyi blo gros zhes bya ba zhig dgon
pa na gnas te/ dge slong de la sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa gcig gis/ rin thang med pa'i gos byin nas/ dge slong des rjes su bzung ba'i phyir blangs te/ i shin 'dar ra
ba'i drung nas phar bstan te song ba dang / i shin 'da'i mis gos de mthong nas sems bzlog ste/ nub mo mun khung na dge slong de'i thad du song ste/ gos de phrogs nas ri khrod du khrid de/
gcer bur phyung nas/ shing la lag pa gyen du dam por bcings te song ngo / /de'i nub mo mun khung na me tog 'thu ba'i bram ze skon pa thogs te/ 'brog dgon par 'ongs nas nam langs
te| tsam pa ka zhig gi drung na stag 'dug pas skrag ste/ stag des bsad la thug pa dang / ci thar du bros te/ bdag nyid rab tu mi dga' zhing song song na
dge sbyong gcer bur bcings pa mthong nas/ kye ma dge sbyong dgon pa dur smrig can 'dir 'ongs na/ dur smrig gi rgyal mtshan gyis ni thar par mi 'gyur ba lta zhig snyam ste/ lag
pa bsgreng nas lus gcer bur byung la dka' thub spyad par bya'o snyam nas/ lam 'di nges par thar pa'i lam du legs par grub pa yin nam zhes dam pa'i chos gzhig pa'i
phyir bdag gi gos ngan pa bor te/ skra btogs nas mgo reg gcer bu pa'i dge sbyong du 'gyur te/ de las dge sbyong gcer bu pa byung ngo / /dge slong de bdag nyid bcings pa khrol
nas shing shun blangs te sa ser pos byugs nas/ thang la 'gro ba bram ze zhig gis mthong nas/ sngar bshad pa bzhin du mthong ba dang / 'di ni dur smrig gyon pa'i dge slong ste/
ngur smrig bor la/ btsag gis byugs te song na/ thar pa'i lam ni 'di yin pa snyam ste/ 'di ni dge bar 'gro ba'am/ ci zhes de kun tu rgyu bar gyur te/ de las mur 'dug
kun tu rgyu ba byung ngo / /dge slong phye ma red chur zhugs te/ rang gi klad pa'i rma chus bkrus nas skra 'jam pos klad pa'i rma g.yogs te/ sbrul bsad pa'i ras ba lang rdzis bor ba
gyon te/ khrus byed pa de skyes bu shing 'thu ba gzhan zhig gis mthong ste/ snga ma ltar dge slong de nyon mongs pa mthong nas/ dge sbyong 'di ni ngur smrig gyon te/ rgyal mtshan ngur smrig gis
ni thar par mi 'gyur ba snyam du bsams nas/ ral pa ring por byas te/ rtswa gos gyon nas dus gsum du khrus byed pa'i dka' thub spyod pa yin du bzung nas/ de dge ba yin nam zhes 'di
nyid thar pa'i lam ste/ gzhan ma yin no zhes dka' thub can du gyur te/ de tshun chad ya mtshan can dka' thub byed pa byung ngo / /dge sbyong de chur zhugs te rma mang po thams cad la rang
gis yog ste/ rang gi lus rdul gyis gang zhing sbrang ma 'dus zhing dge slong de skra 'jam bos g.yogs pa mthong nas/ mur 'dug spyod pa dang / phyugs bdag po rnams de ltar byung ngo / /
dge slong de ba lang gi lci ba yar ke ma'i me bus te bsro ba skyes bu nyon mongs pa gzhan zhig gis mthong nas/ ba lang gi lci ba'i ril bu can thog ma de nas byung ngo / /dge slong de rma la
sdug bsngal reg par shes nas/ dpa' bo ltar 'dug pa skyes bu nyon mongs pa gzhan zhig gis snga ma bzhin du mthong ste/ ngur smrig gyon pa ni thar par mi 'gyur ro snyam nas ci legs
par 'gro'am snyam ste/ mi g.yo ba'i sar 'gro ba thar pa yin snyam du bsams nas/ mi g.yo ba'i sa mya ngan du 'gro bar gyur to/ /de ltar ya mtshan can dgu bcu rtsa drug gi bar du
gyur pa rnams kyang so so nas der lhags te/ dge slong de ci dang / ci lta ba mthong nas log pa'i lta bas gzhan dang / gzhan du brtags so/ /'di lta ste/
dper na/ phan tshun du ri dwags su mthong nas/ ri dwags gsad snyam du bsams nas/ gcig la gcig gsod pa de bzhin du ya mtshan dgu bcu rtsa drug kyang de ltar byung ngo / /
dper na/ dbyar zla ra ba ri dwags rnams smig rgyu ba la chu yin snyam du bsams te/ 'chi bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba'i dus na dge slong gi gzhi
las gzhan du gyur te/ 'jam dpal/ de ltar 'jig rten pa'i tshul khrims dang / spyod pa dang / bya ba'i mchog thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyis sprul pa'o/ /dam pa'i chos
nub par 'gyur ba'i dus na de lta bu byung na chos nub par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du bdag gi de kho na 'di 'dra de 'dra'o zhes log par lta ba bzhin du/ 'di lta ste/
thar pa dang / bdag dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'ang ldem po ngag mi shes pas bdag med pa sangs rgyas kyi tshig go zhes mur 'dug byung ba ltar rnam par rtog go /rjes
su dpag pas tshugs pa'i 'jig rten pa la'ang gti mug gi chos kyi dbang du song ngo / /'jig rten las 'das pa la'ang ldem po dag tu bshad pa mi shes pas shes pa nyams
te| de'i phyir phyogs gnyis spangs te/ bdag tu gtogs pa'i chos kyi de kho na nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang / dge 'dun gyi de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa
dbu ma'i lam du bstan to/ /dbu ma'i lam zhes bya ba ni theg pa chen po'i bla dwags so/ /sor mo'i phreng bas smras pa/ dbu ma'i lam mi shes pas sems can rnams dbu ma'i lam
gzhan du rtog go /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sor mo'i phreng ba/ mdo sde 'di bshad pa thos nas sems can mang du mdo sde 'di la yid ches par 'gyur ro/ /ma 'ongs
pa'i dus na sems can mang du mdo sde 'di la smod par 'gyur ro/ /sor mo'i phreng bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ phyogs gang du mdo sde la smod pa ji snyed 'byung ba dang /
'dod chen pa ji snyed 'byung ba bshad du gsol/ /phyogs gang du sems can thams cad la phan par 'gyur ba ston pa'ang de bzhin gshegs pas bshad du gsol/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yul gyi dbus 'dir mdo sde la smod pa'i sems can bye ba brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa brgyad 'byung ngo / /'dod chen pa bye ba
phrag bdun 'byung ngo / /shar phyogs su mdo sde la smod pa stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa brgyad 'byung ngo / /'dod chen pa bye ba phrag bdun byung ngo / /lho phyogs su mdo sde la smod pa stong phrag
dgu bcu rtsa brgyad 'byung ngo / /'dod chen pa bye ba phrag drug cu 'byung ngo / /nub phyogs su mdo sde la smod pa bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu byung ngo / /
'dod chen pa bye ba phrag lnga bcu 'byung ngo / /byang phyogs su mdo sde la smod pa bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa brgyad 'byung ngo / /'dod chen pa bye ba phrag bzhi bcu 'byung ngo / kha che'i
yul du'ang nga'i bstan pa glegs bam lhag ma'i mdzod dang / gter mi stor to/ /b+ha ru ka tsar yang nga'i glegs bam lhag ma'i mdzod du 'gyur ro/ /ri b+hin d+h+ya la'ang de bzhin
no| kha che yul gyi dge slong rnams bsgrub pa'i don mi shes nas theg pa chen po thams cad la smod pa 'byung ste/ nga la skur pa de ji lta bya zhes pa'ang ngo tsha ba skye'o/ /lho
phyogs pa'i rgyud du theg pa chen po ston par 'gyur te/ nan tan snying por byed pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa dngos po chen po brgyad dang bral ba/ de bzhin gshegs
pa rtag pa dang / ther zug dang / zhi ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po brtan pa'o zhes ston par 'gyur ro/ /nga'i nyan thos dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen
dang | dge bsnyen ma rnams nan tan snying por byed par 'gyur ro/ /nga'i bstan pa khur du thogs par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ kye ma/ bcom ldan 'das/
lho phyogs su bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa gnas par 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ de bzhin te/ lho phyogs pa'i rgyud du nga'i bstan pa lo du
ma zhig gnas par 'gyur ro/ /khyod lta bu shin tu dka' ba byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams rang gi srog btang nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
ther zug dang / de de bzhin gshegs pa g.yung drung ngo zhes sems can thams cad la phan par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ston par 'gyur te/ dper na/ de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir rgyal po'i srid chen po mi bzhed cing khur chen po thogs te/ stong gsum pa rnams bsgral lo zhes bskal pa bye ba mang
por bsgral ba de bzhin du nga'i nyan thos thams cad kyang bskal pa bye ba mang por nga'i dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba'i dus na/ nam dam pa'i chos lo brgyad cu'i bar du gnas par
'gyur ba'i tshe/ dam pa'i chos kyi khur khyer bar mi 'dod do/ /yang 'jam dpal/ khyod lta bu'i dam pa'i chos lo brgyad cu'i bar du gnas par 'gyur ba'i tshe/ dam pa'i chos kyi khur
chen po khyer te/ bdag gis dam pa'i chos phrag la bskur ro snyam nas/ dzam+bu gling dang / gling phran thams cad kyi sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po rtag pa/ ther
zug /zhi ba/ g.yung drung yin no zhes rang gi srog kyang btang ste rab tu bstan par bya'o/ /sems can rnams yid ches kyang rung / mi ches kyang rung
nga'i lus bsad dam/ dum bur byas kyang rung / gdod bdag gi lus rtag pa'i skur 'gyur te/ khur khyer ba rab tu dka' ba byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams lho phyogs kyi rgyud
nas 'byung ngo / /nga'i nyan thos de lta bu dang / khyod la sogs pa sems can bye ba mang po yod de/ de'i phyir lho phyogs kyi rgyud rab tu bsngags so/ /nga'i chos tha ma der ston par
'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi mthu dang / gzi brjid kyi dzam+bu gling gi skye bo ma lus par 'dzom pa dang / 'jigs pa dang / nga rgyal gyi rgyus nan tan du byed par 'gyur
ro| |'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgyal po dag rgyal po gzhan gyi khrims byas pa thos nas/ bdag nyid kyang skye dgu skyong ba de bzhin du kha che'i yul gyi 'khor dang / yul b+ha ru ka tsa ba rnams
kyang ngo tsha ba dang / nga rgyal bskyed nas theg pa chen pos 'jigs shing skrag pas gsang ste ston par 'gyur gyi/ de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /'jam
dpal/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sog khur gyi phung po'i nang du me bcug na/ sog ma'i phung po'i dbus tshig pa'i lhag ma lus te/ mtha' 'khor mi tshig pa de bzhin du/ 'jam dpal/
dang po nga skyes pa'i sa na nan tan lhur byed pa zhig ste/ tshig pa las lho phyogs kyi rgyud du lhag ma lus te/ mtha' 'khor na gnas pa'i sa der byang chub sems dpa' skyes nas dam pa'i chos
'byin par 'gyur ba der rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snang bar grags pa yin no/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i g.yog mang po dang bcas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa
dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas/ lha'i mchod pa chen po byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
'das/ bdag gis mdo sde 'di bsrung zhing rjes su gtad par bgyi'o/ /sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ de bzhin gshegs pas mdo sde 'di'i ming bstan du
gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka /mdo sde 'di'i ming sor mo'i phreng ba la phan pa zhes bya bar zungs shig /kau shi ka /mdo sde 'di ni 'jig rten na shin tu rnyed
par dka' ste/ u dum+ba ra'i me tog bzhin no/ /de nas dbang po'i bu thu bo mngon du khro ba zhes bya ba sdug pa dga' ba yid du 'ong ba des/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag
btsal nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar bdag gi pha nam lha ma yin dang 'thab pa'i tshe/ kha lo sgyur ba bsam 'dzin zhes bgyi ba la/ lha rnams 'phel
ba dang / lha ma yin pas par 'gyur ba de ltar shing rta drongs shig ces bgyis pa dang / lha gzhan du ma dgongs shig /bdag ni sngar 'gum ste/ khyod ni
slad kyis so/ /grub kyang rung / ma grub kyang rung ste/ bdag gi srog kyang bor/ gzhan dang mdza' ba'ang spangs nas go cha chen po bgos pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag
kyang ma mchis pa'i dus na/ dam pa'i chos lo brgyad cu'i bar du gnas par gyur pa de'i tshe/ bdag kyang byang chub sems dpa' gang de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa nyid dang / ther
zug nyid dang / g.yung drung nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ston pa las de slad kyis 'di snyam du sems skyes te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po bstan par bya ba'i bstan
pa'i sems can mang por mi 'dug gi /da ni mi bstan to snyam ste/ de'i thabs byas pa thos nas/ bdag kyang skyes bu bsam 'dzin ces bgyi ba de 'dra bar chos kyi shing rta
sbyar te/ ci nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po rtag pa nyid dang / ther zug pa nyid dang / g.yung drung nyid dang / zhi ba nyid du 'jig rten du rgyas par 'gyur ba de ltar bdag gi
srog kyang btang ste/ bdag gi dge slong gi tshul gyis bstan cing bskal pa thams cad du rnam par dag par bgyis par gyur cig /de nas dbang po'i bu mang po dang / bud med dang /
bu mo dang / lha gzhan dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang srog kyang btang ste/ dge slong gi tshul dang / dge
slong ma'i tshul dang / dge bsnyen gyi tshul dang / dge bsnyen ma'i tshul gyis skyes bu dam pa de'i g.yog 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ legs so/ /legs so//
rigs kyi bu/ dam pa'i chos 'dod pa khyed thams cad de bzhin gyis shig /ngas kyang dam pa'i chos 'dod pa de dag bsrung bar bya'o/ /de dag gi thang du nga rtag tu 'chag cing gnas
so| |khyed rnams ci nas kyang kha lo sgyur ba dang / nga'i byas pa shes shing brtan par gyis la/ de nas khyed thams cad kyis rtag pa'i gnas ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas yin
no zhes ston cig /de nas yul mdzod 'dzin gyi rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis blon po dang / dmag dpon la bsgo ba/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang lhan cig dong la/ mi'i gzugs
su srin po mi nyis stong du gcig gis ma tshang ba bsad de/ sor mo'i phreng ba byas nas byad khrag gis bskus shing stobs dang / rtsal chen po rab tu 'khyam zhing grong khyer 'di nas gnag pa'i
dgongs bzhi bcu tsam na 'dug cing / bdag gi ma'ang deng bsad de mi nyis stong du tshang bar bya'o snyam nas/ de rab tu dga'o zhes grag gi ma rungs pa sdig can gtum po 'di
bsad na/ gdod bdag cag grong dang / grong khyer dang / ri khrod kyi grong dang / lung pa'i gnas na dmag mi thams cad kyang rang gi khyim nas 'byung
ngo| |de bas na bya khras bya rog dang / bya bran skrag pa bzhin du bdag cag gi skye bo thams cad dang / shing thun dang / rtswa rnga ba dang / yul gzhan gyi mi dang / skye bo 'dron pa'i rnams
kyang de'i ming tsam gyis mi rgyu zhing mi smra bar gyur cing 'dug gi myur du sbron pa khyer te/ yul mdzod 'dzin gyi rgyal po gsal rgyal yan lag bzhi pa'i dpung gi tshogs dang lhan cig
tu chas te/ srin po ma rungs pa gtum po sor mo'i phreng ba gsad par byon gyis bkrabs pa thams cad kyang ral gri dang / gzhu dang / rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang / mdung thung dang / phub
lag na thogs te/ mtshon cha dang / lag cha thams cad rnon por byos te/ legs par chos la gshegs shig /gang gis srin po ma rungs pa sor mo'i phreng ba bsad dam/ mtshon
gyis btab bam/ bal glang zhon pa dag smas sam/ gang dag smas kyang g.yul las phyir mi ldog na bal glang 'dod na'ang bal glang gi mchog sbyin no/ /rta 'dod na'ang rta bzhon
pa sbyin no/ /gser 'dod na'ang gser dang / gser gyi dong tse dang / zho nam sa ya sbyin no/ /dngul 'dod na'ang dngul sa ya sbyin no/ /rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / dung dang / man
shel dang / byu ru dang / rin po che sna bdun sa ya snyed sbyin na/ /gos 'dod pa la'ang lha'i gos dang / dar dang / ras phran ka tam pa dang / yul ba lang gi ras dang / yul ma tu ra dang /
ba ru ka tsa dang / ba rid dra dang / lho phyogs pa dang / sang ka shi ka dang / ku ru pany+tsa la'i ras bam rnam pa mang po sbyin no/ /zhing dor dang / grong dang / ma he dang / bud med 'dod pa'ang
thams cad kyi mchog sbyin no zhes bsgrags so/ /de nas sor mo'i phreng ba'i ming tsam gyis zham ring ba la gtogs so cog skrag ste/ gcig kyang phyir ma byung ngo / /btsun mo'i 'khor
dang | zham ring pa'ang khyi dang 'dra bar gzhan gyi dbang du gyur pas 'tsho ba 'chi ba la thug par gyur te/ rang rang gi lag cha thogs nas/ bal glang ba dang / rta pa dang / dpung bu chung
ba rnams rab tu brgyan te/ rgyal po ga la ba der 'ongs so/ /de nas btsun mo'ang kyi hud 'bod cing sdig can de'i gan du ma bzhud cig /skye bo thams cad dang / gzhan gyi yul 'khor
rnams ni ma mchis kyang mi mang ngo / /lha la cung zad nongs pa byung nga re/ de nas mo 'debs pa dang / lo rtsi ba dang / mdun na 'don dang / rig pa dang / ltas 'debs pa rnams la
sor mo'i phreng ba de ring gsod dam/ mi gsod dris na/ mo 'debs pa dang / lo rtsi ba rnams kyis de ring sor mo'i phreng ba thal bar 'gyur ro zhes smras so/ /de nas rgyal po de dag gi
tshig la yid ma ches nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der yan lag bzhi'i dpung gi tshogs kyi dmag dang lhan cig tu song ste phyin nas/ bcom
ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/ rgyal po 'jigs shing skrag pas gdong dang / dpral ba rdul nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /de nas bcom ldan 'das thams
cad mkhyen pa ye shes thams cad dang ldan pas/ yul mdzod 'dzin gyi rgyal po gsal rgyal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ khyod kyi gdong dang / dbral ba rab
tu rdul na ci/ rgyal pos gsol pa/ lag pa 'di/ rkang pa 'di lags na/ bcom ldan 'das/ sor mo'i phreng ba zhes bgyi ba srin po mi stong dgu brgya bkum nas/ sor mo'i phreng
ba brgyus te phreng ba thogs nas bdag dang 'thab ces sdong cing mchis so/ /bdag la 'du ba thams cad kyi sgo'ang bcad de shing a shwa ka'i drung na gcig pu mchis pa bya rog
dang | khra 'khor ba de'i ming tsam gyis skrag ste/ bdag gis gsol pa de lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis mdzod 'dzin gyi rgyal po gsal rgyal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
to| |rgyal po chen po/ ci 'thab mo byed par 'dod dam/ rgyal pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal snga nas tshad ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
rgyal po chen po/ nga'ang 'gro'am/ rgyal pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gshegs so zhes bka' stsal pa ni sems can mang po la skal pa mchis pa lta ste/ da ni sor mo'i phreng
ba de'ang gum lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ gal te sor mo'i phreng ba 'dir 'ongs na ji ltar bya/ de nas yan lag bzhi pa'i dpung gi tshogs
snying rab tu dngangs skrag nas/ rgyal pos de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba'i bdag nyid shes pas snying dga' ste/ mi 'jigs nas rgyal pos gsol pa/ sor mo'i phreng ba/ gal te 'dir
mchis na/ gcig pu lus par 'gyur lags grang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mdzod 'dzin gyi rgyal po gsal rgyal ba bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ sor mo'i phreng bar
'di'i dpal la ltos/ de nas mdzod 'dzin gyi rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis sor mo'i phreng ba la ring zhig tu mig mi 'dzum par bltas na/ sor mo'i phreng ba mig dmar la bdag nyid
che ba'i gzugs mthong nas/ mdzod 'dzin gyi rgyal po gsal rgyal gshin tu 'jigs shing skrag ste ba spu'ang langs nas/ yi dwags 'dul ba ltar go cha rnams zhig cing mtshon thams
cad shubs nas byung ste/ mda' ste'u ka ltar thams cad du ltung ba'ang byi la ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i seng ge'i khri'i drung du mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sgra gcan 'dzin
bzhin du snyoms par gzigs pa la skyabs su mchi'o/ /de nas yan lag bzhi pa'i dpung gi tshogs thams cad sgra de thos nas/ glang po dang / rta dang /
bal glang dang / rkang thang ba'i dmag de rnams sde gyes pa bzhin du nyams te/ la la ni brgyal/ la la ni 'gyel/ la la ni 'chi la thug par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
mdzod 'dzin gyi rgyal po gsal rgyal la bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di nyon cig dang / gnod pa med par 'gyur gyi ma skrag cig /gang zhig snga na bag
med pa/ /bag yod par ni phyis 'gyur na/ /sprin las byung ba'i zla ba bzhin/ /'jig rten 'di na snang bar byed/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo thams cad dbugs dbyung ba'i
phyir 'jigs pa med pa'i rnam pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer btang ste/ sems can gang 'od zer des reg pa'i sems can de dag thams cad bde bar gyur te/ mdzod 'dzin gyi rgyal
po gsal rgyal gyi btsun mo'i 'khor dang / bu dang / grong gi skye bo sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pas sor mo'i phreng ba btul lo snyam ste thams cad der lhags so/ /de nas
rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis/ /bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /kye ma/ bcom ldan 'das ni mi 'dul zhing kha lo sgyur ba lha dang mir bcas pa rnams ston pas sdig
pa'i chos can 'di lta bu'ang dam pa'i chos la bzhag pas na/ kye ma/ bcom ldan 'das ni 'jig rten thams cad la phan par mdzad pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtan pas sngar bag med pa lta bur bstan la/ phyis bdag gi che ba nyid kyang ston pas de 'jig rten na sprin las grol ba'i zla ba lta bur mdzes par
gyur te/ sems can bye ba mang po bsgral nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba nyid kyang ston to/ /rgyal po chen po/ sor mo'i phreng ba ni sdig can ma yin te/ thabs 'chang ba'i byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/ /rgyal po chen pos gsol pa/ mkhan po'i mchis brang dang lhan cig tu las ngan pa spyod cing mkhan po'i da mod pa'i chos
kyi 'brer gyur na ci'i slad du sdig par mi 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sor mo'i phreng ba/ mkhan po'i chung ma dang lhan cig tu las ngan pa spyod pa ma yin gyi /
mkhan po'i chung mas gzugs mthong nas sems gyur te/ sdig pa rab tu byed pa ltar mkhan po'i chos kyis rtse bar thams cad rtog par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po/ de'i phyir byang
chub sems dpa' ni 'di lta ste/ dper na/ glang po che brdeg pa ni bong pus mi bzod do/ /de bzhin du rgyal po chen po/ de bzhin gshegs pa mi mchog glang po che'i dgongs te/
gsungs pa'i gsang ba'i sos phog pa'ang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi mi bzod do/ /de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas dgongs te gsungs
pa'i gsang bas phog pa'ang de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis bzod do/ /rgyal po chen po/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho phyogs logs su gang+gA'i klung drug cu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed
sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten thams cad mthong na dga' ba mngon par 'phags pa brtson pa chen po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs pa 'tsho zhing gzhes te/ de na nyan thos dang / rang
sangs rgyas thams cad kyang med/ theg pa gcig las theg pa gzhan gyi ming yang med/ rga ba dang / na ba dang / sdug bsngal yang med/ yid mi bde ba'ang med/ rab tu
bde ba thams cad dang ldan te/ sems can de dag tshe dpag tu med/ sems can de dag thams cad gzi brjid dang / kha dog tshad med de/ 'gro ba de dag gi dpe dang / rgyu
dang | byed pa med pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa lta bu dpe med de/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas 'jig rten thams cad mthong na dga' ba mngon par 'phags pa brtson pa chen po de la rgyal po chen po thal mo sbyar la rjes su yi rang bar gyis shig /de bzhin gshegs ba
de ni sor mo'i phreng ba 'di nyid yin te/ de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi che ba de 'dra ste/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /de nas lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa rnams
dang | nyan thos dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / mdzod 'dzin gyi rgyal po gsal rgyal dang / yan lag bzhi'i dpung gi tshogs dang bcas pas mo 'debs pa dang / lo rtsi ba
rnams la/ kye ma/ rdzun smra ba/ khyed nga'i drung na ma gnas shig ces brgyad cing smad nas bskrad do/ /de nas lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang / /
nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / mdzod 'dzin gyi rgyal po gsal rgyal dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / tshong 'dus dang / lung pa'i mi rnams dang / ri khrod pa dang / mnyan du
yod pa'i yul na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus lhags te/ sor mo'i phreng ba'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag btsal nas/ mgrin gcig tu tshigs
su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/ /mtha' yas sku mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thabs kyi sku mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sor phreng khyod kyi zhabs la mgo gtugs nas/ khyod kyi
'jam pa'i zhabs la bzod par gsol/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sor phreng mtshon 'dzin pa/ /bram ze'i gzugs kyis bdag cag don phyir gshegs/
sangs rgyas sku mdog 'bar ba deng 'dir gshegs/ /dpal ldan gzi brjid mthu mnga' bzod par gsol/ /tshig gis mngon du gsung ba mtha' yas sku/ /khyed ni yang dang yang
bying mang po yi/ /yang dag sangs rgyas skyabs byed skyabs su gyur/ /gnyen med rnams kyi gnyen du gyur pa khyod/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'das pa gnyis mdzes te/ /'di ni chos
spyod shin tu ngo mtshar rmad/ /mi las pad mo skye ba ngo mtshar bzhin/ /'jig rten sangs rgyas gnyis ston mchog de 'dra/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mdzod 'dzin gyi rgyal po gsal
rgyal la bka' stsal pa/ ltos/ rgyal po chen po/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ byang phyogs logs su gang+gA'i klung bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa
na| 'jig rten gyi khams rtag par rab tu dga' ba sdug cing mos pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mos pa rab tu
dga' ba'i snying po nor bu rin po che brtsegs pa'i rgyal po da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad med/ theg pa gcig las
theg pa gzhan gyi ming yang med/ rga ba dang / na ba dang / sdug bsngal yang med/ bde ba thams cad dang rab tu ldan par gyur te/ sems can de dag tshe dpag tu med/ gzi brjid dang /
kha dog dpag tu med/ 'jig rten na dpe dang / rgyu dang / byed pa med de/ rtag tu dga' zhing mos pa dang / dpe med pa de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas mos pa rab tu dga' ba'i snying po nor bu rin po che brtsegs pa'i rgyal po da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de la rgyal po chen po thal mo sbyar te rjes su yi rang ba
bar byos shig /de bzhin gshegs pa de gzhan ma yin te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di nyid yin no/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / sor mo'i phreng ba gnyis
kyi ming gang gis thos sam/ de la rtag tu phyag 'tshal na/ sems can de dag gi khyim nyid du dga' ba can gyi 'jig rten mthong ste/ ngan 'gro rnam pa bzhi'i sgo gcad par 'gyur
ro| |de gnyis kyi ming thos nas phyi rol pa rnams dang / phas pham pa dang / mtshams med par gyur pas 'phya ba'am/ sting ba'am/ 'dran tor ram/ gzhan gyis bzlas sam/
rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs bcad kyi phyir yang rung ste/ de dag gis ngan 'gro bzhi'i sgo gcad par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis 'di gnyis
kyi ming gis bsrung bar byas na dgon pa thams cad dang / 'jigs pa'i dus thams cad du'ang bsrung bar 'gyur ro/ /phyis 'jigs pa thams cad
kyang bsrung bar 'gyur/ 'jigs pa byung ba thams cad kyang zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / she
zas kyang mi tshugs so/ /yang bcom ldan 'das kyis mdzod 'dzin gyi rgyal po gsal rgyal la bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas kyi tshig ni che ba'i bdag nyid do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i
spyod pa'i che ba'i bdag nyid ni de lta'o/ /sor mo'i phreng ba dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i che ba'i bdag nyid glang po che 'di gnyis la rjes su yi rang bar gyis la /
byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'ang skyed cig /sor mo'i phreng ba'i ma'ang ma brjed par gsos shig /ngas sor mo'i phreng ba'i lag nas de'i ma rgan mo thar bar byas te sor mo'i
phreng ba khyod kyis mam bsad cig /bsad pas mtho ris su mi 'gro'o zhes byas pa dang / ral gri thogs te 'ongs nas skad cig de nyid la de'i bar du 'dug pa ni chos la gzhug
pa'i thabs so/ /de nas sor mo'i phreng ba'i ma ta la bdun tsam gyi nam mkha' la 'dug nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di zhes smras so/ /de bzhin gshegs kyis sgyu ma sprul pa ni/ /sems
can mang po dag gis mi shes te/ /sangs rgyas sgyu ma'i rgyal po sku che zhing / /de bzhin gshegs pa thabs kyi sku mnga' 'o/ /des 'di skad ces smras nas/ de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas
mdzod 'dzin gyi rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ci sgyu ma lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal
po chen po/ ma 'di ni sprul pa'o/ /sprul pa'i mas ji ltar smras pa bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sgyu ma'ang de bzhin no/ /de nas sor mo'i phreng ba'i mkhan po nor bu
bzang po zhes bya ba ta la bdun tsam gyi nam mkha' la 'dug nas tshig 'di zhes smras so/ /seng ge dang / wa 'dre yun ring zhig tu mdza' bor byas kyang / des seng ge'i nga ro'i sgra 'dzin
par mi nus te/ wa 'dre yang thos pa tsam gyis 'chi'o/ /yang ci wa 'dre de dom gyi skad du 'byin na/ seng ge'i rgyal po chen po sgra skad 'byin pa yin nam/ seng ge'ang wa dang / dom gyi
sgra skad du'ang nga ro mi 'byin gyi/ seng ge'i sgrar sgrogs so/ /de bzhin du wa 'dre lta bu bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' seng ge lta bu'i mkhan po byas te/ yun ring mo zhig tu lhan cig
'khod kyang byang chub sems dpa'i sgra skad 'dzin lta ga la nus te/ gal te 'di thabs ma yin na de'i rtsal gyis 'chi bar 'gyur te/ yi dwags lta bu bdag gi glen pa'i chos la sbyor ba
dang | nyan du gzhug pa lta ci smos/ byang chub sems dpa' ni glen pa'i chos mi spyod pa ste/ spyod pa'ang thams cad la bu gcig pa lta bu'i byams par
spyod pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sprul pa sgyu ma mang po ni sems can bye ba dang / bram ze'i mkhan pos mi shes te/ sangs rgyas nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi sgyu ma mkhyen te/ de bzhin gshegs
pa ni sangs rgyas ni sgyu ma'i rgyal po'o/ /mkhan po'i chung ma dga' byed mas smras pa/ kye ma/ sems can 'di bram ze'i bu mo 'jo ma'i dku mthong yang sangs rgyas kyi che ba yin par
mi shes so/ /ji ltar tsan tsa sgyu ma yin pa de bzhin du bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyis sgyu ma sprul ba'o/ /de bas mdzod 'dzin gyi rgyal po gsal rgyal la bdag gis bsnyad do/ /gdol
bas khyed la bsnyen par mi nus na/ rgyal po sems can mang po dang / 'gro ba'i dpal dang / byin gyis brgyal bar 'gyur na/ mdun du 'dug pa lta ci smos/ de ltar mis mi'i
drung du bstan par mi nus na/ lha dang mi rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la bstan par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs bsgyur bar lta ga la nus te/ de bzhin gshegs
pa la rim gro byed pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / sha za dang / lha ma yin tshad med pa dang / nam mkha' lding gis
de la gnod par byed do/ /gal te 'di lta bu'i sems 'byung na/ bcom ldan 'das kyang sdig byed pa rnam pa mang po ston te/ ma 'ongs pa'i sems can 'di lta bu'i sdig ma rungs pa byed
pa 'byung ba dag la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa ni sangs rgyas kyi sgyu ma chen po'i thabs kyis sku ston to zhes zer nas mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas yang rgyal po shin tu ngo mtshar du
gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci sgyu ma lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ mkhan po dang / mkhan po'i
chung ma dang / de'i sgyu ma gsum gyis smras pa bzhin te/ nga'i sgyu ma ni bsam gyis mi khyab pas rnam pa de gsum du sprul pa yin te/ sems can bye ba mang po bsgral ba'i phyir
sor mo'i phreng ba de ltar byon pa yin no/ /rgyal pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis dgung bdun nas sbyin pa chen po stsal na/ de bzhin gshegs pa sor mo'i
phreng ba lho phyogs logs kyi sbyin gnas su gyur cig /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ de bzhin du gyur cig /de nas lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas
pa'i 'jig rten gyis mgrin gcig tu tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /sgyu ma'i rgyal po khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' chen thabs kyi sku/ /thabs kyi mtshan
nyid rab tu phun sum tshogs/ /thabs mchog dam pa'i chos rnams rab tu ston/ /thabs kyis dbyings rnams su yang 'jog par mdzad/ /thabs kyis
sprul pa dag ni yongs su ston/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang mtha' yas te/ /blo gros mtha' yas grags pa'ang mtha' yas so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzi brjid mtha'
yas te/ /bde gshegs mtha' yas mtha' yas stobs chen ston/ /gsang ba mtha' yas mtha' yas dgongs dag ston/ /'jig rten rab tu snang mdzad mtha' yas so/ /de
bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer mtha' yas pa/ /yon tan mtha' med grangs las shin tu 'das/ /de bzhin gshegs ni mtshungs med dpag tu med/ /chags med ye shes
nam mkha' lta bur ston/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni nam mkha' bzhin/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur phan zhi bar byed/ /sor phreng slad du bde gshegs gshegs pa
ni| |gshegs dang ma gshegs zhes kyang brjod mi nus/ /bde gshegs sgra gcan zin ltar snyoms par gzigs/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das dgyes
so| |lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / nyan thos de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / mdzod 'dzin gyi rgyal po gsal rgyal
gyis de dag thams cad kyang sor mo'i phreng ba'i byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa dang / de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye ba dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod
pa dang / de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de yi rangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod
do| |shin tu rgyas pa'i lung theg pa chen po'i mdo las/ me tog u dum+bA ra ltar rab tu rnyed dka' ba/ 'phags pa sor mo'i phreng ba la phan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs
so|| ||rgya gar gyi mkhan po shAkya pra b+ha dang / zhus chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de d+harma tA shI la dang / rgya'i lo tsA ba ban+de to da A tsaR+ya la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan
la phab pa// // rgya gar skad du/ rA dza de shA nA ma mahA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ rgyal po la gdams pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub
sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba
na| dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun rab tu mang po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor rnams la
bka' stsal pa/ de ring rgyal po gzugs can snying po gdul bar bya ba'i dus la bab kyi yul ma ga d+har 'gro bar bya'o zhes gsungs nas/ 'khor dang bcas pa dang
pa'i rgyal po ltar nam mkha' la ldings te gshegs pa blon po zla ba bzang pos mthong nas rgyal po la smras pa/ lha lags/ sangs rgyas 'khor dang bcas pa 'o skol gyi yul du byon
bas grong khyer brgyan pa dang / bsnyen bkur bya bar rigs so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ dzam+bu'i gling na nga las che ba med par su la bsnyen bkur byed ces slar nyid du dregs par
gyur to/ /de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i pho brang gi sgor gdan bshams pa la bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa bzhugs so/ /de ltar bzhugs par shes nas
rgyal pos gyad chen po'i 'degs pa zhes bya ba rbad de rdo shin tu che ba bcom ldan 'das la 'phangs so/ /rdo de nam mkha' la lding zhing de las sgra 'di skad ces grag go /kye
ma 'dus byas rtag pa med/ /skye zhing 'gog pa'i chos can yin/ /skye ba yod na 'chi ba yod/ /'du ba yod na 'bral ba yod/ /bsags pa yod na 'dzad pa yod/ /lang tsho'i
mdog kyang nad kyis 'phrog /'tsho ba'i tshe yang 'chi bas 'phrog /chags par gyur na sdug bsngal 'phel/ /skyo bar byas na thar par 'gyur/ /zhes pa de rgyal po gzugs
can snying pos thos pas mos par gyur te thad du song nas thal mo sbyar te 'khod pa la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po chos la mos par bya/ khong du chud par
bya| bsgo bar bya/ yid 'byung bar bya'o/ /rgyal pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang la skyo bar bgyi/ yid 'byung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'khor
ba las skyo zhing yid 'byung bar bya'o/ /rgyal pos gsol pa/ ci'i phyir 'khor ba las skyo zhing yid 'byung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'khor ba 'di mi
rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i phyir ro/ /rgyal pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'khor ba 'di ji skad mi rtag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ snod kyi
'jig rten 'di yang mi rtag la/ /bcud kyi sems can yang ni mi rtag go /rgyal pos gsol pa/ snod kyi 'jig rten ji ltar mi rtag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
snod kyi 'jig rten ri rab gling khams kyang / /'jig pa'i dus tshe bskal pa'i me byung nas/ /thal ba'i lhag ma tsam yang ma lus so/ /chu dang rlung gis 'jig pa de bzhin no/ /gzhan
yang dbyar drod skye la dgun grang skam/ /lo legs lo nyes than zhod nges pa med/ /lo zla 'das shing 'jig pa'i dus dang nye/ /de la sogs te mi rtag mngon sum ni/ /rtag pa
yin na ci phyir 'gyur zhing 'gro /rgyal pos gsol pa/ bcud kyi sems can ji ltar mi rtag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
bcud kyi sems can tshe 'di nyid la yang / /nyin zhag lo zla rim gyis gcod byed pas/ /nyin zhag 'das shing 'chi dang phar phar nye/ /mi shir 'dod kyang rang la rang dbang med//
skye rga na 'chi rang thag ri mo 'dra/ /'chi bdag bdud ni so bya nya sdod 'dra/ /'chi ba'i rkyen ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ /'chi rkyen ma song dngos po gang yang med/ /lus 'di zas kyis
'tsho yang brnangs nas 'chi/ /'jig rten 'di na che chung phyug dbul kun/ /'chi bdag dbang du mi 'gyur gang yang med/ /snga ma shi ba'i mi rnams kun gyis kyang / /rtag tu re nas
bu dang nor bsags kyang / /bu nor phyi lus bdag la phan pa med/ /rang gi dge sdig gnyis dang 'grogs te 'chi/ /da ltar rang gi gnas pa'i ring 'di la'ang / /dga' bshes
gnyen 'dun mdza' dang mi mdza' dang / /na tshod mthun dang rgan gzhon ji snyed cig /shi ba mthong zhing thos pa ma yin nam/ /sa steng gnas pa'i sems can 'di kun kyang / /lo
brgya tshun chad sdod kyang ma lus 'chi/ /de bas rang re'ang 'chi ba'i chos can yin/ /deng 'chi sang 'chi sus kyang mi shes te/ /tshod 'dzin pa yang mi 'jigs sbyin med pas/ /
sang phod deng sang bdag nyid ji ltar 'gyur/ /'chi ba'i tshe na pha ma bu tsha dang / /phu nu mdza' bshes bran khol nor kun kyang / /bdag nyid 'chi ba'i phyi na 'ong med pas/ /sdug bsngal
skal len 'ga' yang yod ma yin/ /de bas skyes kyang bdag nyid gcig pu skyes/ /tha ma 'chi yang bdag nyid gcig pu 'chi/ /skad cig tshe las mthun pa nye gzhi rnams/ /
mgron po gnas mthun tsam ste so sor 'gro /skad cig tsam yang 'bral bar mi phod pa'i/ /gnyen dang nor rdzas yul mkhar kun por nas/ /bdag nyid gcig pu 'jigs
pa'i lam du 'gro /ji tsam sdig dang bsngos nas nor bsags kyang / /sdig pa'i rnam smin rmongs pa bdag nyid 'khur/ /bsags pa'i nor ni khong dag bu tshas 'khyer/ /de
phyir bsags pa'i nor gyis ci zhig phan/ /bdag la shin tu phangs pa'i lus 'di yang / /shi ba'i dus su rdza zhig bzhin du 'bor/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i sha rus gnyis
kyang 'bye/ /dbang med bdag nyid gcig pu 'khyams nas ni/ /las kyi dbang gis gang du skyes gyur na/ /de bas lus kyi phyir ni sdig mi bya/ /lus 'di sa gting 'gro ste chog
mi shes/ /mi gtsang las byung mi gtsang phung po yin/ /na rga 'chi sogs sdug bsngal kun gyi gnas/ /shi nas lus bor sa yi phyogs tsam btsog /bya dang khyi spyang la sogs
rnams kyis za/ /bsnyen bkur 'bad kyang 'chi bdag srin pos 'phrog /mkhas pas smod cing blun po chags pa'i gnas/ /de bas mkhas pa
lus la su zhig chags/ /lus kyi phyir ni ya ngar 'jug mi bya/ /'di la gla rngan gos zas byin nas su/ /yun gyi phan phyir bsod nams gsog tu gzhug /bdag gi grogs ni
dge sdig gnyis las med/ /de yang dge ba mtho ris thar pa'i rgyu/ /sdig pa ngan song sdug bsngal 'byung ba'i rgyu/ /ma shi bar du'ang lus ni mi rtag ste/ /bu chung byis pa gzhon
nu nyid du 'gyur/ /de nas dar la bab dang dar yol dang / /rgas par gyur te lus 'di rtag na ni/ /gnas skabs de snyed cig ni cis te 'gyur/ /longs spyod bde sdug rnams
kyang mi rtag ste/ /btsan phyug 'dzom pa sdug phongs can du 'gyur/ /sdug phongs can yang btsan phyug 'dzom par 'gyur/ /lang tsho longs spyod na rga 'chi bas 'joms/ /
'jig rten chos 'di thams cad mi rtag go /rgyal po gzugs can snying pos gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'khor ba pa 'di'i sdug bsngal ji lta bu lags/ /bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'khor ba la nam yang bde ba med/ /byas pa thams cad don med sdug bsngal rgyu/ /sdug bsngal gtso bo skye rga na 'chi bzhi/ /dmyal bar skyes
na sdug bsngal 'di 'dra'o/ /dmyal srung dang ni dmyal ba'i me mthong nas/ /shin tu skrag dngangs cho nges cher 'debs shing / /rang la rngan bgrang sngon gyi sdig pa la/ /shin tu 'gyod
kyang phan pa ci yang med/ /lus 'di shin tu che la gzhon sha can/ /tshor ba che zhing drag po'i lus thob nas/ kha cig rang lus me yi phung por 'bar/ kha cig lcags mkhar khang
pa sbrum mar rdung / /'gre ldog byed cing phyogs ni kun nas sreg kha cig lcags las byas pa'i snod chen du/ /spyi tshugs 'bru nyungs chu khol thug bzhin 'tshed/ kha cig sog
les 'dra zhing gtun la rdung / kha cig gnas dang khang par bsrung zhing bsreg /me ma mur dang thal tshan chu la sogs/ /sdug bsngal mang po bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /mi yi lo
ni 'bum dang brgyad khri la/ /dmyal ba kha cig na ni nyin zhag gcig /de la sogs pa bskal pa'i bar du gnas/ /shi bar dga' yang 'chir ni mi btub bo/ /las ma zad pa
kha cig 'jig chags tshe/ /'jig rten brgyud cing 'jig chags med par skye/ /yi dwags skyes pa bkres dang skom pas gdungs/ /mgo bo ri tsam kha ni khab mig tsam/ /ske rtsa rab
phra gsus pa yul ljongs tsam/ /bza' btung mthong yang gzhan gyis bsrungs pa dang / /rnag khrag ngan skyugs la sogs gzhan du mthong / kha cig zos kyang khro chu khol mar
'gro /byol song skyes na gcig la gcig za dang / /rang la dbang med bkol btags brdeg 'tshog dang / /gzhan gyis gsod sogs gti
mug rmongs pas sdug /mir skyes na yang mngal na gnas pa'i tshe/ /ma ni 'grangs tshe brag bar btsir ba 'dra/ /bkres pa'i tshe na dbyang la btang pa snyam/ /drag shul byed tshe
gtun la rdung pa snyam/ /btsas pa'i tshe na pags pa bshus nas ni/ /rtsig pa'i logs la drud pa bas kyang rtsub/ /tsha 'brum bkres skom rkang lag na nas sdug /cher skyes na
yang so nam brel phongs dang / /nye du bral dang dgras bcom bu lon dang / /bkres skom tsha grang don la sogs pas sdug /phongs pa rnams ni btsal thabs med nas sdug /
yod pa rnams kyang 'tsho skyong mel tshes sdug /zhing rmo tshong byed 'du byed las kyis sdug /de la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal bsam mi khyab/ /sdug bsngal gzhi ni phal cher lto rgyab
gnyis/ /'jig rten 'di yi bde ba'i longs spyod kyang / /phal cher phyi ma'i ngan song sdug bsngal rgyu/ /lha min skyes na nga rgyal phrag dog dang / /khro gtum 'thab rtsod la sogs
dbang gis sdug /lhar skyes kyang ni 'chi 'pho ltung ba dang / /'chi ltas lnga dang 'du byed dbang gis sdug /rgas pa yang ni 'di ltar sdug bsngal te/ /mgo dkar gnyer 'dus
gzhan gyis mthong mi mos/ /kha sna chu 'dzag rkang lag kun kyang 'dar/ /sems kyis dran yang lus la nyams stobs med/ /bu tsha kun kyang shi na rung snyam sems/ /zhal ta byas
kyang mi nyan dbang yang shor/ /kha cig srin rgan shi 'phyis zhes kyang zer/ /kha cig ber dbyug thogs nas rdung bar byed/ /de ltar mthong thos shir 'dod shir ma btub/ /na ba rnams ni
'di ltar sdug bsngal te/ /lus kyi 'byung chen bzhi ni ma snyoms pas/ /rlung mkhris bad kan 'dus pas lus gdungs te/ /longs spyod mthong yang 'di la 'dod pa med/ /lus
kyi nyams stobs shor bas ldang mi nus/ /mdzes pa'i gzi mdangs shor bas yi dwags 'dra/ /'chi ba rnams kyang 'di ltar sdug bsngal te/ /gnyen bshes tshogs kyi cho nge
'debs byed kyang / /de la nyan lta bsam pa'i yul med de/ /gnad gcod pa ni mtshon chas gtub pa 'dra/ /mdza' dang mi mdza'i don du sngar byas pa'i/ /dge sdig las ni rmi
lam yul bzhin snang / /gshin rje'i pho nya shin tu 'jigs pas bskor/ /bred sha thon nas kun tu ltas byas kyang / /mgon skyabs byad pa su yang ma mthong nas/ /shin tu 'jigs
bzhin kun tu yi mug ste/ /bdag nyid gar 'gro gtol med par do 'byung / /mi rtag sdug bsngal mi zad yun ring 'di/ /thog ma med nas da lta'i bar du yang / /'phags lam ma
thob par du rtag tu gdung / /rgyal pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'khor ba 'di shin tu sdug bsngal ba lags na bde legs dang ldan
pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa ni bde legs phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /rgyal pos gsol pa/ ji ltar bde legs
phun sum tshogs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mya ngan 'das pa zhi ba bde ba'i mchog /rnam rtog bdag tu 'dzin dang nyon mongs med/ /ngan song gsum
sogs bkres skom grang dre dang / /rkye rga na 'chi la sogs sdug bsngal med/ /'khor ba mi rtag sdug bsngal gtan zad nas/ /las su gzhan don 'ba' zhig spyod byed cig
mthu dang rdzu 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / rgyal po gzugs can snying po 'khor ba las yid byung nas rgyal srid mchil ma'i thal ba
ltar bor te/ mya ngan las 'das pa bsgrub pa la gzhol bar gyur to/ /de ltar gyur pa la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ legs so/ /legs
so| |rjes thams cad kyi nang na glang po che'i rjes mchog go /me tog rnams kyi nang na pad+ma dkar po mchog go /'du shes thams cad kyi nang na mi rtag pa'i 'du shes mchog
go |bsam pa rnams kyi nang na 'khor ba las yid byung ba mchog go /rgyal po chen po 'khor ba las yid byung ba legs so/ /skyo ba skyes pa legs so/ /chags na 'khor ba
yin no/ /ma chags na mya ngan las 'das pa yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po la sogs pa thams cad yi rang ste /
bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /rgyal po gzugs can snying po la gdams pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi
mkhan po dA na shI la dang / ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //rgya gar skad du/ rA dza de sha nA ma mahA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ rgyal po
la gdams pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
bcom ldan 'das grong khyer chen po wA ra NA si na 'khor rnams la tshos ston pa na/ bad sa la'i rgyal po 'char byed 'dul ba'i dus la bab par gzigs nas 'khor dang bcas
pa bad sa la'i yul du gshegs pa dang / bad sa la'i rgyal po 'char byed grong khyer chen po gser can zhes bya ba gzhom pa'i phyir dmag bzhi dang chas pa dang phrad pas rgyal
po 'char byed khros te/ 'di 'dra ba'i bkra mi shis pa dang phrad pas bsad par rigs so zhes nas mda' ste'u kha nya rnga ma blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das
la 'phangs so/ /de nas mda' de nam mkha' la 'khor zhing 'di skad ces grag go /zhe sdang gis ni sdug bsngal bskyed/ /'dir yang sha thang 'thab dang rtsod/ /phyi mar
dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal 'byung / /des na zhe sdang 'thab rtsod spang / /zhes bya ba'i tshig de rgyal po 'char byed kyis thos par gyur pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la mos
par gyur te phyag btsal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ 'thab rtsod ni 'dir sha thang la phyi mar ngan song
du skye na/ ci'i phyir/ rtag tu 'thab rtsod 'ba' zhig byed/ rgyal pos gsol pa/ gau ta ma/ bdag gis gang dang 'thabs kyang pham ma myong ste rgyal bas bdag ni
dmag dang 'thab pa la mos pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ dgra 'di ni dgra chung ngu yin te/ rgyal po chen po/ 'di ma yin
pa'i dgra chen po shar gnyer ba zhig yod do/ /rgyal pos gsol pa/ dgra de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dgra chen po nyon mongs pa bdag tu
tu 'dzin pa zhes bya ba zhig yod do/ /rgyal pos gsol pa/ dgra de ji lta bu lags bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam rtog bdag tu 'dzin pa'i dgra
chen po/ /'di ni rgyu bzhin dngos po med bzhin du/ /thog ma med nas bdag la gnas nas ni/ /bdag gi chos sku yid bzhin rin chen de/ /gzod ma'i mu nas dgra yis brkus
nas su/ /mtshan ma'i tshang tshing gseb tu sbas nas bdag /da rung 'ching zhing 'khor bar 'khyam du 'jug /'jig rten dgras ni bsad nas nor 'phrog tsam/ /de la bzod
byas bsod nams tshogs kyang rdzogs/ /dgra 'di zhi bde thar pa'i srog kyang gcod/ /de bsten bsod nams 'khor bar 'dam du 'ching / /rgyal pos gsol pa/ dgra chen
po de dang ji ltar 'thab par bgyi/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam rtog dgra la rgol ba'i shom ra yang / /dad pas sbyin dang tshul khrims mkhar brtsigs te/ /
dge ba'i dpung byas bzod pa'i go gyon la/ /brtson 'grus lcag thogs bsam gtan gzhu brdungs te/ /bdag med stong pa'i mda' yis bdag 'dzin bsad/ /rgyal pos gsol
pa| bdag med pa zhes pa de bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang zag bdag med rgyal po mnyan par gyis/ /gang zag lnga phung rgyun yin ci phyir na/ /
rgyu ni las dang nyon mongs pas gang nas/ /'bras bu phung por zag ste de yi bdag /bdag ni sems can so so'i lus 'di la/ /nga dang bdag tu
bzung nas chags gyur te/ /bdag ni na dang shi bkres grang gis dogs/ /bstod na dga' zhing smad na mi dga' ste/ /de la dmigs nas mu stegs lnga rnams 'jug /nga
'am bdag de yod pa ma yin te/ /phung po 'di la brtags nas 'khrul pa yin/ /ming ni bdag ma yin te btags pa tsam/ /lus ni bdag ma yin te sha rus rnams/ /
'byung chen 'dus pa phyi rol rtsig pa 'dra/ /sems kyang bdag ma yin te dngos po med/ /chos la bdag med rgyal po mnyan par gyis/ /chos ni gzugs sogs dngos
po thams cad yin/ /byed pa med la mtshan nyid 'dzin phyir ro/ /de dag log rtog mtshan mar bcas pa dang / /lta mi mthun pa yin te de med do/ /ci phyir zhe na phyi nang
chos 'di la/ /dngos 'di spangs nas stong nyid mi btsal gyi/ /snang ba nyid na stong pa nyid yin phyir/ /gzhig bcom mi rtag tsam la stong ming gdags/ /snang la rang
bzhin med par cis mngon na/ /yod med dbus dang gsum du mi gnas te/ /yod par grags pa 'khor ba mya ngan 'das/ /'khor ba'i rang bzhin yul sems rnam gnyis
te| |yul 'di dngos po med par 'di ltar brtag /rang snang rdul bshig rdul yang chas gzhigs med/ /dngos snang thams cad sems yin rmi lam bzhin/ /sems kyang kha dog
dbyibs sogs rnams dang bral/ /des na 'khor ba stong zhing bdag med do/ /'khor ba med pas mya ngan 'das pa'ang med/ /yod pa ma grub pas na med pa'ang med/ /mtha' gnyis
med phyir dbus kyang med pa yin/ /de ltar rgyal pos bdag med sgom byas na/ /bdag 'dzin 'khor ba rtsad nas chod par 'gyur/ /rgyal pos gsol pa/ snga gong yan chad dgra ma
yin pa la dgrar bzung ste/ bdag zhe sdang gis mnar bar gyur to/ /da ni bdag gis yang dag pa'i dgra ngo shes pas dgra de dang 'thab pa'i phyir bdag med pa la mos par gyur
lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ legs so/ /bdag tu 'dzin pa'i dgra pham par byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal
pa dang / bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed la sogs pa yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /bdas la'i rgyal po 'char byed la gdams pa zhes
bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dA na shI la dang / ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //
rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya a dzA ta sha tru kau kr-it+t+ya bi no da na nA ma mahA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa ma skyes dgra'i 'gyod pa bsal ba zhes
bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom
ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi ri bya rgod kyi phung po la/ dge slong brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gsum gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas
kyi zhing sna tshogs nas lhags pa brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pas mngon par shes pa/ gzungs thob pa/ spobs pa thogs
pa med pa/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs sgrub pa shes shing mkhas pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi bsam pa ji ltar

mos pa bzhin du chos ston pa rnams dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / brgya byin lha'i dbang po dang / tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag po dang / de ma yin pa gzhan lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang /
dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po brgya stong mang po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /yang de'i tshe de'i dus na
'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ri zhig gi bang rim gyi ngos la skyes bu dam pa nyi shu rtsa lnga dang lhan cig tu gnas pa/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' klu dpal dang / klus byin
dang | dpal 'byung dang / dpal gyi snying po dang / pad+ma bla ma'i dpal dang / pad+ma dpal 'byung dang / skye bo 'dzin dang / sa 'dzin dang / lag na rin chen dang / lag na rin
chen phyag rgya dang / seng ge blo gros dang / seng ge'i 'gros bsgrags dbyangs dang / nam mkha'i mdzod dang / sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo sgyur ba dang / tshig gi
rab tu tha dad pa thams cad la spobs pa dang / spobs pa'i phung po dang / blo gros rgya mtsho dang / lhun po chen po dang / mthong na dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal po dang /
mtha' yas mthong ba dang / mtha' yas dmigs par gnas pa dang / bdud kyi lta ba yang dag par 'joms pa dang / mya ngan med sbyin dang / don thams cad grub pa'i byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / skyes bu dam pa nyi shu rtsa lnga po de dag dang lhan cig tu gnas so/ /dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu bzhi'ang chos mnyan pa'i phyir
'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i phyi bzhin du 'brang bar gyur te/ lha'i bu kun nas me tog ces bya ba dang / lha'i bu me tog 'od zer can zhes bya ba dang / lha'i bu me tog
mnad ra ba'i dri zhes bya ba dang / lha'i bu chos la gnas par rtag tu brtson pa zhes bya ba de dag dang / lha'i bu mang po gzhan dag kyang / 'di lta ste/
chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i phyi bzhin du 'brang bar gyur to/ /'di lta ste/ skyes bu dam pa de dag dang / lha'i bu de dag tshogs shing 'khod
pa las bar skabs su/ kye grogs po dag /sangs rgyas kyi ye shes ni rgya che ba/ dpag tu med pa/ tshad med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mnyam pa med pa/ gzhal
du med pa/ mi rtog pa/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa/ bla na med pa yin te/ de ni go cha dam pa yin pas rtogs par mi nus na go cha ji tsam zhig bgos na thams cad
mkhyen pa'i ye shes ye shes chen po de rtogs par nus zhes de lta bu'i gtam brjod par gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' klu dpal gyis smras pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i
tshogs bsags pa bsngo ba la cho ga mi shes pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba la gzhog par gnas shing mi brjed pa'i go cha bgos pas ye shes chen po de rtogs par nus so/ /
byang chub sems dpa' klus byin gyis smras pa/ sems snyoms pa dang / sems dul ba dang / sems 'jam pa dang / sems drang ba dang / sems mnyen pa
dang | sems can shes pa'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yi dam brtan po snying po la gnas pa'i go cha bgos pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes/ ye shes
chen po de rtogs par nus so/ /byang chub sems dpa' dpal 'byung gis smras pa/ kye grogs po dag /bskal pa'i grangs kyis ye shes chen po de rtogs par mi nus kyi /
bskal pa dpag tu med par go cha bgos pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de rtogs par nus so/ /byang chub sems dpa' dpal gyi snying pos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ byang
chub sems dpa' bdag gi bde ba la chags shing gnas pas ye shes chen po de rtogs par mi nus kyi/ bdag gi bde ba la ma chags pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
de rtogs par nus te/ gang zang zing med pa lan du bya ba ma yin pa'i bde ba de sems can thams cad la bstabs so zhes sems can thams cad bde zhing bde ba dang
ldan pa la gzhog par byed pa des thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de rtogs par nus so/ /byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma bla ma'i dpal gyis smras pa/ bdag nyid ma dul /
ma bsrungs/ ma byang ba des pha rol ma dul/ ma bsrungs/ ma byang ba dul bar bya ba dang / zhi bar bya ba'i gnas de ni med kyi/ bdag nyid shin tu dul/ shin tu bsrungs/ shin tu byang
ba des pha rol ma dul/ ma bsrungs/ ma byang ba dul bar bya ba dang / zhi bar bya ba'i gnas de ni yod do zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de
skad gsungs te/ de bas na dul ba dang / zhi gnas kyi rnal 'byor la zhugs shing pha rol dul ba dang / zhi gnas dang mthun par bya ba la mkhas pas ye shes chen po
de rtogs par nus so/ /byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma dpal 'byung gis smras pa/ kye grogs po dag /'jig rten gyi chos dang 'brel bas 'jig rten las 'da' bar mi
nus kyi/ gang 'jig rten gyi chos dang ma 'brel ba de ni 'jig rten las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ /de bas na byang chub sems dpa' gang rnyed pa dang / mi rnyed pa dang / /
grags pa dang / ma grags pa dang / bstod pa dang / smad pa dang / bde ba dang / sdug bsngal bas mi 'phrogs shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma
khengs pa/ ma dud pa des ni ye shes chen po de rtogs par sla'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' skye bo 'dzin gyis smras pa/ kye grogs po dag /gzhan la klan ka tshol bas ni
thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes chen po de rtogs par mi nus kyi/ gcig pu gnyis su med la bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi phyir go cha chen po bgos pas
sems can thams cad kyi gang ci'ang rung / yongs su thob par bya ba de thams cad bdag gis yongs su thob par bya'o zhes dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / sems can thams cad
yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir de sems can thams cad dang thun mong du sems bskyed de/ yud tsam du'ang brtson 'grus mi gtong zhing de ltar brtson 'grus la gnas pa'i byang
chub sems dpas ye shes chen po de rtogs par nus so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sa 'dzin gyis smras pa/ kye grogs po dag /'di lta ste/ dper na/ sa ni rtswa dang / shing gel
pa dang / sman dang / nags tshal thams cad kyi gnas yin te/ de la gnas shing rtswa dang / shing gel pa dang / sman dang / nags tshal gyi sa bon thams cad skye bar 'gyur
mod kyi/ sa chen po de ni lan re ba'ang med do/ /sems can thams cad kyang sa chen po las 'tsho mod kyi/ sa chen po ni skyo bar yang mi byed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin du byang
chub sems dpa' chags pa dang / zhe sdang ba'i sems dang bral ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho ba dang / lan re ba med pa'i phyir sa dang 'dra bar sems bskyed
na ye shes chen po de rtogs par nus so/ /byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin chen gyis smras pa/ kye grogs po dag /shes par gyis shig /'di ni go cha chen po yin te/ dman
pa la mos pas ni ye shes chen po de rtogs par mi nus kyi/ gang gnyid log pa'i rmi lam na'ang theg pa gnyis la sems mi 'jug cing rin
po che'i sems thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems de pha rol dag kyang 'dod par byed du 'jug la rin po che'i sems de la ser sna mi byed kyi/ sems can thams cad kyang theg pa
chen po'i go cha de skon par byed cing sems mnyam pa med pa de'ang gang ba'am/ bri bar yang mi mthong zhing / de ltar ser sna med pa'i sems kyis ye shes chen po de rtogs par
nus so/ /byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin chen phyag rgyas smras pa/ kye ma'o sems can 'di dag ni 'gro ba drug tu ltung gi /de dang / de dag tu snying rje chen po bskyed de/ sems
can thams cad la chos kyi phyag rgya rin po che'i phyag rgya gsum gyis btab pa sbyin par bya ste/ sems can thos pa nyung ba rnams la ni thos pa'i lag pa sbyin par bya'o/ /
sems can ser sna can rnams la ni gtong ba'i lag pa sbyin par bya'o/ /sems can ngang tshul ngan pa can rnams la ni tshul khrims kyi lag pa sbyin par bya'o/ /sems can
gnod sems can rnams la ni bzod pa'i lag pa sbyin par bya'o/ /sems can le lo can rnams la ni brtson 'grus kyi lag pa sbyin par bya'o/ /sems can dran pa nyams
pa rnams la ni bsam gtan thob pa'i lag pa sbyin par bya'o/ /sems can shes rab 'chal pa rnams la ni shes rab kyi lag pa sbyin par bya ste/ sems can dag chos dkar
po gang dang / gang dag las bral bar gyur pa'i chos de dang / de dag nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir lag pa sbyin par bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i lag
pa'ang rin po che'i phyag rgya gsum gyis gdab par bya'o/ /gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bsngo ba rin
po che'i phyag rgyas gdab par bya ba dang / bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'grub pa rin po che'i phyag rgyas gdab par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad nam mkha'i rang
bzhin gyi phyag rgyas gdab par bya ba ste/ rigs kyi bu/ de 'dra ba'i gnas la gnas pas ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes chen po de rtogs par nus so/ /byang chub sems
dpa' seng ge'i blo gros kyis smras pa/ kye ma'o grogs po dag /'di ni mi 'jigs pa'i go cha'o/ /'di ni mi skrag pa'i go cha'o/ /'di ni ma zhum pa'i go cha'o/ /'di ni le lo
med pa'i go cha'o/ kye grogs po dag /de bas na mi 'jigs pa dang / sems mi skrag pa dang / ma zhum pa dang / le lo med pa dang / 'jigs shing skrag pa skyi bung zhes byed
pa dang bral ba dang / 'khor ba'i nyes pa mi skyed pa dang / mya ngan las 'da' ba'i yon tan yang dag par mthong ba dang / bde ba dang / sdug bsngal
ba'i chos la snyoms par gnas pa dang / mi dmigs pa la gnas pa dang ldan pas thams cad mkhyen pa rtogs par sla'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i 'gros bsgrags
dbyangs kyis smras pa/ kye grogs po dag /'gros de ni skyes bu ngan pa'i ma yin gyi/ de ni skyes bu dam pa'i 'gros yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skyes bu dam pa dag ni sdig pa'i
lta ba dang bral bas yang dag pa la zhugs pa yin no/ /skyes bu dam pa dag ni rtag par drang ba'i rang bzhin dang ldan pas g.yo med pa yin no/ skyes bu dam pa dag ni bla ma la rim
gro bskyed pas nga rgyal bcom pa yin no/ /skyes bu dam pa dag ni bstan na mthun par len pas tshig bzang ba yin no/ /skyes bu dam pa dag ni yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba la gnas
pas las kyi mtha' grags pa yin no/ /skyes bu dam pa dag ni skyo ba dang bral bas 'dod chags dang bral ba yin no/ /skyes bu dam pa dag ni khong khro ba dang bral bas zhe sdang
dang bral ba yin no/ /skyes bu dam pa dag ni zhi ba/ rab tu zhi ba/ nye bar zhi bas mun pa mun nag dang bral ba yin no/ /skyes bu dam pa dag ni sdug bsngal ba dang / dbul po
la snying rje bar gyur pas 'jam pa rnams yin no/ /skyes bu dam pa dag ni lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las kyi mtha' yongs su dag pas 'jom pa dang bcas pa yin no/ /skyes bu
dam pa dag ni de dag bya ba la yang dag par zhugs pas ji skad smras pa bzhin du byed pa yin no/ /skyes bu dam pa dag ni rtag tu brtul ba brtan pas lhag pa'i bsam pa dang ldan
pa yin no/ /skyes bu dam pa dag ni log pa'i chos dang bral bas ba den pa la gnas pa yin no/ /skyes bu dam pa dag ni chos kyi dga' bas dga' zhing mgu bas chos 'dod pa yin
no| |skyes bu dam pa dag ni lus dang / srog gtong bas dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/ /skyes bu dam pa dag ni sems can thams cad dang 'brel bas mi gtong ba yin no//
skyes bu dam pa dag ni don dam pa'i rjes su 'jug pas nyes pa mthong ba yin no/ /skyes bu dam pa dag ni sdig pa'i chos rnams par spangs pas dge ba'i chos la zhugs pa yin no/ /
skyes bu dam pa dag ni dbul po rnams kyi gter yin no/ /skyes bu dam pa dag ni nad pa rnams kyi sman pa yin no/ /skyes bu dam pa dag ni 'jigs pa rnams kyi mgon yin no/ /skyes bu
dam pa dag ni dpung gnyen med pa rnams kyi skyabs yin no/ skyes bu dam pa dag ni 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor zhugs pa rnams kyi gnas yin no/ /skyes bu dam pa dag ni rten med pa rnams
kyi rten yin no/ /skyes bu dam pa dag ni mun pa mun nag tu zhugs pa rnams kyi snang bar byed pa yin no/ /skyes bu dam pa dag ni lam ngan par zhugs
pa rnams kyi 'dren pa yin no/ /skyes bu dam pa dag ni chos smra ba rnams kyi yongs su 'dren pa yin no/ /skyes bu dam pa dag ni bzod pa dang / dul ba'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas
tha ba'i nyes pa dang / gnod sems dang / gnong pa 'chab pa dang / khro ba'i yongs su gdung ba thams cad dang bral ba yin te/ de lta bas na skyes bu dam pa dag de 'dra
ba'i chos la gnas pas ni ye shes chen po de rtogs par nus so/ /byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis smras pa/ nam mkha' dpag tu med pa bzhin du byams
pa sgom pa'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa snying rje chen po la gnas pa rgyun mi 'chad pa/ dbang po rtag tu dga' zhing dgod pa/ 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad la btang snyoms
su gtong ba/ sbyin pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa/ tshul khrims nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa/ bzod pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa/ brtson 'grus nam mkha' dang /
mtshungs pa/ bsam gtan nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa/ shes rab nam mkha' dang mtshungs pas thams cad mkhyen pa rtogs par nus so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems
bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo sgyur bas smras pa/ sems bskyed pa gang las bdud sdig can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes par mi
'gyur ba dang / lha mi dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / bdag gis dge ba'i phyogs yongs su 'bri bar 'gyur ba'i sems bskyed pa de dag ni byang chub sems dpas mi skyed par
bya yi/ sems bskyed pa gang las bdud sdig can gyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes par 'gyur ba dang / lha dag dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /
bdag gis dge ba'i phyogs yongs su 'bri bar mi 'gyur ba'i sems bskyed pa de dag ni bskyed par bya ste/ de de ltar zhugs na sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba
bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' des sems bskyed ma thag tu sgyu dang / dmigs pa'i rkyen ma skyes pa'i phyir chos thams cad ma skyes pa dang / de bzhin
gshegs pa'i byang chub kyang ma skyes pa las rtogs par 'gyur la/ byang chub ji lta bar chos kyi 'khor lo sgyur ba'ang de bzhin du shes te/ sems kyi bsam pa'i go cha de
dag gis thams cad mkhyen pa rtogs par nus so/ /byang chub sems dpa' tshig gi rab tu tha dad pa thams cad la spobs pas smras pa/ skyes bu dam pa dag /byang chub ni
thams cad kyi rjes su song ba ste/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rjes su song ba/ rnam par byang ba'i rjes su song ba/ 'dus byas kyi rjes su
song ba/ 'dus ma byas kyi rjes su song ba/ zag pa dang bcas pa'i rjes su song ba/ zag pa med pa'i rjes su song ba/ kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'i rjes su song ba/ kha
na ma tho ba med pa'i rjes su song ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rjes su song ba/ mi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rjes su song ba/ 'jig rten gyi chos kyi rjes su song ba/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
chos kyi rjes su song ba/ 'khor ba'i rjes su song ba/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i rjes su song ba/ chad pa dang / rtag pa'i rjes su song ba/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye
mched kyi rjes su song ba ste/ skyes bu dam pa dag /byang chub ni sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / nam mkha'i rjes su song ba'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams
cad ni 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin te/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /de dag ni brjod pa gang dang / gang gis brjod par bya ba'i rnam pa de thams cad stong pa nyid smos par byed
pa'o| |'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha'i dbyings ni thams cad kyi rjes su song ngo / /de bzhin du byang chub kyang thams cad kyi rjes su song ste/ skyes bu dam pa dag /
byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu'i ye shes la mos pa ni dmigs pa thams cad la spobs pa 'byung zhing de ni tshig gi rab tu tha dad pa shes pa thams cad kyang thob par 'gyur
te| tshul gcig la 'jug pa des thams cad mkhyen pa rtogs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa'i phung pos smras pa/ kye grogs po dag /brjod pa thams cad ni brjod du
med pa ste/ sgra thams cad bsnyad du med pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' ye shes de la mos pa ni sems mi g.yo bar 'dug pa yin te/ snyan par smras pa dang / mi snyan par
smras pa la dga' ba dang / zhum pa med do/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ ri lhun po'i phung po la rlung bab pa las slar log na ri lhun po ni g.yo ba'ang med/ rab tu g.yo ba'ang med do//
rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de 'dra ba'i ye shes rtogs pas thams cad kyi sgra dang / brjod pa kun bzod de/ g.yo bar mi byed/ rab tu g.yo bar mi byed cing pha
rol mu stegs can gyi smra ba gang la'ang chags par mi 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' dang / mu stegs can gyi tshig kyang chos mnyam pa nyid du mthong / mnyam pa
nyid la'ang 'gal bar mi byed/ mu stegs can thams cad kyi spobs pa thams cad kyang zad pa'i chos su mthong / zad pa'i chos kyis chos la nga rgyal chen por yang mi byed
de| skyes bu dam pa dag /byang chub sems dpa' de 'dra ba'i ye shes la mos pa ni myur du thams cad mkhyen pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub
sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos smras pa/ skyes bu dam pa dag /byang chub sems dpas thos pa thams cad bzung ba'i phyir blo gros rgya mtsho la sems 'jug pa rtogs par
bya'o| |chos nyid la sna tshogs med pa'i phyir des chos ro gcig pa la mos par bya'o/ /rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang mi 'gal ba'i phyir des chos nyid la brtag par
bya'o| |thog ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir chos gang yang ma bri ba dang / ma 'phel bar bya'o/ /bsod nams mi zad pa'i phyir sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba'i dge ba'i rtsa
ba bskyed par bya'o/ /chad pa dang / rtag pa las dben pa'i phyir des mtha' gnyis rtogs par bya'o/ /sems kyi sgom pa tshad med pa'i phyir des chos thams cad la brtag
par bya'o/ /chos yang dag par mi brjed pa'i phyir bdag gi dran pa'i stobs bskyed pa'ang yongs su gzhag par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad la snyoms par chos
'chad pa'i phyir des snyems pa thams cad yang dag par bcom pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa lhur byed pa'i phyir mi dge ba'i chos thams
cad dang mi 'grogs par bya'o/ /skyes bu dam pa dag /dran pa'i ye shes kyi go cha des ni thams cad mkhyen pa rtogs par nus so/ /byang chub sems dpa' lhun po chen pos smras pa/
'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes de ni 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i ye shes te/ de ni tshad yod pa'i spyod pas rtogs par mi nus so/ /de bas na
bsam pa 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa dang / thos pa 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa dang / dad pa 'jig rten thams cad las
mngon par 'phags pa dang / sbyin pa 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa dang / de bzhin du tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam
gtan dang / shes rab 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa dang / bsod nams ri rab lhun po bzhin du mngon par 'phags pas thams cad mkhyen pa rtogs
par nus so/ /byang chub sems dpa' mthong na dga' bas smras pa/ skyes bu dam pa dag /gang gi tshe na byang chub sems dpa' bdag gi gzugs kyi sems yongs su dag pas
gzugs su snang ba yid du mi 'ong ba gang yang mig gis mthong zhing snang bar mi 'gyur/ bdag gi rna ba'i sems yongs su dag pas sgra yid du mi 'ong ba gang yang rna bas thos
shing grag par mi 'gyur/ de bzhin du dri'ang ma yin/ ro'ang ma yin/ reg kyang ma yin/ rang gi yul gyi sems yongs su dag pas chos
yid du mi 'ong ba gang yang yid la snang bar mi 'gyur/ rang gi sems yongs su dag pas yid dga' ba dang / mi dga' ba dang / ma 'brel cing sems can gang yang
sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi snod ma yin par ma mthong ste/ gang log par nges pa de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi snod du 'gyur bar mthong zhing / gang bdag shin tu dga'
gyur pa'i dngos po de dga' zhing yongs su gtong la byin nas kyang mi 'gyod pa yin te/ de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni thams cad mkhyen pa rtogs par nus
so| |byang chub sems dpa' rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal pos smras pa/ gang gi tshe na spyos pa dang / brgyad pa dang / smad pa dang / brnyas pa dang / brdegs pa dang / tshar
bcad na byang chub sems dpa' rab tu dga' ba bskyed cing gang zag de la'ang dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'du shes skyed la/ bzod par byed/ bzod pa'i mthu ston cing
rab tu dga' ba skyes nas spyo bar byed pa 'di su/ gang la spyod par bya zhes de chos nyid kyi rjes su 'jug par byed/ nang gi stong pa nyid la mos shing phyi'i stong pa nyid la the
tshom med pas bdag tu lta ba'ang mi skyed cing bzod la/ rkang pa dang / lag pa yongs su gtong ba dang / mig dang / mgo yongs su gtong ba dang / chung ma dang / bu pho dang / bu mo
yongs su gtong ba dang / rgyal srid yongs su gtong bas rab tu dga' ba yin/ lus dang / srog yongs su gtong bas dga' ba yin te/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid thob pas
dga' ba ma yin gyi/ legs par bshad pa tshigs su bcad pa gcig thos pas shin tu dga' ba yin/ brgya byin thob pas dga' ba ma yin gyi/ gzhan chos 'chad pa la
shin tu dga' ba yin/ tshangs pa thob pas dga' ba ma yin gyi/ sems can gcig kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bzhag na rab tu dga' ba yin/
stong gsum rin po ches bkang bas dga' ba ma yin gyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bas rab tu dga' ba yin te/ de ni gzhar yang dbang po nyams par mi 'gyur zhing dga'
bar gyur nas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dga' zhing mgu ba'i spyod pa 'dis sgrub par byed pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa rtogs par nus so/ /byang chub sems dpa' mtha'
yas mthong bas smras pa/ skyes bu dam pa dag /gang gi tshe na byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad mthong mod kyi/ bdag tu lta bar yang mi ltung / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
cad shes mod kyi/ rnam par rtog pa spyod pa'ang ma yin/ sangs rgyas thams cad mthong mod kyi/ gzugs la dmigs pa'i 'du shes kyang mi
skyed| sems can thams cad mthong mod kyi sems can du 'du shes kyang mi skyed/ las kyi rnam par smin pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir sha'i mig gsal bar gyur pa yin/
mngon par shes pa thob pas lha'i mig dang ldan pa yin/ nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral bas shes rab kyi mig rtogs par khong du chud pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi
chos ma 'dres pa sgrub pas sangs rgyas kyi spyan la mos pa yin/ stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs pas chos kyi spyan snang ba thob pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu/ de 'dra ba'i ye shes
mthong ba yongs su rdzogs pas thams cad mkhyen pa rtogs par nus so/ /byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas dmigs par gnas pas smras pa/ byang chub ni thams cad
dmigs pa ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sgrub par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dmigs pa thams cad ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mig nas/ dbus
na'ang mi gnas par brtag par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa la mi gnas pa ni nyon mongs pa la dmigs pa dang / las la dmigs pa dang / bdud la dmigs
pas nyams par mi 'gyur te/ las dang / nyon mongs pa dang / bdud la dmigs pa las 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa rtogs so/ /byang chub
sems dpa' bdud kyi lta ba yang dag par 'joms pas smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ bdag tu lta ba ni bdag tu lta ba las ldang zhing byung ba yin/ bdud kyi las ni lta ba las ldang
zhing byung ba ste/ bdag tu lta ba yongs su shes na lta ba 'byung bar mi byed do/ /lta ba yongs su shes na phung po 'byung bar mi byed do/ /phung po yongs su shes na bdud mi mthong ngo / /
bdud kyi yul las 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa la reg par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa thob pa na thams cad
mkhyen pa rtogs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan med sbyin gyis smras pa/ las nyes pa byed pa ni phyis 'gyod par 'gyur/ las legs par byed pa ni phyis mya ngan byed par mi
'gyur ro/ /de bas na byang chub sems dpas las legs pa byed pa/ las mi smad pa byed pa/ las mi 'gyod pa byed pa/ las kha na ma tho ba med pa byed par bya'o/ /sems can
mya ngan gyi zug rngus zug pa rnams kyang mya ngan zhi bar bya ba dang / zug rngu dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir chos bshad par bya ste/ de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni thams
cad mkhyen pa rtogs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' don thams cad grub pas smras pa/ rigs kyi bu dag /skyes bu gang zag tshul khrims dang ldan
pa'i sems kyi smon pa 'grub/ smon lam 'grub par 'gyur la/ tshul khrims kyi rtsa ba la'ang bag byed pa rten/ bag byed pa'i rtsa ba la'ang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams
rten| byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi rtsa ba la'ang thams cad mkhyen pa rten to/ /de bas na byang chub sems dpa' bag byed pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos la brten pa ni
thams cad mkhyen pa rtogs so/ /lha'i bu kun nas me tog gis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu dag /'di lta ste/ dper na/ shing me tog gis brgyan pa ni 'gro ba mang po'i nye bar
'tsho ba yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par thar pa'i chos kyi me tog rgyas pa ni 'gro ba mang po'i nye bar 'tsho ba yin no/ /
rigs kyi bu dag /'di lta ste/ dper na/ lha rnams kyi shing pa ri ya tra ka ko bi da ra me tog rgyas na sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i du rnams mngon par 'du bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs
kyi bu| de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par thar pa'i chos kyi me tog rgyas na lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten mngon par 'du bar 'gyur ro/ /
rigs kyi bu dag /'di lta ste/ dper na/ lha'i nor bu rin po che skyon thams cad dang bral la yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa'
bsam pa yongs su dag pa skyon thams cad dang bral la yon tan thams cad dang ldan pas thams cad mkhyen pa rtogs so/ /lha'i bu me tog 'od zer can gyis smras pa/ rigs
kyi bu| 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nyi ma'i 'od zer btang na mun pa bsal cing gzugs kyi rnam pa thams cad snang bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de bzhin du byang
chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi snang ba'i 'od zer dang ldan pa'ang gang gi tshe na chos kyi snang ba gtong ba de'i tshe/ ma rig pa dang / glen pa'i mun pas bsgribs pa'i sems can
rnams la snang ba chen po byed cing chos kyi rang bzhin yang ston te/ mun pas ni snang ba zil gyis non par mi 'gyur gyi/ snang bas ni lam rtogs par nus pas byang chub sems
dpa' lam la gnas na sems can lam ngan par zhugs pa rnams la yang dag pa'i lam ston te/ byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas na thams cad mkhyen pa rtogs so/ /
lha'i bu me tog man dA ra ba'i dris smras pa/ rigs kyi bu dag /'di lta ste/ dper na/ me tog man dA ra ba'i kho ra khor yug dpag tshad gcig tu dris khyab par byed de/ dri de'ang
rnam par rtog pa med do/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' gtong ba dang / tshul khrims dang / thos pa dang / ting nge
'dzin dang / shes rab la gnas pa'ang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dris khyab par byed de/ dri de'ang nyon mongs pa'i nad thams cad sel
bar byed do/ /de bas na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dri dang ldan na thams cad mkhyen pa rtogs so/ /lha'i bu chos la gnas ba rtag tu brtson pas smras pa/ kye grogs po
dag |byang chub sems dpa' brtson pas byang chub par 'gyur gyi/ mi brtson pas ni ma yin no/ /de bas na byang chub sems dpas rtag par brtson zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba la
chog mi shes bar bya'o/ /des chos brgyad la brtson par bya'o/ /brgyad po gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi sbyor ba la brtson par bya ba dang / tshangs pa'i
gnas bzhi sgrub pa la mngon par shes pa lnga shes shing rtogs par khong du chud pa'i ye shes dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can yongs su smin par byed pa ste
bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang / tshig 'jam po dang / don spyad pa dang / don mtshungs par bya ba dag dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la bzod pa thob pa dang / gzhan
sangs rgyas kyi chos la gzhog pa dang / bdag byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba dang / thams mkhas pas bsngo bar byed pa dang / gus par byas shing dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin
pa ste| chos brgyad po de dag la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpas thams cad mkhyen pa rtogs so/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas skyes bu dam pa de dag dang / lha'i bu
de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kya grogs po dag /byang chub sems dpa' gang ma 'brel ba dang / mi brtson pa des thams cad mkhyen pa rtogs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma 'brel
ces bya ba ni khams gsum dang ngo / /mi brtson zhes bya ba ni rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / yongs su rtog pa thams cad la'o/ /me 'brel ces bya ba ni nang dang ngo / /mi
brtson zhes bya ba ni phyi la'o/ /ma 'brel ces bya ba ni nyan thos kyi sa dang ngo / /mi brtson zhes bya ba ni rang sangs rgyas kyis la'o/ /ma 'brel ces bya ba ni 'khor ba na spyod pa'i nyon
mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams dang ngo / /mi brtson zhes bya ba ni byis pa lta bu so so'i skye bo'i chos thams cad la'o/ /ma 'brel ces bya ba ni ming dang ngo / /mi brtson zhes
bya ba ni gzugs la'o/ /ma 'brel ces bya ba ni rgyu dang ngo / /mi brtson zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu la'o/ /ma 'brel ces bya ba ni lta ba'i rnam pa dang ngo / /mi brtson zhes bya ba ni lta ba
dang bral ba la'o/ /ma 'brel ces bya ba ni chags pa dang ngo / /mi brtson zhes bya ba ni khong khro ba la'o/ /ma 'brel ces bya ba ni ngar 'dzin pa dang ngo / /
mi brtson zhes bya ba ni bdag gir 'dzin pa la'o/ /ma 'brel ces bya ba ni ser sna dang ngo / /mi brtson zhes bya ba ni sbyin pa'i snyems pa la'o/ /ma 'brel ces bya ba ni ngang tshul ngan pa
dang ngo / /mi brtson zhes bya ba ni tshul khrims snyems pa la'o/ /ma 'brel ces bya ba ni gnod sems dang ngo / /mi brtson zhes bya ba ni bzod pa'i snyems pa la'o/ /ma 'brel ces
bya ba ni le lo dang ngo / /mi brtson zhes bya ba ni brtson 'grus snyems pa la'o/ /ma 'brel ces bya ba ni dran pa nyams pa dang ngo / /mi brtson zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan snyems pa
la'o| |ma 'brel ces bya ba ni shes rab 'chal ba dang ngo / /mi brtson zhes bya ba ni shes rab snyems pa la'o/ /ma 'brel ces bya ba ni dge ba dang ngo / /mi brtson zhes bya ba ni
dge ba'i rtsa ba sgro 'dogs pa la'o/ /ma 'brel ces bya ba ni 'jig rten gyi chos dang ngo / /mi brtson zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos mngon par bya bar chags pa
la'o| |ma 'brel ces bya ba ni 'dus byas dang ngo / /mi brtson zhes bya ba ni 'dus ma byas pa'i chos la yongs su rtog pa la'o/ /ma 'brel ces bya ba ni kha na ma thob dang
bcas pa dang ngo / /mi brtson zhes bya ba ni kha na ma tho ba med pa'i chos sgro 'dogs pa la'o/ /ma 'brel ces bya ba ni zag pa dang bcas pa dang ngo / /mi brtson zhes bya ba ni zag pa med
pa'i zad pa'i chos su snyems pa la'o/ /kye grogs po dag /de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'brel ba dang / ma 'brel bar lta ba dang bral bas thams
cad mkhyen pa rtogs mdo kyi/ yang kye grogs po dag /thams cad mkhyen pa ni mi rtogs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byed pas thams cad mkhyen pa rtogs par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i
